description: A happy class reunion takes a dramatic turn when there is a murder. As the mystery unfolds, some dark secrets from the past tumble out of the closet.
Dharam Tej, a software engineer, is very loyal to his boss, Nandha Kishore. All is fine till a criminal gang kills Nandha and turns Dharam into Dharma Bhai.
Miguel chickens out of a fight, and now has to prove his masculinity.
Thampi, a warrior, is smitten by a beautiful princess, Subhadra. But when she refuses to marry him, he decides to destroy her life.
Three robbers try to dupe a visually impaired veteran, unaware of the horrors that await them.
Vasanthasena is a dancer in a king's palace. When Shakara troubles her, she escapes and meets Charudatta. But Shakara has no plans to leave them alone.
The X-Men stand united to face Apocalypse, the first mutant, who returns from the darkness and sees today's mutants as weak.
A failed boxer decides to train a young vegetable seller. But, when both the coach and the student have temperament issues, how will they get along?
Goofy is driven to distraction when he takes Max on a fishing trip to bridge the generation gap and spend some quality time bonding with his offspring.
Advocate Thakral sends an innocent man to the gallows, leaving his family devastated and on the road. However, years later, he gets embroiled in his own game.
Pasupathy works for a god-fearing disciplinarian boss. When his boss spots him sans his 'good-boy' garb, he creates an imaginary twin brother to save his job.
Tony, who is ready to do anything for money, gets involved with criminal activities. By the time he realises his folly, his lover Pammi's life is at stake.
Tinker Bell sets out on an adventure with her friends to acquire nature talent so that she can visit the mainland.
The origin story of Buzz Lightyear follows the space ranger on an intergalactic adventure, alongside a group of ambitious recruits, and his robot companion Sox.
The final hour of the popular virtual reality game Yggdrasil has come.
Newlywed Pooja suffers agony when her husband and in-laws ill-treat her for dowry. However, she refuses to be put down and decides to teach them a lesson.
When a conman falls for a woman, he plans a big job to help her get rid of her financial troubles. However, their ploy fails and a cat-and-mouse game ensues.
Prabha, a happy-go-lucky guy, is always compared to his serious, responsible brother. When his brother gets killed, he is blamed for it. But what's the truth?
Every season, tourist guide Isabella waits patiently for Unnikrishnan. Decades later, when he finally decides to be with her forever, a surprise awaits him.
Ready to go to any lengths to win over Reena, Maddy impersonates Rajeev, Reena’s to be fiancé. Will Reena discover the truth?
An attempt on a bank robbery goes haywire when the thieves are accused of a murder that takes place in the bank premises.
Amarnath Varma, who gets arrested after his wife is killed, flees from jail. He goes to Jagadesh's house. What happens when Jagadesh also gets killed?
A young man sets off on a mission to clean up the society from corruption and other evils.
When Billie finds herself reliving different versions of the same first date, she must break out of a series of loops created by her manipulative ex-girlfriend.
A rich girl decides to frame her philandering boyfriend for a crime he never committed. However, a petty thief's arrival leads to a series of comical chaos.
Can messy love triangles leave you distressed for a lifetime? When Abhi meets his long-lost friend Vasu, they open Pandora's box and revisit the ugly past.
Pavithran, a playwright, goes to a village to write a play based on the villagers' lives. He meets a young girl and gets an inspiration.
Vijayan is a struggling singer. His lover, Sarada, sells her jewellery and sends him to Madras. He becomes successful but forgets the woman who helped him.
The home minister backs the underworld in its smuggling operations. CBI officer Sridhar decides to take on the corrupt minister and bring him to book.
A haunting sequel to the 1993 Halloween classic featuring the delightfully wicked Sanderson sisters.
As part of a study tour, a group of college students visit a dense forest. Things get out of hand when a few unruly students clash with the others.
It's a battle of brains, brawn and emotions as RAW agent Wisam Ahmad Kashmiri struggles between eliminating his nemesis and safeguarding his personal life.
After Donald refuses to be happy and excited for Christmas, Mickey and Minnie decide to teach him the true meaning of the festival.
Lawyer Raghunandan's happy life takes a drastic turn when he saves a rape victim. However, he learns that one of the rapists is someone close to him.

title_name: Pooh's Grand Adventure: The Search For Christopher Robin
description: Winnie the Pooh and company embark on a quest to rescue Christopher Robin from certain doom in a place called "Skull" after misreading a note he left for them.
A brilliant child scientist must join forces with her sister when a cloning experiment goes awry.
Arjun's friendship with Mukunda is tested when the former falls in love with the daughter of a powerful man in the village. Will Mukunda protect his friend?

title_name: Kim Possible Movie: So The Drama
description: Kim and Ron Stoppable's friendship put to the ultimate test when a new kid at the school, Erik, steals Kim's heart.
Mann, an aspiring singer, woos a rich girl and decides to marry her only to accomplish his dreams. Will he succeed in his well-thought-out plan?
Alby vows never to wed a girl who will make fun of Kunjumon, his father who's a dwarf. Kunjumon's life becomes worse after Alby falls for Ancy and marries her.
Goofy and his son, Max, set out on a hilarious adventure that kicks up outrageous fun on the road to higher education.
Blinded by the desire for his sister-in-law, Madhavan makes attempts to intrude into her life. He lands in a fix when her fiancé Jeeva tails him.
Two brothers Vibhooti and Chiraunji have ‘fought’ their share of ghosts. However, a new case forces them to rethink their own abilities and beliefs.
Anand is a photographer who falls for Annalakshmi, a conservative girl. Everyone expects them to marry, but Anand surprises by agreeing to an arranged marriage.
Raju runs a music band with friends. A chance encounter with Jyothi leads to romance. When she disappears without a trace, he finds himself accused of murder.
Christmas Eve 1957. A pilot runs out of fuel, until a mysterious good Samaritan helps him home.
Forbidden love blooms between Tony and Maria, amidst the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.
On a stormy night, a sudden encounter with Chameli, a prostitute changes the life of a depressed investment banker, forever.
Seenu and Mallika are in love but hail from different backgrounds. Seenu gets arrested when Mallika's father finds out about them. Will love conquer all?
A bickering mother-in-law and her constantly annoyed daughter-in-law deep-dive into their strained relationship to discover friendship, love and individuality.
A Telugu comedy, Prema & Co is directed by Vamsi, who is known for his comic movies. Starring Naresh, Vani Viswanathan. Watch the full Telugu movie, online only on Hotstar.
Bobby is all set to wed Tina when his ex-girlfriend comes with a baby claiming it to be his. When the wedding gets called off, Bobby decides to prove her wrong.
Avid water-skier Goofy sets out to teach his son the fine art of the sport.
Sreeram is a rich young man who admires middle-class girl Sindhu's courage. He tries to help her, but she doubts his intentions. How will he win her over?
Paramesh weds village girl Ganga. In the city, he is forced to marry Parvathy. Both deliver baby boys. Ganga comes to town leading to more chaos in his life.

title_name: BTS: Permission to Dance on Stage - LA
description: Purple colours the city of Los Angeles, as BTS brings their “Permission to Dance” concert to SoFi Stadium for the first time in two years.
When a hoops-loving teenager with a dream to play in the NBA finds a mysterious pair of old sneakers, he makes the leap from playground hijinks to superstardom.
Shriram, a carefree man, is the bane of his father's existence. However, a deadly secret involving his brother forces him to take a dreadful blame on himself.
John, an English soldier, and Pocahontas, the daughter of an Algonquin chief, share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.
Ravi, a suicidal taxi driver, plans to shut shop when a young girl, Aarya, compels him to take her on a life-altering journey to Kailash.
Chang, a 5’ 8” Asian American teenager, bets the basketball star that he can dunk by Homecoming.
Narain is a writer who wins a Booker Prize and dedicates it to his wife, Kavya. However, as perfect as he seems to be, there's something not right about Narain.
When Mirabel, the only ordinary member of the Madrigal family, discovers the magic surrounding their home is in danger, she may be her family’s last hope.
Sharmishtha is a beautiful but arrogant girl who hates men. Sarvottam falls in love with her and decides to teach her some basic values in life.
Veeranna is a Telugu action film. It stars Mammootty, Napoleon and Nasir against the backdrop of the Naxal movement. Watch the full Telugu movie, online only on Hotstar.
Raja and Abhinaya fall in love. Everything is perfect until he has visions that come true and sees himself stabbing her. How will Raja stop this scary future?

title_name: Jhanda Uncha Rahe Humara : The Tricolor
description: The film pays homage to our nation through the history, stories and emotions that the Tricolor evokes.
When an Alzheimer's patient goes suddenly missing, his son puts his dreams on hold to search for his father. But a murder plot may complicate things.
An NRI medical student and a vivacious village belle fall in love. However, their chalk-and-cheese personalities lead to complications in the relationship.
Sona Da, Abir, and Jhinuk discover a mysterious riddle during a vacation. As they attempt to connect the dots, the quest for Bengal’s greatest treasure begins.
Childhood friends Aravind and Rishi go on a road trip to find inspiration for their next film. But things take a spooky turn when their script comes to life.
An aspiring artist joins an art school in the city where a girl misuses his art and tries to defame him. Dejected, he starts his livelihood all over again.
Ram and Sravani are madly in love, but misunderstandings create a rift. Enter Lankapathi who wants to marry Sravani at any cost. Will their love survive?
Using recovered Alien technology, the nations of Earth have collaborated on an immense defence program to Aliens' advanced and unprecedented force.
Kathir is an architect who attracts Nandini's attention but rejects her advances. However, things get violent when she starts dating someone else.
SP Yugandhar is an honest policeman who keeps getting transferred due to his intolerance of criminals. Things get challenging when he faces Subbarayadu.
To win over Sonia’s love, Samir spins up the story of his failed marriage and seeks sympathy. But chaos ensues when she insists on meeting his wife.
Sathya, an honest cop, accidentally loses his loaded service pistol. When Murthy, a suspended constable with a dark past, finds it he goes on a killing spree.
Madhimaaran Sathyamoorthy is an honest investigative journalist. When he uncovers a scam, the professional risks start threatening his personal happiness.
Best friends Surya and Mahesh happily run their catering business. But fate has other plans when they are caught in the middle of a crime ring.
An aspiring filmmaker secretly attempts to capture the nitty-gritty of a ruthless gangster's life. However, things start sliding downhill when he is caught.
When a young political leader’s wife allegedly commits suicide; his budding political career comes to a standstill. How will he prove himself innocent?
A mysterious traveller seeks a night's shelter at a poverty-stricken family's hut. However, lured by wealth, they do the unthinkable.
From racing underwater on ilus, flying the skies on ikrans, to maneuvering RDA speed boats, the Avatar stunt team leaves you breathless and wanting more.
Flik, a visionary ant, takes it upon himself to get outside help and enlists a troupe of bug performers to join the fight against the greedy grasshoppers.
Three bachelors find a baby girl at their doorstep. When they fail to find her parents, they decide to bring her up together.
Samarth is indebted to Vishwas for saving his life. When these childhood friends fall for Sumathi, Samarth sacrifices his love for Vishwas.

description: Topi, Dhoti, and Suitboot set out on an adventurous journey to planet Zeba to meet their friends and narrate the epic stories of Bal Ganesh.
Three engineering students become thieves to have a lavish lifestyle. Their classmate Indu is aware of their antics. Will she reveal their secret to all?
A knock on the door, one night, changes a girl's life. While she assumes the stranger has come to kill her, another person walks in posing as a cop.
Little did anyone think that a harmless painting would create havoc in the household. However, it is Dr Vijay, a psychiatrist, who solves the mystery.
CID officer Chandran gets murdered by a gang of smugglers. Later, CID Nazir is assigned the job of nailing the culprits.
When an innocent person Pardhu dies instead of Nandu, a hitman and ends up at the victim's house, he is mistaken to be Pardhu. How long will the deception last?
Seenu is a carefree but uneducated youth leading a happy life in his village. When the elders in his family decide to get him married, everything changes.
Panju and Kamala are polio victims. Panju's mother gets them married, and she looks after them. When she dies, they face the challenge of fending for themselves.
Rene, a lounge singer, decides to stay at a Christian convent where she changes the dynamics of the convent when she begins to sing in the choir.
Neil, an executive, leaves for his village with a bag of money he finds after a New Year's Eve party. But there are four other guys also eyeing the booty.
While covering the plight of the farmers of Pannakamkudi for his TV channel, reporter Nandakuma finds himself getting involved in their problems.

title_name: Tinker Bell And The Great Fairy Rescue
description: Tinker Bell must team up with a rival fairy to keep their existence a secret from humans.
When a Chinese princess is kidnapped and taken to the American West, misfit Imperial guard Chon Wang tags along with a small-time thief on the rescue mission.
Watch the miracles attributed to Lord Shiva or Sri Nanjundeshwara of Srikanteshwar temple in Nanjangud and the local legends associated with it.
A rollicking thrill-ride down the Amazon with wisecracking skipper Frank Wolff and intrepid researcher Dr. Lily Houghton.
The Chief Minister passes an order to arrest Kaali, a dreaded criminal. Its repercussions are severe when Kaali decides to take revenge.
Ekalavya dreams of a career in sports, but there is nobody to guide him. When he eventually finds a trainer, he seems to have made the wrong choice.
When a fearless Pavitra helps an injured Shiva rescue his kidnapped nephew, her relationship with her fianc� falls in trouble. How will she handle both?
A pantry boy and a young girl fall for each other onboard a train bound for Chennai. They find themselves in danger when a gang of dacoits hijacks the train.

Mylanchi is a Malayalam thriller drama movie starring Shanavas, Ambika S, Balan K Nair, Janardhanan, Shuba, Anjali Naidu and directed by M Krishnan Nair. Students on a study tour encounter many strange happenings. The place they stay in is said to be haunted too. Is anyone using this haunted story to unleash chaos? Watch the full movie, Mylanchi, online, only on Hotstar.
A sizzling summer, a passionate performer, and a crazy crowd all come together on screen.
Supercop Dhanush's girlfriend is kidnapped and taken to Switzerland by human traffickers. Will he be able to save her from being forced into prostitution?
Krishnan returns to his hometown from Mumbai when his friend Ganga calls him asking for help. Soon they realise that their criminal past is catching up to them.
Praveen trains to be a kabaddi player. When the village head's daughter falls for him, he is sent away. But he returns to become the main player of the team.
Aman, a real estate broker dreams of living life kingsize. In a bid to break out of his humdrum existence, he lands in a troublesome real estate deal.
A college principal's life changes after she scolds Shyam and Siva, who play pranks on everyone. Will their guardian bring back a blast from the past for her?

A shooter, a dancer and a TV reporter get killed on a train. An encounter expert from the Railway Anti-Criminal Task Force is hired to solve the mystery.
Cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner-hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.
Bujji and Nani find themselves at the wrong end of a local don's ire when he demands Rs. 1 crore from them. How will they generate such a huge amount?
Lakshmana, a happy-go-lucky guy, has a past, whereas Anjali is on a mission to avenge a personal loss. Will destiny bring their paths together?
An estranged father and son must join hands to save a medicinal mountain from the claws of a wily businessman because MGR and Ravi are unstoppable together.
After surviving a fatal train accident, David meets Elijah Price, who claims that he is blessed with superhuman abilities.
Sonia and Vicky unearth an ancient palace and accidentally revive a cruel queen, who then seeks revenge against Vicky, a lookalike of the man who wronged her.
A stranded jet pilot in space must unite a diverse team of aliens to form a squad capable of defeating cosmic threats.
Retired and living in Venice, Italy, Hercule Poirot reluctantly attends a séance where a murdered guest thrusts the detective into a sinister, shadowy world.
Embarrassed by his name, Kunjithapadham wants to change it, much to his parents' disapproval. Will Lady Luck work wonders after he rechristens himself?
Viswanathan, a thug, is hated for his arrogant nature. Following an accident, he realises his mistakes and decides to start life afresh. But is it too late?

title_name: Summer of Soul (...or, When the Revolution Could Not Be Televised)
description: Ahmir "Questlove" Thompson's transporting documentary is part music film, part historical record.
Captain Marvel joins forces with her estranged niece, astronaut Captain Monica Rambeau and super-fan Kamala Khan, aka Ms. Marvel to save the universe.

title_name: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Voyage Of The Dawn Treader
description: Edmund and Lucy are transported back to Narnia with their cousin Eustace. And they join Caspian, Narnia's new king, in his quest to save his kingdom.
Climbing up the success ladder, Aditya, a businessman makes many enemies. Now, one of them is back to seek revenge.
Being brought up in a conservative family, Jaya feels even more trapped when she marries Rajesh, a male chauvinist. How will she break free from these shackles?
Highly educated yet laid-back Sanju meets Swathi and falls in love with her. A twist in the tale comes when he discovers her father's mafia identity.
Kronk desperately tries to find ways to impress his Dad, whom he can never please. But when things go wrong, he comically discovers the true meaning of life.

Naandi is a Kannada drama. Three thieves reach a temple in the forest. One of them tries to rob a pregnant woman. But her husband lodges a police complaint and the thieves are arrested. Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.
A chance encounter with an old friend destroys attorney Robert Dean's life when he is framed for a murder by a corrupt intelligence official.
While the students' union president and thug club make the college climate ferocious, Shiva, a collegiate, is obliged to face them.
Rambhi and her husband Veeru leave their village for work. But, by viciousness and extortion, their life changes radically as they join a group of criminals.
Ramya, Shruthi and Sowmya are driven to commit suicide. But Sai Ashram comes to their aid.
A group of children come to a village on holiday. They find an empty house and soon begin to encounter weird events. What is the mystery behind the occurrences?
Gautham, an orphan, longs to marry into a large family. When Vaishnavi accepts his love, he tries hard to impress her joint family. But will her father agree?
Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.
Priya and her friends visit an estate during their vacation. Soon, they begin to face strange and dangerous events. How will they save themselves?
Portuguese Hensman Antony, a poet, had accustomed himself to the local mannerisms of 18th century Bengal. But when he marries a widow, all hell breaks loose.
Popular TV anchor Krishna is a paying guest at Pooja's house. She is in love with him. When she shares her feelings with him, his past returns to haunt him.

title_name: BSF: India's First Line of Defence
description: BSF - India's First Line Of Defence is a special hour-long documentary that takes us to the front lines with India's Border Security Force - the world's largest border guarding force. Watch the full documentary, streaming online on hotstar.

title_name: Pirates of the Caribbean - Salazar's Revenge
description: Captain Jack Sparrow senses the winds of ill-fortune when his nemesis Captain Salazar escapes from the Devil's Triangle, to kill every pirate at sea including him.
Kummi is petty criminal struggling to eke out a living. He finds an abandoned child and seeks Madhu's help to take care of it. However, soon problems arise.
Chronicling the life of Sree Narayana Guru, who helped free Kerala from casteism, his teachings and love for fellow human beings are relevant even today.
Womaniser Preman is married to Rukmini who stammers. Things take a turn for the worse when he tries to seduce and blackmail his neighbour Appu's wife, Renuka.
When a software company CEO, Rishi, returns to India and reunites with his former classmate, little does he know that things are way worse than they look.
Aakash and Meenakshi marry against their parents' wishes and move to Hyderabad. All is good until he suspects her of having affair. Is there really another man?
Poorna and Shishir are best friends. While Poorna owns an estate and adores Maggie, Shishir, a wastrel, loves Bhagya. How will their love stories take shape?
A polar bear’s memories help her navigate motherhood in an increasingly challenging world.
Shantamma, hailing from a poor family, becomes Lekha, a successful actress. Her suicide at the peak of her career opens a can of worms about the film industry.
When a teacher aspires to be an actor, though scorned by all, his wife's support him. But, in order to fulfil his dream, his life takes a turn for the worse.
A quirky mantle clock, who becomes an unlikely hero proving that even imperfection can lead to something extraordinary.
Plagued by crippling debt, royal heir Bhupati Roy plans to sell his ancestral palace. But the decision brings a cursed ghost to life, who unveils eerie secrets.

title_name: LEGO Star Wars: The New Yoda Chronicles - The Clash of Skywalkers
description: The enraged Emperor sends Darth Vader and his entire fleet to destroy Luke as revenge for his destruction of the Holocrons.
Rajan grows up to become a rowdy. When he insists on marrying his cousin Sumithra, his uncle, who brought him up, refuses the alliance.
Sunny assists an American film crew and gets mistakenly kidnapped by a terrorist group. This, on the contrary, initiates a fun-and-emotional ride for him.
When a series of strange events occur after Ellen Ripley's arrival on planet Fiorina 161, she realizes that she has brought along an unwelcome visitor.
A hilarious coming of age story of Barney, a socially awkward middle-schooler, and Ron, his supposed "best friend out of the box".
Based on the life of ace mathematician Anand Kumar, who trained 30 underprivileged students to crack one of the toughest entrance exams in India - IIT.
David Dunn pursues The Beast in a series of escalating encounters, but it is the shadowy presence of Elijah Price that holds secrets critical to both men.
Lazy Ekantha and Bikantha are in for a surprise when they are granted 15 boons by a genie. They utilise it to their benefit, but trouble is not far behind.
Venu gets fired from his job but ends up marrying his boss's terminally ill daughter. Though he does it for money, he finds himself falling for her.

title_name: Forky Asks A Question: What is Love?
description: Forky attempts to understand the concept of love from Bonnie’s elder toys who believe they’ve been there, done that.
A woman desperately attempts to fix her broken biological clock — but at what cost?
Destiny brings together two estranged brothers but as enemies. However, life changes when they find out the truth about their relationship
A young man wishes to become a cop but ends up heading a gang of thieves. However, he joins the police force after finding out the truth about his associates.
A loving son comes forward to help his father, an honest government employee, who is being harassed by a corrupt politician.
A traffic constable accepts the challenge of traversing 150 km by road to transport a donor's heart for an immediate transplant. Inspired by a true event.
Navin dies in an accident just before his wedding. When he reaches heaven, he realises that his soul was brought there by mistake in place of his friend.
On August 15th, the Indian Independence Day, an attempt is made to kill the Chief Minister of Kerala. Crime Branch officer Perumal gets the case to investigate.
Diya and her brother, Prakhar, are two school-going kids from Mumbai. They go to Goa to bring back their grandmother who has been ignored by their parents.
This is about the adventures of a young stallion and a girl, Neera, who has been separated from her father in the Arabian Desert.
Podiparavakkan's son, Rarichan, is sent away to save him from his father's influence. When he returns home years later, he is not welcomed by the villagers.
Pete tells Grace about his friend in the forest called Elliot, a dragon. Not believing Pete, she asks him to take her to Elliot.
Two best friends set out to have a legendary summer adventure with the help of cheap rosé and their cadre of eclectic friends.
When a medical student abducts corrupt bureaucrats and politicians, he is unaware of a police officer on his trail. Or is there another mystery to it?
Sudha, a widow, is rescued by Ajay from being molested. They fall in love and decide to get married. But is she making a terrible mistake?
Best friends Achuthankutty and Najeeb run an event management company. However, their bond gets threatened when Najeeb secretly marries Achuthankutty's sister.
Three jobless guys cheat people and make merry. What happens when they learn that one of them is the son of a rich man?
Ummer, a labourer, works for the welfare of the people. His life changes when he meets Abbas Ikka and joins his illegal business.
Daniel's grandfather is a strict patriarch whose word is final in the family. Trouble starts when he decides to make Daniel a priest.
Taking a break from their fast-paced life, a young family visits their hometown in Assam. There they realise the importance of love, friendship and family.
Benjamin Franklin Gates seeks a war chest hidden by the Founding Fathers. But, he must find it before his competitor does and also evade the FBI.
This Sleeping Beauty tale is told from the perspective of the villainous Maleficent and looks at the events that drove her to curse young Princess Aurora.
Sevanthi is a fan of folk singer Devu. He mistakes it for love till he learns that she is set to marry someone else. In desperation, he does the unthinkable.
Crown Prince Yuvraj Vijay Singh and his doppelganger, a carefree stage actor, Prem Dilwale's lives get entangled in a royal battle of romance and deceit.
Soorya gains the power to foretell accidents, bombings and other disasters, till one day he sees his death. Can he change what is written for him?
The story of a freshman football player for Clemson University, who secretly raised his younger brother on campus after his home life became too unsteady.
When an honest police officer Madakari is killed by Babjee and Munna, conman Sathyaraju, Madakari's lookalike, takes on his identity and seeks revenge.
Love blossoms between a farmer and a bank manager that soon grows into marriage. All is fine until one day, they see their life falling apart.
Yauvvana is a Kannada romance drama starring Nithin, Amshu (Lakshmi Mururi), Ranjani, Kusuma, Joe Simon, Sarika. It is directed by Jayasimha Musuri. Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.
Appu, an unemployed guy, who saves Chandrika after an accident, gets embroiled in a case of mistaken identity. Will he ever be able to clear the matter?
After his marriage, a doctor learns that he faces major issues with intimacy and married life. Then he seeks medical help.
When a ruthless Raavan disrupts the life of a kind-hearted Ram, revenge seems inevitable. With perils at every corner, will Ram be able to defeat his evil foe?
Prakash is one of the most admired lecturers and plans to marry the love of his life soon. However, women soon begin to accuse him of misbehaving with them.
Vishnu is assigned to teach music to a princess. Things take a turn for the worse when they fall in love and the royal family opposes them.
Mannar Mathai wants to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the drama group he and his friends are belong to. But when they reject his idea, he does not lose hope.
When an honest counter-terrorist agent is suspected to have gone rogue, he embarks upon a revenge mission against the traitors, who once were his friends.

title_name: Marvel's Iron Man & Hulk: Heroes United
description: The Invincible Iron Man and the Incredible Hulk must join forces to save the Earth from its greatest threat yet.
Four friends kidnap a millionaire's daughter to make some money the easy way. However, things get chaotic when they end up in the wrong house with her.
The parents of Pradeep and Prabhakaran want them to get married. However, the brothers are in for a surprise on meeting their prospective life partners.
From carefree college days to becoming a successful wedding photographer, this coming-of-age story depicts the colours of Arun Neelakandan's exciting life.
Donald Duck gets into the rhythm of doing his chores around the farm.
Susanna, a prostitute, lives a strange life. There are five men in her life, yet nobody judges her. She is regarded as a friend, companion, teacher and guide.
An elderly couple feels devastated when their children treat them as a burden. Things change for good when a young man comes to their rescue as a godsend.
Rama, Krishna and Govinda are good-natured and helpful guys. While they are mistreated by many, they get the support of the local police inspector.
This Nat Geo feature aims to see the pandemic from the eyes of India's frontline soldiers, who battle against unprecedented odds for humanity's future.
Tony Stark is under pressure from various sources, to share his technology with the world. And, he needs to find a way to deal with his enemies.
The crew of spaceship Nostromo investigate an alien distress signal, inadvertently bringing aboard an extraterrestrial life form with lethal survival instincts.
Viswanathan, an upcoming politician, and his gang of friends decide to contest the elections to become rich and powerful. However, the road is not easy.
The lives of four people cross paths when a deadly bomb threatens to wipe out Chennai. Will they be able to stop the bomb from destroying the city?
Mustafa, son of Alladin, grows up to be a brave sailor. However, his life goes into a tailspin when an evil sorcerer Zee Zee Ba makes it a mission to kill him.
The toys are mistakenly delivered to a daycare centre instead of the attic before Andy leaves for college, and Woody has to convince the others to return home.
Watch the official music video for the las Beatles song, "Now and Then"
A rom-com about a reporter who is assigned to write a story about a woman who left her three fiances at the altar.
The daughter of a well-known cartoonist goes missing while on their way to Bengaluru for an ad film shoot. During the search, her parents' secret gets revealed.
It's hate at first sight for Sanju and Anu. But, as time passes, they develop a strong friendship, which is tested when they choose different life partners.
A carefree Rajini's life turns upside down when the love of his life gets kidnapped by a local don's gang. How will he take on the entire gang to save her?
While blind Arundhathi's stepmom is against her education, her sisters support her. To achieve her dreams, she joins a school for the blind.
A reporter discovers the shocking past of a woman who hasn't left her house for seven years. What hurdles will the reporter face to get justice for the victim?

title_name: Yuzuru Hanyu ICE STORY 2023 “GIFT” at Tokyo Dome
description: The first-ever solo ice show at Tokyo Dome, "GIFT,” is a story that self-portrays Yuzuru Hanyu's life and future on the ice.
Malani works in the house of an upper-caste family. Her husband dies, leaving her pregnant. However, the villagers begin to doubt her virtue.
22 refuses to go to Earth, enlisting a gang of 5 other new souls in her attempt at rebellion.
Three aspiring software professional girls start working on a horror short film to pursue their dreams. Unknowingly, their reel-life story becomes real.
Unhappiness looms over a rich businessman as his kids face endless trouble. On a friend's suggestion, he prays to Mata Ekvira. Will she grant him his wishes?
When Maya leaves Balakrishnan, he hires Mayamohini to act as his wife. However, Mayamohini is not the woman he though she is.
A no-nonsense cop accompanied by a rookie go on a 36-hour manhunt for a missing Indian cricketer, who has been kidnapped under mysterious circumstances.
A carefree Sushu moves to Hyderabad with his father and falls for Sneha. Will this new phase turn him into a new responsible man?
Unni comes home on a long vacation. However, trouble starts brewing when a young housemaid falls in love with him.
When Valya Kuruppu is betrayed and killed by his brother, his family flees their home. Years later, his son, Ambadi, returns. Will he avenge his father's death?
Jeet, a judo champion, illegally emigrates to Canada. However, she soon finds herself trapped in human trafficking with no way out.
It's about a salesman named Peter, who goes door-to-door to sell ‘Good Luck’. Will he find any buyers?
Bhupathy visits his father's friend and falls in love with his daughter, Priya. However, he is forced to act as a matchmaker for Priya. Will love find a way?
After losing her husband, Gangavva's purpose in life is to bring up her only son, Kitty.

Black is a Kannada drama, directed by Mahendra and starring Suneel, Naveen and Jayashree. The film is about the 'darkness' in a man's life. This darkness, brought about by corruption, is found everywhere; affecting farmers, children, their education, goverment hospitals and so on. Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.
John and Regina get married only to please their parents but are unhappy. However, things change when they find out about each other's pasts.
Educated yet unemployed, two brothers have conflicting natures. However, things change when their father decides to intervene.
A criminal lawyer frees convicts only to kill them later. When he gets a student's murder case, his plans to deliver vigilante justice may be wrongly aimed.
When Wilby visits a museum with his friend, he accidentally ends up with a cursed Borgia ring. When he reads the message inscribed on the cuff, he is transformed into a sheepdog.
Basak is on the lookout for a 'strange' man who has the secret code to the Swiss bank account of a highly influential person. Will he succeed in this attempt?
When Prathapa Verma wills his entire wealth to his illegitimate son, Alexander, he earns the ire of his family. They decide to get back what is legally theirs.
A woman is found dead in the swimming pool of a resort. Things take a turn for the worse when the only eyewitness also dies.
In 1925, a champion dogsled trainer and his lead dog, Togo, journey across the rugged Alaskan tundra to transport an antitoxin serum to a small town.
Gayathri meets her husband when he saves her from molesters. But her happiness is short-lived when he is killed and she is raped. Now Gayathri wants revenge.
Ameena, a homesick Muslim Pakistani immigrant, wakes up on Eid to find out she has to go to school.
In the ominous village of Kotha, 'King' Raju makes a comeback with a cop's aid. Challenging Kannan's rule, he ignites a showdown of power and retribution.
A typical Indian middle-class family, financially weak but morally rich, stumbles upon a bag containing Rs. 5 crore. It's now a clash of ethics and greed.
Anandakuttan, a junior artist in films, is forced to take care of his autistic sibling. Though reluctant in the beginning, he soon develops a liking for him.
The X-Men set out to destroy Sentinels, who are hunting humans and mutants as Logan decides to go back in time to prevent the Sentinels from being created.
An innocent act of self-defence brings a reformed thief at loggerheads with the political leaders and a hilarious fight for justice begins.
Shankaran loves Sumathi, but her parents get her married to a rich guy, Sukumaran. But Sukumaran is not who he seems.

title_name: The Kid Who Would Be King
description: Alex must unite his friends and enemies into a band of knights and, together with the legendary wizard Merlin, take on the wicked enchantress Morgana.
Radha, an aspiring singer, falls for Sasikumar. She decides to take an extreme step when he refuses to marry her, citing his poor financial condition.
Can one get powerful enough to control someone else's mind and thoughts? Find your answers through the lives of a doctor and an actor.
A misunderstanding that happened years ago leads to Surya becoming a corrupt cop. His only mission is to avenge the death of his family.
A brain-dead man's parents donate his heart to a superstar's daughter. However, delivering the heart to a faraway hospital amidst heavy traffic becomes a trial.
Being dark-skinned has been the bone of contention for Antony whose wife and son are fair. This feeling has him creating problems within his family.
Jai, a photographer, meets headstrong Ria. Unaware of his marital status, she falls for him. Soon her love takes an obsessive turn.
Aishwarya, who comes from a rich family, elopes with Murugan, who is only a mechanic. But her family wants to separate them. Will they live happily ever after?
Simple yet smart, sexagenarian Keshu has a loving family and a driving school to call his own. Everything's perfect until he wins a lottery worth crores.

title_name: Assembled: The Making of The Marvels
description: Take an intergalactic trip behind the scenes with the cast and crew of "The Marvels."
To avenge the acid attack on his sister, Dev traces down the culprit and kills him. All hell breaks loose when the culprit’s family seeks revenge on Dev.
The story chronicles the life and glory of Gautamiputra Satakarni, a powerful king from the Satavahana dynasty, who nurtured a dream of a united India.

title_name: Aladdin And The King Of Thieves
description: The King of Thieves disrupts Aladdin and Jasmine's long-anticipated wedding, whose true identity is a concern for Aladdin.
A con man gets lucky when he marries a wealthy Indian woman settled in Canada. Life is now a bed of roses for him. Or is it?
When an asteroid is about hit India, the ISRO hires illusionist Vasu and his team. While the mission is risky, Vasu has a lot more at stake than his life.
Rajinikanth, an MBA student, falls for Leela. A lovers' road trip, culminating in an accident and attempted murder, uncovers hidden truths in both their lives.
Putting his life at stake, Detective Bennie Chan teams up with a gambler to catch the criminal mastermind Matador whilst rescuing a young girl held captive.
After the devastating events of the Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos’ actions and restore balance to the universe.
After seeing Bhavana die in an accident, Siddharth begins to feel her supernatural presence in his house. Her father also helps him uncover the mystery.
Zack and Cody are facing the challenges of growing up as twins. But, now they need each other to navigate through the mysterious Gemini Project.
The life of a selfish man, Hareendran, changes when his house owner absconds leaving behind his three daughters to fend for themselves.
A mafia don faces a lot of trials in his relationship with his estranged father, who is a cop. Will they ever see eye to eye?
Ganga and Nakulan move into a supposedly haunted mansion. When supernatural events begin to occur, Nakulan seeks his psychiatrist friend Dr Sunny Joseph's help.
Sanju's life turns upside down when he borrows money from a notorious gangster. On failing to return his money, Sanju has a lot at stake.
A documentary about the development, launch, and operation of the Mars Exploration Rovers, Spirit and Opportunity.
Upset with her brother Satya's friendship with Bharath, who makes a living selling idlis, Ramya plots to ruin the latter's life. But she is in for a shock!
After Homer accidentally pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpsons family are declared fugitives.
Poor girl Mala marries rich boy Gopal at the behest of his father. But her married life is far from smooth.
Nina gets the chance to play the White Swan but, when the artistic director decides that Lily might fit the role better, she slowly loses control of herself.
Newly-wed Kokila comes to her husband's home. But she shows no desire to start a relationship with him.
A Brahmin boy faces dire consequences when he refuses his classmate's love for him and an underworld don gets involved. Now he has no choice but seek revenge.
A heart-warming, real-life story of actor Sanjay Dutt's complicated relationships, his addictions and his endearing approach towards living life 'Dutt' size.
A group of small birds roosting on a telephone wire get their just deserts when a goofy bird drops in.
Quarterback Joe Kingman transforms from an egotistical bachelor into a loving father when a child claiming to be his biological daughter enters his life.
Kalyanakrishnan, a Brahmin, falls in love with a Christian girl and marries her making her pose as a Hindu. What happens when his family begins to suspect them?
Living in the slums with his mother, Bala gets exploited by a sly politician and a corrupt police officer. Will Bala realise that he is being made a scapegoat?
Unni, who has a feminine voice, is humiliated by everyone in his neighbourhood. However, his life takes a turn when he marries a rich girl who is mute.
A tabla player goes missing from a drama troupe. Investigations reveal complicated sexual rivalries and internal conflicts within the group.
A scientist tries his best to get his shrinking machine to work. Things go awry when he accidentally shrinks his children and throws them in the garbage bin.
Surendran gets his maid Savithri pregnant. To save her from disgrace, her brother gets her married to a widower. What happens when her husband learns the truth?
Arjun must save his sister from her greedy in-laws who want to kill her so that their son can marry a millionaire's daughter. How will he do that?
Unaware that dreaded don Pashupathi is his father, Rahul hates him for killing his mother. Rahul's classmate Ajay takes advantage of their conflict.
When Lightning McQueen gets hiccups, everyone in the Radiator Springs thinks they have the cure.
Desperate to get rich fast, Bhanu heeds the advice of Vamsi, her co-worker and a thief, and begins robbing people. Will she ever hit it big?
When a prostitute is found dead in her house by a regular client, a circle inspector's investigation uncovers some shocking truths.
Things spiral out of control when a mysterious disease ravages a village. Unexpectedly, Raju, a cab driver, becomes a saviour with his supernatural potential.
The life of a fearless investigative journalist takes a turn when her sister commits suicide. However, her death is not as straightforward as it may seem.
Too busy with jobs, three siblings lose their connection to their family. Reuniting for their mom's death anniversary, will her last wish bring back lost love?
The never-ending problems within his big family keep Madhavan far from marital bliss. Can he put an end to the woes and start his life afresh?
Professor Ananthan joins a new college to get over his troubled past. There he meets Sridevi, who helps him deal with the death of his girlfriend.
Vijay and Priya are head over heels in love with each other. When a cruel villain enters their life, Vijay has to use all his wits to win his love back.
A lonely young girl who adopts an orphaned dog she names Winn-Dixie. And, how their bond brings everyone together in a small Florida town.
Passionate Ishana falls madly in love with Ramisa. As their love grows stronger by the day, fate plays villain and throws one hurdle after another.
In pursuit of his lost sister, an impoverished Sathya gets embroiled in a situation that forces him to impersonate a dead multi-millionaire.
An investigative reporter gets in trouble while helping a colleague framed for a murder charge. Will the kids of her orphanage succeed in finding the culprits?
Arjun, an honest police officer, pose as a prisoner to expose illegal activities carried out by Lankeshwar, a jailor. But the task is not as easy as it seems.

"Bellary Raja gets abandoned by his stepfather in his childhood. Years later, his stepfather calls him back only to resolve the disputes between his children. 
"
Devu works in a garage, and Maina is his girlfriend. The arrival of a woman in their midst threatens to ruin their relationship.
A scientist comes up with a product that boosts sexual desire in men. He needs a volunteer, and one man comes forward. However, the experiment backfires.
Gowthami, a loyal politician, becomes the chief minister with one aim - eradicating corruption. However, she faces many challenges in her way.
Despite being let down by societal stereotypes, Basti Balaraju tries his best to woo a young widow but to no avail. Will he manage to win her over?
When Sita, an arrogant businesswoman, learns that her late father bequeathed all his fortune on her cousin, Ram, she sets out to reclaim it by hook or by crook.
A male nurse is in big trouble when three girls - a singer, doctor and a mentally ill patient - fall for him. Whom will he finally commit himself to?
A high-profile murder baffles the cops when a prison inmate claims responsibility and promises more deaths. Will police surgeon Bhadra crack this mystery?
Abhi has an unusual job of breaking up marriages. However, hell breaks loose when he meets Priya who hires him for his services and he falls in love with her.
Five friends get lost in a forest while escaping cops. They witness a shocking incident that changes their lives forever.
Back in his hometown after years, middle-aged widower Raghu meets his old flame, Durgi. As he revisits the good old days, a long-lost romance rekindles.
Based on Madan Patil's novel Jijausaheb, the movie portrays the story of Jijabai, a strong and intelligent woman who guided Shivaji Maharaj to power.
A bike thief plans a big score by waltzing into a rich man's house. However, before he can lay his hands on the booty, Cupid has other plans.

title_name: Prince Of Persia: The Sands Of Time
description: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that reverses time.
A brothel stands in the way of the partition line. While the authorities try all means to oust the prostitutes, they stand their ground.

title_name: The Strongest Man in the World
description: Dexter Riley and his friends accidentally discover a new chemical mixed with a cereal seems to give anyone temporary superhuman strength.
Kavya runs into Babji in a chance encounter, and he decides to save her from her family. But fate has more drama in store for them.
An unscrupulous conman swindles unsuspecting people and has romantic involvements with many girls using different identities. Will he get his comeuppance?
Karthikeya locks horns with the corrupt and powerful after his sister becomes witness to a murder. How will Karthikeya bring the murderer justice?
Raghavan dreams of spending his retired life with his family. Things change when his two sons become members of rival political parties.
Journalist Tejaswini decides to write an article on a live band. However, she gets warned by the band owner against publishing anything about them.
A young man who wants to become a police officer has to pose as his lookalike, who also happens to be a cop, in order to rescue the Home Minister's brother.
Shiva leads a carefree life till he meets Charulatha. He is surprised when she gets into his car one day and asks him to drive her to Mumbai! Will he help her?
Ramesha is a lazy and jobless guy who falls in love with Chinnu. However, she puts forth a condition that changes his life drastically.
Author P.L. Travers travels from London to Hollywood as Walt Disney adapts her novel Mary Poppins for the big screen.
A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they are dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.
A man who believes that daughters are more likely to care for their parents invests his time and money into his daughter. However, fate has other plans.
Philip tries his best to create a new source of energy to save his college from being shut down. Instead, he ends up creating a bouncy rubber-like substance.
Indu is a singer who falls in love with Chakri, an amateur singer. However, their lives turn upside down when she finds out about her lookalike.
While Vindhyan dreams of marrying his childhood love, Neelima, she loves someone else. However, she agrees to marry him, but there's a wicked reason behind it.
A shy Arun takes the help of a retired colonel to impress his lady love, Prabha. Will he succeed in his endeavours?
Breaking out of prison and disguising as a godman, a crook resumes his criminal activities in a village where he is worshipped. Who will stop him?
Dr Rajasekharan shares a very strong bond with his sister, Raji. However, what happens when he is suspected of murdering her husband?
On his quest to conquer the world, Alexander the great reaches India, but meets with his equal- King Porus, who braves against the odds to save his motherland.
Leonardo DiCaprio shares a riveting account of the dramatic changes now occurring around the world due to climate change.
Under the British Raj, two revolutionaries with personal agendas forge a friendship, only to find each other on opposing sides.
Good-for-nothing Bhaskar whiles away his time drinking at his friend's salon. But, when he tries to win over Chandrika, her father stands in his way.
Trapped deep down an endless chasm, a grandmother and boy seek to escape to a better life.
Based on the 17th century saint-poet, this ardent devotee of Lord Vithal took to meditation after he lost most of his family members to a famine.
To escape the anguish caused by their negligent children, an old couple executes a plan to reunite their family.
When an aspiring director fails in his job, Priyan gets appointed in his place. Soon, they become friends and help each other to attain their goals.
Vasu and Radhika's deception spirals into chaos when their fake lover is found dead. With ACP Gayathri in pursuit, can the girls prove their innocence?
One night and three parallel yet interconnected stories. What will happen in this interlock of life, death and karma?

title_name: Maggie Simpson in Playdate with Destiny
description: When Maggie Simpson is rescued by a cute young baby from a playground peril, it's girl meets, boy, girl loses boy, guess what happens next?

Oru Kadam Kadha Pole is a Malayalam drama starring Nedumudi Venu, Jayaram and Geetha. Jayaraman and Shekharankutty are friends. Shekharankutty likes Jayaraman's sister and wants to marry her. But he is unable to express his love for her. Watch the full movie, Oru Kadam Kadha Pole, online, only on Hotstar.
Akhil, who runs a cab service, falls in love with Dr Siri Valli. However, her brother turns out to be his arch-enemy from the past.
Bhadra seeks revenge against Natesan, who had killed her parents years ago. Her modus operandi is simple - seduce his son and spoil their relationship.
Shocked after their house catches fire, Sudhama's wife falls ill. Sudhama goes to the city to make money for her treatment, and his life changes drastically.
After having spent 25 years in jail for a crime he didn't commit, Kabaleeswaran is back to set things straight. How will his past catch up with him?

title_name: Beauty And The Beast-The Enchanted Christmas
description: Belle vows to warm the cold castle by planning an elaborate Christmas celebration. Despite, the Beast has forbidden Christmas celebration for many years.
Hiranyakashipu goes to extreme lengths to dissuade his son Prahalad from worshipping Lord Vishnu. However, the Lord comes to the rescue in a divine incarnation.
An army captain visits Mumbai to find a bride. His plans change after an explosion that sets him off on a mission to disable a terrorist cell in the city.
A car mechanic fakes his identity to pursue the girl of his dreams, unaware of her secrets. When they land in a grave situation, will he choose money or love?
CBI officer Lakshminarayana's wife goes missing. His search leads him to Hong Kong, where he finds her doing the unthinkable.
Two royal families turn rivals over the right to perform the revered Shiv Puja. As peace becomes a thing of the past, a competition may offer a resolution.
Join the practically perfect Mary Poppins for a jolly holiday as she magically turns every chore into a game and every day into a whimsical adventure.

title_name: Sister Act 2: Back In The Habit
description: Singer Deloris Van Cartier goes undercover as the school's new music teacher as she tries to convert her class into a hip-hop gospel choir from heaven.
Balan, a village barber, becomes famous when word spreads that superstar Ashok Raj, who is filming nearby, is his childhood friend. But does Ashok remember him?
The Tardis takes the Doctor and Donna to the furthest edge of adventure. To escape, they must face the most desperate fight of their lives.
A reinterpretation of the 1977 cult classic about a vacationing family who face a desperate battle for survival in the desert against bloodthirsty mutants.
Mike's bought a new car and he wants to show it off to Sully but, he hasn't exactly mastered the complicated controls yet.
A failed singer, a successful actress and a dreaded don are caught in the chaos. Abducted by a dangerous man, Haripada must pretend to be someone he is not.
When Surya and Vennela are about to end their lives, a miracle connects these two strangers. They happen to have the same phone numbers, but can't meet.
The lives of a small-town father and his daughter are shattered when she ends up in a brothel after moving to the big city. How will he rescue her?
Michael Sullivan, a hit man, sets out on a journey of retribution and redemption after losing his wife and son.
When corruption in the city holds him back from fulfilling his dreams, an honest philanthropist Sivaji decides to battle against the system in his own ways.
A lonely woman battles extraterrestrials who threaten her future and force her to face her past.
When Pinky finds out the real reason behind her parents separation, she decides to reunite them. However, she realises that the journey is not all rosy.
Detective Advaita Bhushan's life gets exciting when a dog's murder investigation leads him to a huge set-up of hi-tech assassins committing murders in the city.
The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history, and civilizations
Story of a common family man who takes desperate measures to save his wife and two daughters when they unwittingly get entangled into a crime.
Aachi, an orphan girl, falls in love with Anil. While he treats her like a sister, Anil's father takes a surprising decision.
Manu becomes insane when his rich father opposes his love for Ramya. What will happen to the dejected lover?
A retired middle-class man fails to get his land back from a cunning dealer. His son comes to his rescue with a dramatic plan. - ok
The kingdom's most-wanted bandit Flynn Rider is taken hostage by Rapunzel, a teen with 70 feet of hair, and the unlikely duo sets off on a hilarious adventure.

title_name: Phineas & Ferb The Movie: Candace Against The Universe
description: Phineas and Ferb embark on a journey to rescue their stepsister Candace from an alien abduction.
A fight that was won after years of struggle. The film revolves around the Telangana Movement and events that led to the protests at Osmania University in 2009.
Padma is in love with poet Manju. After he goes missing while trying to save a friend from nationalists, a heartbroken Padma decides to get his poems published.
Amid the ever-busy lifestyle of Kolkata, Neel and Labanya’s happiness stands as a facade of a troubled marriage. Will divorce be the only way out?
Sanju and Anupama hate each other. However, when Sanju realises his love for Anupama, she is engaged to someone else. Is it too late for Sanju?
Mr. Incredible is left to care for the newborn while Missus out saving the world, but the going gets tough for the family with the arrival of a powerful villain.
A fisherman returns to his village. On not finding his lover, he gets married to another woman. Years later, his son seeks revenge for leaving his mother.
Alice encounters a White Rabbit while chasing him and she falls into the magical world of Wonderland with its kaleidoscope of off-the-wall characters.
When Shivani enters Vicky's life, his fortunes turn as she changes everything for him. But will their love story culminate into marriage, or will it end?
A good-for-nothing son, a criminal on the loose and an important mission. Find out what happens when all of these collide.
A childless prince decides to adopt someone from a royal family as his heir. However, he faces many challenges when many people queue up for adoption.
Vasu hates gang wars but is forced to continue the 'rowdy' business for his lady love, Neha. But will she stay with Vasu and his ways?
What will you do when you have to choose between love and family? Krishna's life takes a tragic turn when he is forced to make the ultimate choice.
In Uganda’s 2021 presidential election, music star Bobi Wine with his wife Barbie, rallies his people in a dangerous fight for freedom from an oppressive regime.
ACP Shankar, injured during a communal riot, gets treated by a Muslim family. This has him regretting some of his past actions and remembering his wife's words.
Corrupt K.K. announces that Chitteswamy is a godman. Soon devotees throng to seek his blessings and help to resolve their problems. But he falls for Sheela.

title_name: Forky Asks A Question: What is Money?
description: Hamm attempts to give Forky a lesson on how the US monetary system works.
The VKs have settled into their new life except for Mal, who is struggling to deal with her status as the Lady of the Court alongside King Ben.
Ajay, a flautist, and Bindu, a software engineer, are happily married. However, their happiness gets destroyed when Bindu's boss begins to harass her.

title_name: Mooru Guttu Ondu Sullu Ondu Nija
description: When the parents leave for a day's trip, the children call their lovers home. Things begin to go wrong when a stranger, who claims to be a relative, shows up.
A short-tempered yet brilliant young medical surgeon immerses himself in drugs and alcohol when his lady-love is forced to marry someone else.
Kishtayya and Anji, inseparable as brothers, are caught in turmoil protecting the village chief's family. When tragedy strikes, how will Kishtayya rise?
A suspended cop, a local gangster and another gang plan to rob Rs 500 crore used for betting during IPL. What follows is a high-octane action sequence!
Young, middle-class boy Nani has to protect his sister-in-law, a transport official from a gangster, who runs an illegal transport business.
Gautamiputra Satakarni, the ruler of Amravati, aims to bring the country under one flag. But, to fulfil his dream, he has to fight a deadly battle.
Mickey Mouse stars in this one-mouse virtuoso violin performance.
Santhosh and his team of 'The Cartoon People' spread joy by dressing up as characters. However, all he wants is to fall in love. How will he meet his lady love?
Upon his father’s insistence, Arjun becomes a policeman but struggles to find purpose until a conflict with a politician pushes him to take charge for real.

title_name: Wild_Life: The Big Freeze With Bertie Gregory
description: Wildlife filmmaker Bertie Gregory travels to the edge of the Canadian Arctic, to capture a unique group of animals who have thrived there.
Michael is a chef who has to choose between casual dating and serious commitment. He meets Senapathi who shares his love story. Will it help Michael decide?
Happily married Nanda Gopal leads a peaceful life till he meets his boss. To get promoted, he tries to impress her but falls prey to her cruel tactics.
The life of Skeeter Bronson, a hotel handyman, is changed forever when the bedtime stories he tells his niece and nephew start to mysteriously come true.
Milo and Kida reunite with their friends to investigate strange occurrences around the world that seem to have links to the secrets of Atlantis.
An Indian intelligence agent named Vikram is sent to Kashmir to find who is responsible for the extremist attacks. The investigation opens some dirty secrets.
Raj and Priya are happily married, till his ex-girlfriend returns to his life as his new boss. When he spurns her sexual advances, she accuses him of rape.
A righteous cop's career and personal life turn catastrophic after he locks horns with a few influential people. But he's had enough and decides to fight back.
Miguel is confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.
Marie runs away from home and hitches a ride with a mutant known as Wolverine. Charles Xavier sends Storm and Cyclops to bring them back.
A widowed lecturer reluctantly agrees to her only daughter's marriage with Sojappan on one condition. However, tragedy strikes and their lives unravel.

title_name: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny: A Special Look
description: Relive all the adventures, and get a special look at “Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny.”
Anjali and Jai belong to two warring families and pretend to be in love only for revenge. However, their plan goes awry when true love knocks on their door.
Jancy is the only female member in a six-piece band. Two musicians try to win her over. However, they discover some alarming secrets when she goes missing.
Kumaran, an officer suffering from PTSD is on a serial killer’s trail. He is just about to nab the culprit when he discovers an abnormal truth.
To acquire a magical stone, a Russian gangster wreaks havoc in a village. However, Akhil, arrives as a godsend and battles the odds to protect the villagers.
A mentally challenged young woman is rescued from the streets by a rich man. He admits her to a hospital. But what is the real identity of this girl?
Siva, an aspiring actor falls in love with Dr. Kavya who is already engaged. Far from giving up, he decides to go all out to win his lady love's heart.
Winnie the Pooh and friends Tigger, Rabbit, Piglet, Owl, Kanga, Roo and Eeyore reunite in a wild quest to save Christopher Robin from an imaginary culprit.

title_name: Ducktales: The Movie Treasure Of The Lost Lamp
description: Join the DuckTales team for a trek across the Egyptian desert on a fearless quest for the legendary Treasure of Collie Baba.
This revenge saga sees two people out to avenge the death of their families. Will they succeed in their quest?
Nandana is upset when her wedding is fixed with Karthik as she thinks he doesn't love her. However, her feelings change when she reads a book written by him.
Years after being falsely accused for his brother's crime, Muthappa returns home to seek justice. Can he save the family from his brother's evil intentions?
Naina, a playschool teacher, takes 16 students hostage. Rattling the police and the leaders, her demands send shockwaves through the country.
A tell-all tale about the life and times of Indian cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni, mapping his journey; from a ticket collector to a celebrated cricketer.
His family's situation forces Prabhakaran, a police constable, to take bribes. What happens when he takes money from a thief and falls for his sister?
In this battle of the sexes, Pralay attempts the impossible when he tries to woo a hot-tempered Dolan. Once married, a hilarious roller-coaster journey ensues.

George, a teenager, loves the idea of being in love. This dream seems to be within his reach in his school days and even in his college days, but it fails to materialise. However, all is not lost yet!
Padmini's husband forces her to be an actor, and she becomes famous. However, her name and fame come at a price.
When a series of mysterious events stirs pandemonium in a village, an eccentric cop Vikrant Rona sets out to solve the case wherein everyone is under the radar.
To live their dream of attending Goa's renowned Sunburn Festival, two orphaned boys come up with a master plan. And thus starts the road trip of a lifetime!
Casanovva decides to record the moves of four thieves at a wedding. He involves them in a live reality show to teach them how much harm they can cause.
For Dr Anjana, silence is golden while Arvind, a salesman, loves to talk. What happens when a strange disease called 'dumb flu' strikes the city?
Super Action is a Malayalam thriller, starring Chiranjeevi and Bhanu Priya in the lead roles. Watch the full movie, Super Action, online only on Hotstar.
Donald decides to try cooking along with a radio show. He tries to make waffles but accidentally uses rubber cement in the mix.
A young man Gopi finds the Book of Death and exploits it for fortune. Pandemonium ensues when Yamadharman arrives on Earth to recover the book.
Police officer Azeem saves a child whose parents die in the riots. Named Bharat Azeem, he too becomes a cop and gets posted in Bhatkal amidst communal riots.
Join Sivaji Ganesan in this mythological journey as he narrates the stories of the most important Nayanars who were dedicated to worshipping Lord Shiva.
During the late '80s, Hemant Shah, the man with the Midas touch, pulled off the biggest hustle that shook India's financial fabric. Inspired by true events.
A small-town teacher and her brother, the local sheriff, seek to help a troubled young boy who possesses a strange secret, unaware of the consequences.
Shan and Vinu meet David Abraham, a suspended cop. When they tell him about their lives, David offers help and comes up with some alarming facts.
Bharat, a cashier and a small-time actor, gets comically caught in the corrupt web of the legal system.
Separated in childhood, three brothers come together in the courtroom. How will this reunion go?
Shunned by his family, Vijay is saved by a rich man. During communal riots, Vijay takes law into his hands and gets a death sentence. How will he save himself?
When George's daughter and wife Nina both announce they are pregnant, he finds himself in outrageous situations.
The Buddies have found magical rings, giving each of them a unique superpower. With their new powers, they will stop an extra-terrestrial warlord.
Ganesh takes a loan to fulfil the dowry demands of his sister's in-laws. When he faces a financial crunch, he befriends Rekha, a rich girl. Will his plan work?
A Las Vegas cab driver finds two teens with supernatural powers in his cab and, to save the world they will have to unravel the secrets of Witch Mountain.
Nanda's world comes crashing down with her fianc� Narendran's death. When she goes to his village for his funeral, she meets Unni, his twin.
Two 13-year-old best friends embark on the adventure of their lives when they discover a mermaid named Aquamarine in a swimming pool.
Stark opposites Jiya and Manu find solace in each other's company, but their friendship is misunderstood by society. Will fate at least favour them?
A wealthy sheikh invites an American cowboy and his mustang, Hidalgo, to compete in a near-impossible three-thousand-mile cross desert race.
The show is a never-seen-before look into the elite anti-terror force of India. It follows the life of an army major who aspires to become a Black Cat Commando.
Madhu is falsely accused of murder. However, on finding out that he is innocent, a police officer agrees to take up the case and catch the real criminal.
Released from jail, a group of vigilantes start working against the corrupt. They are joined by an ACP. However, such a task is never easy.
Seven contestants decide to spend a week at an infamous haunted house in Nandigama to win big. But one of them is in it with an ulterior motive.
Julie, an Anglo-Indian, is in love with Sasi, a Hindu. Her life takes a drastic turn as religious beliefs clash, and he abandons her after getting her pregnant.
A happy-go-lucky Ravi meets with an accident that puts him in a coma for 16 years. Hell breaks loose when he wakes up in the 21st century!
The unlikely duo of super spy Lance Sterling and scientist Walter Beckett is forced to work as a team for an ultimate undercover mission.
Dongalavanka is an anarchic village and the only law-abiding person is Veera Raghavulu. A confession made as a child comes back to haunt him 20 years later.
This film is an intimate and moving cinematic record of Shohei Ohtani’s journey to MLB stardom.
The Rescue Aid Society agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.
After being injected with a special "Super-Soldier" serum which leads to him developing superpowers Steve must thwart the plans of a warmonger.
A married teacher's illicit affair with his teenage student turns into an odd love triangle, when her classmate gets attracted to her.
Sing along with your favourite songs with on-screen lyrics as you watch “Frozen 2."
After discovering that a large asteroid is going to impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep-core drillers to save the planet.
Divya is in love with Anil, but he is smitten by Priyanka. It is a testing time for them when Anil gets involved in illegal activities. Who will support him?
A secret map inspires Jim Hawkins and John Silver to journey across the universe in a thrilling treasure hunt.
Though happily married, Mohan and Rajesh are womanisers. To teach them a lesson, their wives decide to play the 'game' of love, but not with them.
When both heroes and villains start to mysteriously disappear, the Avengers unite to find them.
Obsessed with mystery stories, an eagle-eyed teenager starts assisting a senior police investigator to unravel the case of a 'perfect murder'.
A young man, aspiring to become a police officer, finds himself working for the underworld.
Sooryanarayanan aims to be an accomplished singer like his father. With his father's debts and dark realities of the past, it is not going to be easy for him.
During a college tour, Rekha, the college beauty, goes missing. Professor Devan seeks the help of forest officer Tiger, and they come across something shocking.
Ganesh Vasanth is the next offering from Vijay Chithiram. Popular detectives Ganesh and Vasanth from Sujatha's famous novel of the same name come alive on TV.
When journalist Maya gets abducted while covering a high-profile criminal case, Devan, an orphan adopted by her, decides to save her.
Revathi's parents were separated when she was young. She is raised by her mother, who feeds her lies about her father. But will she ever learn the truth?
When a zamindar trusts one of his employees with the factory, he ends up getting betrayed and killed. Years later, Janaki comes seeking revenge. Who is she?
Rebecca Bloomwood is a fun-loving girl who is good at shopping. Her life changes completely after getting a job as an advice columnist for a financial magazine.
A family sits down for a bedtime story and is transported to a forest filled with elemental spirits.
Kavitha marries Chandramohan, who was chosen for her by her father and brother. However, her marriage lands in trouble when she is suspected to have an affair.
Three young couples are forced to face the harsh realities of life and decide to part ways. Will they ever reunite?
Two friends, a Christian and a Hindu, find their lives altered when they learn their kids got swapped at birth. How will they reconstruct their relationship?
An average day in the life of a married couple turns chaotic after their pet dog goes missing. Hilarious situations abound as they head out to find him.
After becoming a pawn in a politician's evil plot, an honest IPS officer takes refuge in a village. When he discovers a new murder plan, he tries to foil it.
Jambulingam is a hardworking villager. He decides to fight against the barbarities of the landlord, who exploits the villagers. Will he succeed in his attempt?
Mourya lives life on the edge and has an unpleasant encounter with a cruel moneylender, Soori. What will Mourya do when his own family becomes a target?
On the run with a bag of jewels, Chakravarthy and Preethi get lost in a jungle. Craziness unleashes when they learn that Naxalites are hiding somewhere around.
An undercover officer fights crime in the guise of a priest. Things take a turn when he falls in love with the daughter of a corrupt minister.
Middle-aged politician Mamachan meets a young girl and falls for her. However, he is shocked to learn that she is the daughter of the woman he once loved.
Muthanna leads a simple life in his village. However, things take a turn when he becomes the mayor of Bangalore.

In the year 2093, a group of explorers on a secret mission to an alien planet discover the remains of an ancient civilization, but their excitement is short-lived as the Weyland Corporation has ulterior motives.

title_name: Once Upon A Time in Mumbaai
description: Sultan rules the hearts but tops the wanted list. However, his reign in Mumbai is threatened when his protégé turns overambitious and a bloodbath ensues.
A patriarch of a royal family, whose scion gets murdered, assigns the task of finding the culprit to his police officer nephews. Will he ever find the answer?
Smuggler Viswan puts up a fake identity in front of Police Commissioner Chandradas. What happens when Chandradas learns the truth?
Vanisri, a rich landlord's daughter, pretends to be in love with a guy who misbehaves with her after finding out about her motives. How will she deal with this?
The film is about Big Year, a competition among birders, who can spot and identify the highest number of bird species in North America, in a calendar year.
A wooden doll strives to fit in and ends up sparking a journey of self discovery.
A young man takes on a notorious gang when they attempt to murder his sister. However, he has to pay a heavy price.
Ambu spots Nidhi at the bus stop and falls in love with her. However, things take a turn for the worse before he can profess his feelings to her.
The small town of Chanderi is haunted by a vengeful spirit, Stree. Soon enough, Vicky, a goofy, gifted tailor, becomes an unlikely saviour for his kind.
A schoolmaster faces the harsh realities of the caste system, which discriminates against people. Will he be able to stop this social evil?
CBI officer Sethurama Iyer is on a mission to find the killer after the mysterious death of Mythili in a haunted house. Will he find the culprit?
Surya suffers from porphyria, which makes him sensitive to sunlight. It ends up causing problems in his love life. How will he win against the disease?
Manomi, a Sinhalese orphan, comes to India to meet her guardian, Annadurai. She falls in love with Thiruchelvam, an LTTE commando. But will their love survive?
After her parents' death, Meera returns to her ancestral home but is not welcomed there except by her grandfather. Will Meera be able to earn the family's love?
Unlikely heroes brought together by fate are the galaxy's only hope at thwarting The First Order's reign of evil led by the Supreme Leader Snoke and Kylo Ren.
Rameshan and Maya's chaotic life becomes challenging when they are on the run from a gangster who wants to marry her and they find a corpse of his lookalike.
A tormented Mano decides to solve his problems after his break-up. But things get worse when he finds himself caught between kidnappers and a distressed couple.
Evading the eyes of the warden, Adhishta Lakshmi enters a boys' hostel after bribing one of the students, Bhanuprasad. However, she gets trapped in the hostel.
Peter is in love with Devi, but she gets married to Jayakumar. When Jayakumar dies in an accident, Peter decides to confess his feelings to her.
A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.
Babu and Keerthy are in love and wish to get married. But her dad wants her to tie the knot with her ex-fiance. How will Babu convince her family to accept him?
What happens when a drama group comes to a village that is against alcohol and entertainment? Will the troupe be able to change the mindset of the villagers?
African filmmakers make their dream a reality creating an original animation series with Disney.
A filmmaker and an actor decide to make a horror film in a haunted house. A crime reporter too is shooting there. Soon, they all are in for a spooky surprise.
Impressed with Yogi's fighting skills, a don brings him into the underworld. Yogi loves Mala, but she holds him responsible for her father's death.
Visually impaired Kochubaby and Mary get married. After Mary's death, he raises their daughter only to learn that she too will go blind like her parents.
The movie follows Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his 12-year old son.
Krishna, who works as a clerk at a government office, outsmarts his rich and stingy father-in-law to teach him a valuable lesson.
A carefree constable who would rather serve his seniors than chase criminals get pitted against a most-wanted don. How will he save himself from getting killed?

title_name: The Ice Age Adventures of Buck Wild
description: The hilarious escapades of everyone’s favourite prehistoric mammals Crash and Eddie continue, as they join pal Buck Wild to take on dinosaurs of the Lost World.
Kevin is left behind while his entire family goes on a vacation. His toys and quick thinking are too much for a pair of burglars who decide to loot his home.
