A ‘Mangalagaur’ competition offers a new lease of life for six estranged sisters. Transcending a wounded past, the siblings-in-action redefine womanhood.
Sakthi and Asha use their intelligence to create new electronic devices. When HRD Minister Devaraj dupes them, Sakthi and Asha concoct a plan to expose him.
Sunny and Kuttiyalikka lose their money after a visa agent dupes them. They seek a friend's help to find a job in the Gulf, but there is trouble ahead.
A newly married couple's life falls in jeopardy when his wife goes missing under mysterious circumstances.
Srimannarayana is an honest journalist whose father sets up a welfare fund for farmers and dies. However, trouble arises when he is accused of embezzling funds.
Watch the indelible chapters from Indian mythology come to life! With unparalleled valour, Lord Shiva battles against evil forces to save humanity.
The enemies of Venugopal, an honest minister, abduct him and replace him with Manikandan, a lookalike. And Manikandan becomes a puppet in their hands.
After delivering a baby in a cab, Dr. Deepak Chopra he realises there is a way to use the skills that the Canadian government doesn't seem to want.
A single mother fights for justice for her son, who gets wrongfully accused in a hit-and-run case. Her opponents are the rich and powerful.
Fiery Ember is tested when she meets go-with-the-flow Wade in Element City.
Suvarna, a cancer patient, promises to donate her eyes to Murugan’s blind daughter. While he is happy for his daughter, he does not want Suvarna to die.
A tourist guide in Kodaikanal falls in love with a girl who arrives in town. However, in a turn of events, he learns the truth about his birth.
In a bid to dethrone his brother King Maximus, Badmess programmes a superhero- Super K. However, when he abandons Super K, the latter leads a fight for good.
Conman Jerry teams up with Ravi, an escaped convict, to carry out a heist. When the plan fails due to their differences, Jerry comes up with a bigger idea.
In the mid-1980s, an inspiring trio of innovators combined their gifts in art, science, and business to launch a new way to make 3-D animated films.

title_name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid Christmas: Cabin Fever
description: Greg Heffley fights to stay off Santa's naughty list as his family prepares for a major snowstorm.
An old car gets a complete makeover and now has modern technology and futuristic gadgets. Adventure begins when it saves a little girl's life.
Krishnamurthy is appointed by a real-estate company to vacate Vietnam Colony, a place with illegal and anti-social elements. But what he comes across shocks him.
Sakthi, an auto driver, falls in love with Leena. However, his life turns upside down when he runs into three criminals who have been baying for his blood.
Beena, a Christian, and Sonu, who is from an orthodox Hindu family, are college sweethearts. Can Beena bridge the religious divide and gain acceptance?
Mater is a rock star in a heavy metal and rises to the top with his hit song "Dad Gum". Lightning McQueen joins him on stage in the middle of a huge concert.
A driving instructor is tasked by a criminal to deliver a woman to Mussoorie from Chennai. Soon, he realises his assignment may be too dangerous.
When they face problems in life, four couples need to come together to overcome them. Will they find the right path during their journey?
Visually challenged Meghana is a famous writer. Aravind comes to interview her and wins her trust. However, he later tries to kill her. What is the reason?
A lonely Mexican-American woman unknowingly summons a dark and ancient creature.
Siddha and IAS officer Charandas face corruption charges at their workplace. When they realise the impact of dishonesty in the system, they decide to fight it.
Close friends Ashok, Kumar and their Mamaji’s life turns into a total chos when two lookalikes of each of the three land in their lives.
Fly over the surface of some of the most iconic Star Wars biomes, planets, and moons.
An impoverished barber's mundane life takes a drastic turn after his childhood friend returns to his village as a renowned actor. Will fate help them reunite?
An aviator and a magazine editor from New York are stranded together on a deserted isle. Will this mismatched pair quickly discover all the perils of paradise?
Recovery agent Saravanan is disliked by his house owner, Mallika. However, when an eviction notice is served on her house, he comes to her help.
An elite climbing team attempts a climb up a sheer cliff to deliver a renowned scientist to the top of a tepui to search for undiscovered species.
A young media employee wants to get ahead at work and is forced to romance his boss' fianc�e to get in his good books. Will this end up in a crazy love triangle?
A school-going tomboy falls in love with a farmer after he saves her from goons. When he turns her down, she takes it up as a challenge to win his heart.

title_name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
description: Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution to rescue his friends, Jedediah and Octavius, when they are accidentally shipped to the museum.
With the powerful Thanos on the verge of raining destruction upon the universe, the Avengers will have to risk everything to stop him.
A billion dreams came true in 1983 and 2011. Between the two big wins, four cricket-crazy friends set out to find answers and write their destinies.
Kumar and Natesha escape from a mental asylum and take up a job at a petrol pump. When they decide to start their own business, their past catches up with them.
Agalya, a middle-class girl, wins a car in a raffle draw. When multiple parties compete for its ownership, how far will she go to retain it?
Fearless income tax officer Amay Patnaik carries out a risky raid at the mansion of the most powerful man in Lucknow. Inspired by real-life events.
Orphans Surya and Vidya are forced to beg for a living. When Vidya goes into an orphanage, Surya severs ties with her. Will Surya, now a cop, find his sister?
Celebrate Disney+ Day with The Simpsons and their friends from across the service.
In the crime-infested Khansaar, Prince Varadha sets to ascend the throne. But a coup d'état is planned! And there’s only one man to help reclaim power: Deva.
Jagan and Jamuna meet in a shopping mall at Chennai and fall in love. But she believes in fate and decides to test him. What will the results of this test be?
Set in the ancient Indus Valley civilization, a poor farmer leads an uprising against the tyrannical leaders of the city of Mohenjo Daro.
Former Marine Jake Sully is deployed as an Avatar on a mission to Pandora but, he ultimately finds himself torn between two worlds.
Bijlee, a rich industrialist's daughter, decides to marry a politico's son, leaving her dad's Man Friday, Matru, heartbroken. What happens when she finds out?
Hallie and Annie are separated after their parents' divorce. Years later, they meet at a summer camp and decide to switch places to reunite their parents.
A mysterious bomb blast occurs in one of the factories in Bhatinda. While investigating the matter, an NIA officer stumbles upon a deadly conspiracy.
Govindan and Soorya meet at a suicide point. Dejected, both have come to end their lives. However, they decide to help each other to resolve their issues.
Every smell tells a tale! Bride-to-be Veena, HIV-diagnosed Sarang, and a countryside woman Janaki strive to forge their paths amidst life-changing situations.
Sri Danamma Devi is worshipped as a very powerful goddess with the power to fulfil the wishes of her devotees.
Betrothed to different people, Aditya and Jia meet by chance and fall in love. Will they sacrifice their happiness for prior commitments?
Aswathi goes to Saudi Arabia as a housemaid. Exposed to the grave realities of being a migrant worker and unable to deal with the torture, she decides to flee.
To save Danville, Phineas and Ferb team up with the Marvel Superheroes who have lost their powers thanks to Dr. Doofenshmirtz.
Mallikarjuna's incorrect decision leads to the death of his servant's son. When accused, a guilty Mallikarjuna sends away his son to the distraught mother.
A comedy of errors ensues when Anbu falls for his British colleague Jessica. Cultural differences aside, there is a lot more to settle for this couple to unite.
A paraplegic woman returns home to find her estranged father dead, her family disbelieving her and questioning her sanity. Which version of the truth is real?
John Chau, an American missionary is killed as he attempts to contact an Indigenous group, living in complete isolation, off the coast of India.
When Nemo, a young clownfish, is unexpectedly carried far from home, his father and Dory embark on a journey to find Nemo.
Aasif's belief in logic and science shatters when he gets possessed by a ghost. What starts as a comical journey soon unearths a dark secret.
A local goon takes care of orphans and strives to give them a good education. But, when his rivals create problems, he is forced to bring out his violent side.
To help a child in trouble, Lord Hanuman takes the avatar of a human being. However, when the evil asuras attack earth, he has to disclose his true identity.
A modern retelling of the eternal 'good versus evil' conflict, when an honest police officer investigates an intelligent but unscrupulous businessman.
Mater is the world champion monster truck wrestler. When faced with his biggest opponent yet, he tags in his tag-team partner, Frightening McMean.
It is love at first sight for Vivek when he sees Vasu at a wedding. Although her father, an upright police inspector, accepts the alliance, there is a hitch.
Sidlingu's passion for cars takes him to Srirangapatna, where he desires to purchase a vintage car. Mangala, a school teacher, helps him fulfil his dream.
When circumstances land a young Bharat in the position of the Chief Minister, he has to deal with corruption and enemies while attempting to reform politics.
Shobhana, an innocent girl, works as a maid at a men's lodge but gets raped. When she becomes pregnant, she sets out to find the culprit.
Sankaran, the son of an alcoholic musical genius, feels neglected by his father. What he doesn't realise is that his musical gift inspires love in two women.
Kannan Nair, a psychiatrist, is tasked with inspecting a mysterious hospital. However, once there, he is not prepared to experience the horrors ahead.
After marriage, Abhishek and Nandini realise that life is not a bed of roses. Problems begin when Abhishek is unable to provide for his family.
Bravehearted and equally learned twin sons of Lord Rama- Luv and Kush emerge as great warriors under the guidance of mother Sita and Guru Valmiki.
Professor Saudamini is thrust into turmoil after she decides to veer from her crumbling marriage. What follows is her journey as she grapples with her decision.
A gangster's son kidnaps the daughter of the Chief of Police, as her father has some crucial evidence. While the police chase the two, love blooms between them.

title_name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
description: Arthur's alien friend informs him of Earth's impending doom and whisks him away in a spaceship for a great adventure.
Viktor invites trouble when he revives his dead pet dog Sparky after it is hit by a car. Now, Sparky looks like a monster and terrifies Viktor's neighbours.

title_name: Tinker Bell And The Legend Of The Neverbeast
description: When an animal-fairy, Fawn, befriends a baby hawk called the NeverBeast, she is reprimanded by Queen Clarion and is determined to make things right.
Chumki’s world comes crashing down after she gets brutally raped and tortured. As the horrors of the traumatic night haunt her, she finds solace in true love.
An emotional tribute to the people who suffered the heinous attacks of 26/11 and to those who fought the terrorists to save the city but lost their lives.
Young actor Anandan meets the fiery Tamizhselvan, who writes successful dialogues for him. But things change when they become political rivals.
The film shows ISRO ambitious vision for India's future space missions.
Jeeva is a social activist who fights against corruption but loses his family and ends up in a mental asylum. But that won't stop him from seeking revenge.
Three misfits find their lives intertwined with desi millionaire Radheshyam Tiwari in a case of mistaken identities that ignites a comedy of errors.
A workplace tragedy has Rangan, a power loom worker, crossing paths with a communist, Sivalingam, and makes him rethink his role in society.
A film producer gets killed by his colleagues. Then, his son decides to take revenge.
When a group of students find out about their dance teacher's illness, they become determined to win a prestigious competition. What follows is a fierce battle!
Elderly couple Raj and Priya wish for their children to take care of them. But what they got in return was a lot of pain.
On learning that the police department and the village is under the control of a local don, Inspector Vijay Surya goes undercover to trap him and his gang.
Photographer Akshay fails to express his love for Nandini. By the time he musters enough courage to approach her, Nandini gets trapped in a nefarious plot.
A brave rickshaw driver, Ganga, lives life on her own terms. However, an altercation with a corrupt politician turns her world upside down.
Abhishek is an affluent businessman who has no time for women and love. However, things change when Aishwarya walks into his life.
In dire need of cash, Naresh accepts a challenge and enters a haunted house to get rid of the ghost. Trouble starts when the ghost insists on marrying him.
Anand and Jasmine have been friends since childhood. They see their friendship as the purest form of love. But things change when he marries someone else.
In this expedition on Mount Everest, dozens of scientists converge to investigate what secrets the world's highest peak has to tell us about our changing climate.
When Padmanabhan is appointed mayor of the city, he works to solve the problems of the common man and fight corruption. A journalist helps him in his crusade.
When a 10-year-old girl goes missing, her stepfather races against time to investigate the kidnapping. Can he find her before it's too late?
Satyam, the owner of Janatha Garage, is known as the saviour of the neighbourhood. His life changes when he meets Anand, and they join hands for a noble cause.
To win back his childhood sweetheart, Bhaiyyaji, a tailor-turned-kidnapper decides to give up his criminal ways. Will he succeed?
A game show-obsessed young woman and her estranged, train-wreck of a sister must work together to help cover their mother’s gambling debts.
Two neighbouring colleges are always at loggerheads. When one college begins practising Satanism, things take an ugly turn.

Andarikante Monagadu is a Telugu drama about misunderstandings and mistaken identities. It's a film that's loosely based on Amitabh Bachchan's Satte Pe Satta. Watch Andarikante Monagadu , the full movie online, now streaming on Hotstar.
A black magician enslaves a spirit but soon, a young boy and girl release the spirit by accident, who befriends them.
On learning that the company he is employed at is selling adulterated food products, good Samaritan Arivu sets out to fight the unethical practices.
Popstar Merlin gets stalked by an eccentric fan. Officer Babu Mohan finds out the reason behind his obsession is a traumatic past and Merlin's song.
Thoma is a villager who wishes to get his daughter married into a wealthy family. Will he be able to fulfil his dream?
Josy is an unemployed, irresponsible young guy. His life changes when his beloved mother dies in a fatal accident and his long-lost father returns home.
A poor old folk artiste's house is in danger because of a tree. However, government authorities refuse to cut it.
Keshava loves Madhavi, and Madhava loves Keshava's sister, Vaishnavi. However, Keshava is terrified to inform his parents about it.
Ankita loves Abhi, but he falls for her friend, Shalini, and wants her to quit modelling. This leads to friction between them, and Abhi seeks Ankita's help.
A young boy chases his dream across continents as he pursues a professional ballet career.
Bapputty decides to rebuild his life after his release from prison. However, he gets entangled in his sister's family problems.
Dani Ramos joins forces with Grace, a futuristic soldier, and Sarah Connor to fight against a highly advanced Terminator, a Rev-9.

title_name: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
description: Cindy and Jim, a childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.
Taken for a terrorist, Ajay gets jailed and is bailed out by his mother. Later, Ajay decides to prove his innocence and begins his hunt for the real culprits.
An alcoholic American filmmaker decides to produce a Bollywood movie. Chaos ensues when the differences between the two industries unfolds before him.
A Hindu boy is friends with a Muslim girl. However, with vested interests working against them to gain political mileage, their friendship is misconstrued.
Set against a campus backdrop, the plot revolves around the journey of Paul and Subhash, and a gritty tale of rivalry between their political parties.
Following the economic collapse of a town in rural Nevada, Fern sets off on the road exploring a life outside of conventional society as a modern-day nomad.
Sikandar is an orphaned Kashmiri teenager. Passionate about football, his life changes drastically when he finds a gun, leading him on to a path of destruction.
Ant-Man and The Wasp, together with their families, explore the Quantum Realm and embark on an adventure that pushes them beyond what they thought possible.
Belle is taken prisoner by a beast in his castle. Despite her fears, she looks beyond the Beast's hideous exterior to realize the soul of the true Prince within.

title_name: Maggie Simpson in ‘The Force Awakens From Its Nap’
description: In a daycare far, far away… but still in Springfield, Maggie is on an epic quest for her stolen pacifier.
A clash over a shared space transforms two men from diverse backgrounds into aggressors. Will ego triumph, or can shared intentions lead to resolution?
Sandhya, Ranjeet and Ramu's lives get intertwined after Ranjeet kidnaps Sandhya's father, who is a scientist. How will Ramu and Sandhya rescue her father?
On the trail of a missing girl, an ex-cop comes across a secretive group attempting to summon a terrifying supernatural entity.
When Dr Rajendran gets appointed in a village hospital, he learns that the authorities there are up to no good. Thus begins his fight for justice.
Poles apart in nature, Adhitya and Ganga decide to sabotage their wedding for personal reasons. But, what happens when they fall in love?
Going against the wishes of their families, Karthik and Shakthi tie the knot. Problems arise when the couple face the realities of marriage.
Shahjahan is neck-deep in debt as his business ventures fail. Finally, he and his friend decide to mint money by making an adult movie. Will it work?
Dharmadurai, an alcoholic, meets his college friend Suhasini who gets him back on his feet. But when his dreaded past returns, his old wounds surface.
London-based Aryan is in a live-in relationship with Anaya. Hell breaks loose when his uncle and his wife land up at their house uninvited.
Roby moves to the US to make money. He works in a casino and helps the needy. However, he has mental problems.
Eraviraman Pillai is rich and greedy. When he learns about a hidden treasure buried by his ancestors, he tries to get his hands on it.
A young man falls for an older woman. Their passionate, forbidden romance may have dire consequences for the couple.
Kaala unites the people of Dharavi against a politician, who tries to evict the residents. When the fight becomes personal, how will Kaala survive it?
In college, Kalpana falls for Babu, but he does not reciprocate. Later, she gets married to someone else. Things take a turn when he re-enters her life.
Childhood sweethearts Avinash and Priya part ways because of her father's transferable job. However, serendipity plays cupid in mysterious ways.
A scary journey begins when a small-time thief, Rudra, enters a haunted castle and gets pulled into the mystery of its mistress - Annabelle Sethupathi.
Famous magician Bobo is troubled by a vicious spirit from his past. As his hallucinations increase, he discovers the spirit has crawled into his present.

title_name: Honey, I Blew Up The Kid
description: Wayne Szalinski mistakenly zaps his son with a particle beam, making the child grow in size whenever he comes in contact with electricity!
Krishnanunni tries to resolve the issues at Puthezhathu Tharavadu with their rival neighbours. What happens when he falls for Sreebala from the opposite party?
Jeeva's mother wants her son to become a doctor after his father dies of a heart ailment. Trouble starts when he falls for Nandini, and she gets kidnapped.
Unnikrishnan falls for his colleague Sarojini but fails to express his feelings to her. On returning from his village, he is shocked to learn about her.

title_name: Johny Mera Naam Preethi Mera Kaam
description: When Priya, an NRI, comes to visit her grandfather, Johny, a small-time businessman, falls for her and tries to impress her. But her heart is elsewhere.

title_name: War for the Planet of the Apes
description: After the war with humans, apes suffer unimaginable losses. Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts to begin a quest to avenge his kind.
When their land is threatened by the evil forces of Lankasoor, Ghatotkach and his friends come to the forefront and face the challenges with valour.
Monayi's visit to the city to meet his cousin takes a hilarious shape when he accidentally takes his place at the marriage registrar's office, creating chaos.
Shiv and Tara meet while nursing their respective comatose spouses. In this waiting period of love, care and patience, the two develop a unique bond.
"The Rescue" chronicles the against-all-odds story of the daring rescue of twelve boys and their coach from deep inside a flooded cave in Thailand.
Three unemployed men get a kidnapper's call. In a comic turn of events, they hatch a plan to claim the ransom money for themselves.
James Cameron’s approach to performance capture has the cast performing in a volume rigged with infrared cameras and head rig cameras.
Divakaran is an insensitive man. A miser, he is saving up to buy a lorry. However, one day, he finds himself robbed of all his money. What will he do?
Apputtan is a rich man, who helps the villagers. He supports a girl financially to become a doctor. However, when he proposes marriage, her response shocks him.
Pratap Ravi, a killer bandit, embarks on a political journey to avenge the deaths in his family. Will he succeed or get caught in the whirlpool of chaos?
Vikas and Aarti are happily married. Late one night, Vikas is assaulted and Aarti is gang-raped. Can they make their marriage work in the wake of the tragedy?
An aspiring young athlete, Raja Ram, falls in love with a burkha-clad Nazeera. Will their love story see a happy ending, or will they have to part ways?
Siddharth and Trisha's happy married life takes a hit when they discover they are pregnant. Parenthood or splitsville - what is the way for them?
A don is assigned the task of transporting a counterfeit DVD of an upcoming movie through the airport. What follows next is a hilarious turn of events.
Ashok comes to Mysore in search of an ideal girl for marriage and gets smitten by Anjali. However, she has to fulfil a promise made to her father.
While on election duty in Kannur, a veterinary doctor meets and falls for the daughter of a Communist leader. But she is scared of her strict father.
Major Ajay Krishna journeys to Kurnool for a covert mission. Soon he finds himself at the centre of a scam involving a corrupt MLA and a fishy suicide
The vacation friends reunite at a resort, but it soon turns into a wild adventure.

title_name: Garfield: A Tail Of Two Kitties
description: Jon and Garfield visit the United Kingdom, where a case of mistaken cat identity finds Garfield ruling over a castle.
When IAS officer Madhuravel gets framed for a murder, he goes on an undercover mission to vindicate himself and pin down KTR, a notorious don.
George goes to Las Vegas, where he has to help out his brother. Meanwhile, his mother-in-law is plotting to take away everything close to his heart.
Notorious for carrying out illegal activities in lieu of a local politician, a corrupt cop gets a taste of his own medicine when a dear one becomes a victim.

title_name: Sea of Hope: America's Underwater Treasures
description: Sylvia Earle, Brian Skerry, and Max Kennedy go on a year-long quest to use science and photography to inspire President Obama to establish Blue Parks.
An orphan, Chellamma, is raised by her late mother's friend, Valli Akka. Her life takes an unfortunate turn when a pump operator comes to the village.
Vijayan attends the funeral of Varghese, one of his employees. There, he finds out that Varghese's wife is his ex-flame. What will he do next?
Celebrate the remarkable comeback of tigers and the local heroes fighting to protect them.
A simpleton unknowingly gets involved in the struggle of peasants against a cruel village landlord. Will he wriggle out of this or fight for them instead?
When Carl agrees to go on a date, Dug offers tried-and-true tips for making friends—if you’re a dog.
Can you choose between friendship and love? Best buddies Vasu and Saravanan go through a similar dilemma when they meet the love of their life.
At the cusp of adolescence, notorious Bokya Satbande embarks on many adventures. Amid the hijinks, he ends up teaching his friends the true meaning of life.
Aravindan's family leaves for his wedding in Kochi by bus called Kudumbasree Travels. With his uncle creating obstacles, will they make it in time for marriage?
The quiet life of Veerathayi is upended when her grandchild Sembi gets assaulted. Enraged, she races against the time and takes an extreme step to seek justice.
Sisters Durga and Shanti are wronged by their uncle, Rao, and decide to seek revenge. But how far will Durga go to destroy her uncle?
Eesho and Anna's families are close-knit friends. Their parents want them married, but both skillfully avoid it. What are they hiding?
Avinash manages a heist with his friend Ali, and they run away with the loot. But soon they turn rivals when Nandhini enters their life. Who win will her over?
When a stingy father refuses to spend on his son's surgery for a cleft lip, he decides to teach him a lesson by depicting him as a generous person in town.
Eswaran aka Chithha's world crumbles when his beloved niece goes missing. Will this emotional pursuit test the limits of love?
When Arjun gets an assignment to rebuild a mansion, he realises that it is haunted after his wife gets possessed. How will he save his wife from the spirit?
Vijayan and Ajayan are poets and brothers whose solidarity is shaken when a woman enters their life.
Vijayan's life takes a turn with the arrival of a mysterious woman, Thulasi, and her repeated appearances begin to cause tensions with his family.
Premachandran, a stage artist, is paid in advance to dig a well in a village with water shortage. Soon he finds that whoever tried to dig a well there has died.
Good-for-nothing Uttam falls in love with scholar Suchitra. However, to win her, he must prove his worth to Suchitra's father.

title_name: Happier Than Ever: A Love Letter to Los Angeles
description: Billie Eilish makes her Disney+ debut with "Happier Than Ever: A Love Letter to Los Angeles."
Kannan's arrival at Radhu's wedding disrupts the rituals. Later, when he falls for Radhu, to win her, he has to face her gangster father.
A chance meeting brings a diffident Mohan and Anu together. When his snoring wreaks havoc on their marital life, can the couple find a solution?
Vijay and Surya become rivals after a separation in the family. However, when their niece is kidnapped, will they set aside their feud and join hands?
To help a child in trouble, Lord Hanuman takes the avatar of a human being. However, when the evil Asuras attack earth, he has to disclose his true identity.
GRAMMY® Award-winning and chart-topping artist Billie Eilish invites Lisa to her studio for a special jam session she’ll never forget.
Vasa is a protégé of Chandrappa, an underworld don. However, things take a turn for the worse when Vasundhara, Chandrappa's daughter, falls in love with Vasa.
Rangappa, who is on his death bed, wants to meet his relatives one last time. Everyone comes to pay their last respects but with an eye on his property.
Seven crooks in old Delhi earn their living by coning people. When they set out for a big heist in a old palace, things take a hilarious turn for the worst.
Can Oswald's lucky rabbit's foot save him from his trolley troubles?
To save her stable, Kelly bonds with wild horse Flicka, and wants to train her for her team's competition.
The film is about two strangers who happen to come into each other's lives and circumstances make them to join in the fight to save the people of Maranchara.
Self-made man Dhruv and social media star Anya fall in love and decide to marry. Just one problem - he's an orphan. The only solution - make a fake family.
13-year-old Veena visits her grandparents in Ooty with her father for her mother's death anniversary. There she unearths the love story of her parents.
Despite being raised by hardened criminals, Vikram, aka Sulthan, hates violence and decides to transform them into law-abiding citizens. But will they agree?
When a young woman realizes her brother is about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school, she sets out to expose the fiancée's true colors.
Raj and Geetha pretend to like each other for their professional motives. But proximity can do strange things to pretention.
Prabhas awaits the return of his childhood sweetheart and rejects other proposals. One such rejection lands him in trouble with a gangster's daughter.
As Viswa tries to woo Rhea, the daughter of a business magnate, he finds out that the man her father wants her to marry is out to kill her. Can he rescue her?
An undercover officer fights crime in the guise of a priest. Things take a turn when he falls in love with the daughter of a corrupt minister.
Sivasankaran Nair decides to solve his financial problems by turning in a gang of smugglers and claiming the reward money. However, his plan goes awry.
During his research on historical artefacts, Rajan meets Devaki, who is married to a drunkard. Sharing an interest in history and poetry, they become close.
A politician and his secretary, who are childhood friends, have a strong bond. However, this friendship is put to test when their professional lives clash.
Dr Sandeep Menon develops a unique friendship with Devan, who is on his deathbed and tries to make his last days happy.
An archaeologist, a security guard and a devotee's lives get entangled after one of them finds a secret treasure map. What will they discover on this trip?
Bobby, a small-time detective in Hyderabad, gets a breakthrough when a rich man hires her. Unaware of his real intentions, Bobby sets out on a risky path.
Gowtham decides to reunite his grandfather with his estranged daughter. However, the path to complete his mission is not easy.
Keshavanunni starts a movie theatre in his village. He is assisted by Thankachen, a bar owner. His life changes for the better when he falls for Mallika.
A quartet of graveyard skeletons come out to play and dance the night away.

title_name: Forky Asks A Question: What is Art?
description: Mr. Pricklepants mentors Forky about the complexities of being an actor and the art of a convincing performance.
Madhumati is a scholar researching snakes. Her professor tells her about centuries-old Naga Sastram, written by priests, and she sets out on a mission.
An adventure about Lady, a pampered cocker spaniel, and Tramp, a roguish mutt, with whom she learns what it means to be footloose and leash-free.
Raj's world is his special needs brother, Rahul. His married life suffers when Madhuri suggests to admit Rahul in a special school. Whom will Raj choose?
Hell hath no fury like a woman wronged! After witnessing her lover die, Sonika goes on a killing spree to avenge him.
Shekhar and Jui decide to go on a holiday before he leaves for France. What starts off as a goodbye trip soon ends as a life-altering holiday for the couple.
A first-of-its-kind for her village, Babli takes up a bouncer's job to win over her love, leading to a series of funny and heart-warming events.
Three terrifying tales tell of artifacts and iconic villains from across all eras of Star Wars.
Ram, a tour guide in Hampi, befriends a foreign tourist. They get into a relationship. When Diana becomes pregnant, his mother objects to the alliance.
Frustrated with dating apps, Noa meets the alluring Steve at a grocery store. However, while on a weekend getaway, she learns that he has some unusual appetites.
Franco runs a motor garage. Though tough on the outside, his sister is his only weakness. What happens when Franco falls in love?
Taking his one shot at true love, Jass wants to marry Meet. But his father’s rejection makes him hatch a madhouse plan that sparks a desi comedy-of-errors.
Naganna's happy life is shattered when his wife dies. Forced by his relatives, he marries again. But happiness is far off when the new wife enters the picture.
Duraisingam goes undercover to find out about the illegal activities in Kakinada. However, things get intense as he encounters an international criminal, Danny.
Priti is pursued by Ankur and Shiva. Things take a hilarious turn when the two try to outsmart each other to win her heart, but Priti has a surprise for them.
Sridevi and Shiny are best friends. They lead a happy married life with their husbands. However, problems start when their spouses suspect them of infidelity.
In this period piece revolving around the lives of the silk weavers in Kanchivaram, master weaver Vengadam rises against his exploitative masters.
Subhash and Shekhar set out to get their father the mark of respect he deserved. Can the two determined brothers get their late father a 21-gun salute?
A struggling lawyer comes across a hit-and-run case and decides to fight for justice. However, he soon learns that there is more to it than meets the eye.
AA is a Kannada action drama starring Sudhi and Divya Sridhar, directed by M Mahesh Kumar. Watch the full movie, AA, online, only on Hotstar.
Sathi Babu promises his girlfriend to give up his life of crime but ends up stealing a trunk full of money. However, something unexpected awaits in the trunk.
Asha, a sharp-witted idealist, makes a powerful wish that’s answered by Star, a ball of boundless energy.
After losing all his wealth to alcohol, Haranath marries a stage dancer, Vanisri. But what happens when suspicion creeps into their relationship?

title_name: Far From Home: The Adventures Of Yellow Dog
description: Washed ashore in the wilderness of the Pacific Northwest after a storm, Angus McCormick has only his wiles and a trusted canine friend with which to survive.
Why was Elsa born with magical powers? Together with Anna, Kristoff, Olaf, and Sven, she sets out on a dangerous but remarkable journey to find the answer.
PM Modi and ISRO scientists celebrate the landmark success of Managlyaan's entry into the orbit of Mars.

title_name: The Hunchback Of Notre Dame II
description: Quasi falls in love with a magician's assistant while attempting to foil that same magician's plan to steal his bells.
Madame Bonfamille wills her entire estate to her cats but, her faithful butler Edgar decides to eliminate the feline heirs to enjoy Madame's riches.
Much-in-love Satya loses Deepthi to Veeru, who is a dreaded don. However, he cheats the Grim Reaper to avenge her death.
A handsome and easy-going Shiva finds himself falling for Priya, a don's sister. Unaware of the risks, he pursues her which lands him in a difficult situation.
Mathukkutty goes to Kerala to invite film stars for an event in Germany. Happy to be away from home and keen to visit his village, his dreams soon get shattered.
Mei Lee, a confident, dorky 13-year-old, tries to balance friends, family, the chaos of adolescence and an uncontrollable ability to poof into a giant red panda.
A city boy falls in love with a village belle. However, he soon realises that he has a lot to do apart from winning her heart.
This Andrei Severny film follows Michelin Star Chef Vikas Khanna on his journey filled with passion, willpower, and resolve as an immigrant.
Karan is instantly smitten with Pooja. Painfully shy, he can't express his feelings to her, but fate makes them meet repeatedly. Can he ever profess his love?
When ACP Harris fails to investigate the recent surge of ATM robberies, Menon, the MD of IBI Bank, hires Felix, a detective, to solve the case.
Anita and Roger have to rescue the puppies of their dalmatians from Cruella De Vil, who wants to make an extravagant fur coat from the puppies.
To stop his impending marriage with Priyanka, Sagar lies to his family that he loves Kajal. What happens when Sonu, a don, comes looking for Kajal?
Sulbatai visits her son in the USA but struggles to adapt to new surroundings. Finding herself under scrutiny by her loved ones, will she make amends with life?
Gautam promises to reconcile his aunt and her father. His cousins, however, display unusual animosity. Now, Gautam has to use every trick to win them over.
Constable Achuthan Nair wants to make his son, Sethu Madhavan, a police inspector. However, Sethu's attempt to save his father from trouble lands him in a soup.
A simple cable operator hatches an elaborate plan to protect his family from the law when they get involved in a murder case.
Manny and Ellie are forced to deal with the tribulations of their teenage daughter Peaches and Sid's family returns, only to drop off the elderly Granny.
Steve Rogers teams up with Natasha Romanoff, aka Black Widow, to battle a powerful yet shadowy enemy in present-day Washington, D.C.
Milo Thatch dreams of completing the quest of finding the legendary city of Atlantis as he leads a group of daredevil explorers to the elusive undersea kingdom.
Youth wing leader Krishna Kumar wants to make it big in politics by hook or crook. He is asked to donate blood, a rare group, and this changes his life forever.
A traumatised Vidya seeks revenge after her teenage daughter is gang-raped and murdered. She sets out to punish the perpetrators and get justice for her child.

title_name: High School Musical: The Musical: The Series: The Special
description: The special explores the impact of the original High School Musical movies. And, teaches a new song and dance numbers by the stars of the show!
A gravedigger, Iriya, can foresee the future. However, he begins to doubt his abilities when his predictions turn out to be wrong.
On a mission to expose an underworld kingpin, a journalist finds himself trapped in the dark web of corrupt politicos and underworld goons.
Running against the clock, IAF Squadron Leader Vijay Karnik created history with determination and his love for the country. A daredevil story of guts and glory.
Desperate to get a job, Mathew, a Christian, poses as a Brahmin to work at an eatery. Is he ready to face the consequences?
Madhavan toils hard in the Middle East. To make matters worse, a girl stages her kidnapping and involves him in the mess.
School dropout Apoorvan loves to try out amazing scientific discoveries. During one such attempt, he and his friends find themselves in a tricky situation.
Gonzo is challenged to spend Halloween night in the scariest place on Earth — the Haunted Mansion.
Ramu falls in love with Aishwarya, his classmate, but she rejects him. However, what happens when Aishwarya's parents die in an accident?
Ayushi Singh, an aspiring tennis player is trained by her father. When old school ideologies clash with a new mind, it shakes the father-daughter bond.
Munna and Charan are motocross racers and arch enemies. When Munna falls in love with Varalakshmi, little does he know that she is Charan’s sister. Will this love story have a happily ever after?
Don't believe in love at first sight? Vijay and Geetha's hilarious love story will reinstate your faith in romance.
RAW hires a convict to deal with a high-profile mafia don. When a journalist chasing the don goes missing, clues point at the convict. What's the connection?
Thomas Kutty buys a haunted house and goes to stay there with his friends. What happens when they encounter the ghost of a lady who was killed 70 years ago?
When Savitha suspects her husband, Mohan, he calls her ignorant of workplace challenges. So, she decides to take up a job but is in for an unpleasant surprise.
Based on a play by Jayant Pawar named Maza Ghar, Vibha strives to make her place in the society after being wrongly rejected by her husband.
Karan conspires with his girlfriend Priya to usurp the vast estate of Raj, a wealthy industrialist. Chaos ensues when Priya falls in love with Raj.
Badi is a Kannada drama about the issue of dowry. Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.
Innocent Jeeva gets lured into the underworld. Eventually, he gets caught in the battle between Patas Reddy and Gidda.
Arumugam arrives in the city to find a solution for water pollution in his village. But, circumstances force him to fight the corrupt men and a lady don.
A studious Hari falls in love with his classmate Hema, who is rich and already engaged to someone else. What challenges will the two face now?
Arun and Sandhya begin their happily ever after in a new home. Their happiness is short-lived as Arun discovers that Sandhya is possessed. Is she?
Johnny Balraj grows desperate to make it big in Bombay and woo Rosie. In his attempts, he unknowingly gets sucked into a void of deception and greed.
Mythili loves Madhava. Later, she learns that Madhava is suffering from lung cancer. How will she cope with this tragic news?
A loving couple's joy is short-lived when they feel the presence of an unknown spirit in their life. Their adventure begins when they decide to fight back.
Legends say that the ancestral mansion of Durgeshgor holds one of the greatest treasures of Bengal. Can Sona Da, Abir and Jhinuk unearth the lost treasure?
The dreams of an aspiring cricketer come crashing down when he is engulfed in a false Naxal case and turns to a life of crime, gaining the name of Railway Raju.

title_name: Maggie Simpson in “Rogue Not Quite One”
description: Maggie Simpson takes a hyperspace-hopping adventure across the galaxy.

title_name: Snow White And The Seven Dwarfs
description: Snow White, a princess, runs away from an evil queen who wants to kill her but she meets the seven dwarfs who not only rescue her but also become her friends.
A nine-year-old Amudha goes on a long and lonely search in the war-ridden zones of Sri Lanka to find her estranged biological mother. Will they reunite?
A small-town girl is on the run from goons after she witnesses the murder of a politician. She runs into Abhiram, a mafia leader, and ends up falling for him.
To make a quick buck, Rajesh joins Shankar in his illegal blood bank business. What happens when the law catches up with the young lad and his mentor?
When 50 million bucks are at stake, six eccentric people will do whatever it takes, including braving the wild. Who will win this race against time?
When an opportunity to play for the English cricket team knocks at his door, Gattu must choose between fulfilling his long-lost dream and his father’s wishes.
When righteous and compassionate Lalithamma opposes Rayudu's atrocities, he attempts to kill her and destroy her life. How will she fight him?
A chance encounter and Preetham falls for Nandini. On learning that she is engaged, he decides to stay away. However, Nandini challenges him to win her heart.
Through the lens of CEO Bob Iger, discover the fascinating and inspiring personal stories of 10 incredible people behind the enduring magic of Disney.
Benjamin Mee buys a dilapidated zoo thanks to his daughter's wishes, and together they take on the challenge of repairing and reopening the zoo.
Raya, a fallen princess, must track down the legendary last dragon to stop the evil forces that have returned and threaten her world.
An income tax officer becomes a protector of the weak. He chances upon few letters written by the poor to God asking for help. How will become their saviour?
A classic fairy tale about the digit-sized heroine evading the clutches of various toads, moles, and beetles to unite with her lover, Prince Cornelius.
Sathi sends her daughter to find her father, who has abandoned them. However, things take a turn for the worse when Viji discovers that he has another family.
The film looks at the pre-independence scenario of the Indian political system when communism developed in the country.
A mentally impaired woman finds a place in the heart of a tribal man. Will their unusual love story survive?
An old man works as a department store Santa Claus is labelled as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.
Brought up by foster parents, Nanda feels shattered when he learns that his mother had abandoned him at birth because of a godman's prediction.
An honest officer, Siddhant Suri is at a moral crossroad when a corrupt revenge seeking politician hires him as a bodyguard.
The film follows Olaf’s first steps as he comes to life and searches for his identity in the mountains outside Arendelle.
Anjooran's hatred towards women forces his sons to stay bachelors. All hell breaks loose when his youngest son falls for the granddaughter of his arch-enemy.
When Finn’s vacation with his friends goes awry, Force spirits Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker and Princess Leia, share their unexpected vacation tales.
Contract killer Tennu falls in love with Madhu. In his attempt to win her, he takes on an underworld don and her father, and elopes with her.
T'Challa, heir to the hidden kingdom of Wakanda, must lead his people into a new future and confront a challenger from his country's past.
Prasad, a mechanic, and his friend Freddy set out to save a girl whose extended family is trying to steal her wealth.
The powerful, but arrogant god Thor, is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.
A terrifying supernatural entity preys on two sisters reeling from their mother’s death.

title_name: The Lion King II: Simba's Pride Sing-Along
description: Sing along with your favourite songs from “The Lion King II: Simba's Pride” with on-screen lyrics.
Kannan, a deaf and mute boy is loved by everyone. Vivek is a reigning comedian and Kannan’s idol. When they meet, what starts is an emotional roller coaster.
A train accident affects the lives of two newlywed couples. They get separated, thus leading to chaos and confusion.
Vicky is an insomniac who agrees to try an experimental pill. Soon events in his dreams turn into reality. But what happens when it all begins to blur?
Postman Ramu gives shelter to a girl who has escaped from the Naxalites. However, problems arise when his fianc�e's parents suspect him to be a Naxalite too.
The movie is a tale of determination of the kings of the African savanna featuring a lion, lioness and a brave cheetah.
Follow the on-screen lyrics and sing along to your favourite songs in "Hamilton."
When malicious gangster Karali closes in on a legendary treasure, Kumar and Bimal set out to stop him whilst recovering the long-lost legacy. Will they succeed?
A visually impaired chef, Srishaila's life takes a turn for the worse when the girl he loves, traps him in a murder case.
After a bullying incident, Dilsher grows up with a speech impairment. Although he loves music, he is not able to conquer the demons in his head.
To marry the love of his life Sonia, a hot-tempered Ajay accepts the challenge put forth by her father. Can Ajay conquer his anger for love?
Singer-songwriter Olivia Rodrigo takes a familiar road trip from Salt Lake City, where she began writing her debut album “SOUR,” to Los Angeles.
Renowned poet Chandradas meets his estranged daughter, Harita. He manages to win custody and take her to his ancestral home. But she misses her old life.
Based on the true story of India's finest scientists who rose above hardships and failures to make us the only country to reach Mars in its first attempt.
Under the British Raj, two revolutionaries with personal agendas forge a friendship, only to find each other on opposing sides.
Haunting hallucinations of Veer's past and his strange bond with Mehak hold the key to the mysteries of his present. Will he be able to uncover the truth?
Psychiatrist Ravi Varman treats one patient at a time and in isolation. When he learns that a patient of his is getting married, he wants to see her urgently.
Fate separates childhood friends Monty and Guddi. 12 years later they reunite but a lot has changed in their lives, including the innocence of their friendship.
The life of a happy couple turns upside down when an orphan shows up at their house claiming to be the wife's illegitimate daughter.
Stitch, an alien living on Earth, discovers that his alien family is now in Hawaii, being hunted down by galactic forces.

title_name: Forky Asks A Question: What is a Computer?
description: Trixie explains to Forky what a computer does as they experience the common stresses of technology.
Karthik and Meera succumb to parental pressure and get married. However, they decide to not consummate their marriage. Will they ever fall in love?
The story delves into the lives of two college students from disparate backgrounds: an ambitionless playboy and middle-class go-getter.
Auto driver Vasoottan learns that his passenger Parvathy wants 100 goats for her father's business. He decides to help her, but it is risky.
Finding solace in magic, young man Indra keeps his problems at bay. But life takes a turn when he meets Kirti, and their connection unveils a past life story.
Atari sets off to Trash Island in search of his bodyguard-dog, Spots. He begins an epic journey that will decide the fate of the Megasaki Prefecture.
Two painters, who assigned a job to paint a house before an upcoming marriage, end up resolving the problems that the family is facing.
Burdened with poverty, two friends do their best to support their families and get their sisters married. Will they be able to have a good life for themselves?
Tarzan, a human boy raised by the gorillas, is forced to choose between a civilized life with his ladylove Jane and the life he loves with his gorilla family.
On a letter-delivering task, Afreen learns of a 20-year-old romance set amidst a war. Her quest to trace the lovers makes her embrace humanity beyond borders.
Eleven friends get together for a bachelor party, but the celebrations go awry because of a phone call and a death. A drunk cop steps in to unravel the mystery.

title_name: Percy Jackson & The Olympians: The Lightning Thief
description: Zeus accuses Poseidon's demigod son, Percy Jackson, of the theft and threatens to wage war if his master bolt isn't retrieved within two weeks.
Rajakrishnan and Mridula's happily married life comes to a standstill when his uncle plots to separate them. Will he succeed?
In this comedy based on a true story, a losing soccer team sets out to win.
When the daughter of a real estate tycoon is kidnapped, her family desperately tries to track her whereabouts; while unravelling long buried family secrets.
Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, but her dream comes true with some help from her Fairy Godmother and her friends.
Raja and Madhu must fight for their love against her brothers. Can they win over hate with their love? - ok
Oscar Award nominee for Best Documentary, this is the love story of scientists who died as explosively as they lived, filming visuals of their passion, volcanoes.
Deepu's brother gets killed, and his lover, Ragini, commits suicide. But when his fiancé is Ragini's sister, there is more to the deaths than it appears.
Raja and his rich father, Shanmugham, live in Hong Kong, estranged from their extended family. A crisis causes them to return to India, and old ties get renewed.
Kalyan leads a happy life with his wife and child. However, things change when his wife comes home with a blast from his past.
A chance meeting with a young couple has TV anchor Ajith believing that there's more than meets the eye. While trying to solve the truth, he falls for the wife.
Suffering from tunnel vision, Ravi witnesses a murder. On realising that he can't afford to cure his impending blindness, he resorts to illegal solutions.
A hearing-impaired villager and his foreign-returned brother end up in a political mess after they fight against the tyrannical rule of the local landlord.
Two kids hear about a mythical lotus pond in the Himalayas and set out to find it. They come across a number of obstacles and problems during their journey.

title_name: Tinker Bell And The Lost Treasure
description: Tinker Bell journey far North of Never Land to patch things up with her friend Terence and restore a Pixie Dust Tree
Taxi driver Raju's life turns upside down when a seemingly regular customer comes with a hidden agenda. Now Raju needs to unravel the mess.
A satire that follows the lives of six youngsters, who share one common aspiration - to be the face of 'New India' and meet President Bush.
Robert Benchley learns about the animation process at Walt Disney Studios while trying to pitch Walt Disney the idea of making a cartoon about a shy dragon.
Chaos and misunderstandings ensue when a glamorous woman enters the lives of three couples. A complete comedy of errors.
A dishonest Brigadier General and his troops threaten the government to launch dangerous VX gas-armed M55 rockets on the city of San Francisco.
In Khoyragarh, an explosion brings to light the ploy to assassinate the President of India. As special forces step in, the veils of conspiracy begin to drop.
A fashion photographer is jailed for trying to kill a model, Radha, and a doctor. Radha's husband also gets murdered. What is the motive behind these crimes?
Laal, who has a strict father, is about to be disowned by him when he commits his 100th mistake. Then he meets Nilasha, who accompanies him on an adventurous journey.
Black is a faithful servant and henchman of Tharakan Muthalali. Dr Meenakshi, who arrives in the village, is shocked to see him and begins to probe his past.
Bambi reunites with his father, who must teach him the ways of the forest. But, the proud parent discovers that there is much he can learn from his young son.
The outraged animals turn to their famous doctor friend for help, who want to protect their forest from human encroachers.
Vishwanath helps his dead friend's wife, Jeya, get a job in the police department. However, problems arise when Jeya's son falls for Vishwanath's daughter.
Dr Shekhar is happily married to Nandita. Trouble creeps in their paradise when he falls for an over-possessive Kavya, who takes over his life.
Seeing a group of children always up to mischief, their teacher complains to the parents. When the kids are punished, they decide to teach the teacher a lesson.

title_name: High School Musical: The Musical: The Holiday Special
description: The cast celebrates the holidays by sharing classic and brand new holiday music, their holiday favorite memories, and some behind the scenes secrets.
After making a film on Lonappan, an inmate of an asylum, Meera, a film-school student, decides to get him out. But will he be able to adjust to a normal life?

title_name: Star Wars: Revenge Of The Sith
description: Three years into the Clone Wars, Obi-wan and Anakin rescue Palpatine from Count Dooku. Later, Anakin falls prey to the Jedi Council and Palpatine's mind games.
A tell-all tale about the life and times of Indian cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni, mapping his journey from a ticket collector to a celebrated sportsman.
Putswamy and Soorya are lookalikes. After Soorya's beloved Priya dies, Putswamy helps blind Lakshmi with an eye transplant. But Lakshmi reminds Soorya of Priya.
A suburban teen girl and her little brother must stop a terrifying internet meme brought to life by the hysteria of their parents.
In pursuit of his lost sister, an impoverished Sathya gets embroiled in a situation that forces him to impersonate a dead multi-millionaire.
After penning his life story, a villager wants a superstar to make a film on it. Although refusing at first, the actor finally agrees to the project.
Mac, a womaniser, is dating three ladies at the same time. Chaos ensues when Shyam, once Mac’s best friend and now a sworn enemy, decides to disrupt his life.
Eleven-year-old Appu runs away from home as he feels that his mother loves his younger brother more. Will it be too late for him to realise his mistake?

title_name: The Good, The Bart, and The Loki
description: Banished from Asgard once again, Loki takes on the Simpsons and Springfield’s mightiest heroes.
Ten years after he was ousted by the selection committee, a Ranji player returns to play cricket for India. Will he succeed in fulfilling his son's wish?
Kochu hears Pappi's voice on the phone and falls in love. When the two plan to elope, they are foiled by Kochu's friend Aniyankutty, a notorious womanizer.
Dory, a blue tang fish, with short term memory loss sets out to find her parents with the help of her friends Nemo and Marin.
Batra family has just four days left to vacate their house of 34 years. Amidst the mayhem, uncertainties of the future, insecurities and secrets surface.
Purnamma is in love with Sambaiah but is forced to marry someone else. However, things get worse when her father wants to seize land that belongs to Sambaiah.
Happily married to Ganesh, Harini begins suspecting him when she knows of his meeting with his schoolmate Shreya in a hotel. Angry, she takes an extreme step.

title_name: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: When the Multiverse is unlocked, Doctor Strange must enlist help from old and new allies in order to confront a surprising adversary.
Siddharth, a leading hacker leads a happy life. However, things take a drastic turn when he becomes a victim of cyber-bullying.
Young Milo gains a deeper appreciation for his mom after Martians come to Earth to take her away. To rescue his mother, he sets off on a quest into outer space.
Goofy goes fishing with his pet grasshopper, Wilbur.
Vikram, a businessman, finds a bag of money on the Mumbai-Goa highway. Greed soon takes over and he drives off with it, only to be chased by a gang of goons.
Circumstances force Ganesha to join a gang of smugglers. His first assignment is to sneak diamonds into India. Will he succeed in carrying out this task?
Karthik, a happy-go-lucky stuntman, finds his life turned upside down when his brother uncovers a deadly truth behind a supposedly terrorist attack.
Overachiever Shruthi gets together with underachiever Karthik for a business venture. With hearts at stake, will the partnership take off or crash-land?
Chronicling the historic 1983 Cricket World Cup, thirteen underdogs led by Kapil Dev fight and win against all odds to put India on the map.

title_name: A Celebration of Music from Coco
description: A reimagined live-to-film concert experience brings to life the performances from the spectacular film Coco.
Jaffa is the unofficial leader of a bunch of jailbirds. However, when Jaffa plans an escape in a priest's coffin, he finds a rather unexpected company.
A young woman uses her navigational talents to set sail for a fabled island. Joining her on the adventure is her hero, the legendary demi-god Maui.

title_name: Cinderella III: A Twist In Time
description: Lady Tremaine turns back time to the day Cinderella tried on the glass slipper. Now, she has to restore the original timeline to foil Lady Tremaine's scheme.
A lazy and rich Preetham falls for Kushi, but she refuses to reciprocate his love. However, he challenges her that he will change her mind in just three days.
An intimate look at the extraordinary rise, fall, and redemption of televangelist of 1970s and 80s Tammy Faye Bakker.
Nathan, a renowned economics professor, finds his life turned upside down when he comes across Deepti, a housewife desperate to help her husband find a job.
Susheela abandons her children and husband, Kaimal, to start life afresh with Giri. Kaimal's friend Balan learns of this and decides to reunite them.
Aspiring actor Raja arrives in the city and agrees to take care of his friend's family in return for a break in cinema. What happens when he unmasks his friend?
When babysitter Kari McKean tries to entertain Jack-Jack Parr with some brainy baby music, she triggers an unusual reaction.
Alice returns to the wonderland and discovers that her friend the Hatter is in trouble. She must travel back in time and save him from the Red Queen.
A man resorts to technology to find a balance between his marriage and an illicit affair. Trouble ensues when his lookalike robot falls in love with his wife.
In the hidden high-security government laboratory, lonely Elisa's life changes forever after discovering a secret classified experiment.
Inspector Vijay bails out five outlaws to take down a group of deadly dacoits; will he succeed in his mission?
A communal riot in Kannur district takes a terrible toll on a Muslim father after his daughter decides to marry her Hindu lover.
Two cops face stiff opposition from a lady don in their attempts to end crime in the city. Things get worse when her son rapes and murders a woman.
During an archaeological expedition on Bouvetøya Island in Antarctica, a team of archaeologists find themselves caught up in a battle between the two legends.
Are news stories made up or investigated? Investigative journalist Guru is hired to look for answers behind a string of news that his rival newspaper carries.
When a new toy called Forky joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.
An engineer without a job, Raghuvaran slips into depression after his mother dies. However, life changes when he gets a project and falls for his neighbour.
Rodney Copperbottom dreams of making the world a better place. However, the corporate tyrant Ratchet and a group of misfits are out to ruin Rodney's happiness.
Snooty Achutankutty wants to become a bank manager. When he gets a marriage proposal from a nurse, he insults her. But that nurse doesn't forget.
Five friends travelling to Palai to deliver a package from the Gulf take cover in the darkness of a city. While facing hurdles, will they complete their task?
This campus caper revolves around a group of freshers, who instantly become friends and find love. Can their bond survive the test of time?

title_name: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
description: Alexander braves multiple calamities making him wonder if bad things only happen to his family - who all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.
Xavier loses his job after his boss learns that he lied to him and went on leave. Later, on getting to know the reason for Xavier's sabbatical, he feels guilty.
How did India get one of its favourite cricketers? Watch the life and struggles of MS Dhoni in his journey to become a respected sportsperson in this biopic.
With guidance from Lord Krishna, righteous Arjun and his brothers fight the evil army of Kauravas with valour.
Irked by his ardent devotion towards Lord Vishnu, King Hiranyakashyap wants his son to worship him instead. Prahalada refuses, and the consequences are severe.
Harriet finds art imitating life when she discovers certain songs transports her back in time.
Jagannathan shifts to Kanimangalam village where he promises to help the villagers revive the annual temple festival. But soon his past catches up to him.
It was always Ramu's goal to become a police officer. However, when his dream comes true, he realises that it is not an easy job to don the khaki uniform.
A former boy-genius inventor and a scientifically-curious teen embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place that exists in their collective memory.
Frustrated by their marriage and jobs, two henpecked husbands plan an escapade. But a lovelorn dacoit hijacks their supposedly adventurous trip.
Under the British Raj, two revolutionaries with personal agendas forge a friendship, only to find each other on opposing sides.
Gopalan and Lakshmanan are burglars with big dreams. The duo has a life-altering adventure when they kidnap a rich girl, Diana.

title_name: The French Dispatch of the Liberty, Kansas Evening Sun
description: Wes Anderson’s The French Dispatch brings to life a collection of stories from the final issue of an American magazine published in a fictional 20th-century French city.
Hungry chipmunks Chip and Dale are down to their last acorn.
A media executive finds himself falling in love with a newbie reporter. However, the corporate set-up at work affects their professional and personal lives.
After her father dies, Saraswathi finds the villagers up in arms against her. She begins to educate them and changes their minds.
Rajappan and Chandran are good friends with their share of differences. Chandran leaves a girl after getting her pregnant, and this costs him heavily in life.
Wooden boy Pinocchio embarks on fantastic adventures that test his bravery and honesty until he triumphs in his quest to become a real boy.
Circumstances force Raja Ram and Nazeera to lead separate lives in different countries. Years later, their daughters strive to reunite the estranged couple.
A scientist from 2065 sends a time machine back to 2015, programming it to return within 40 seconds. Things take a hilarious turn when it doesn't come back.
Dealing with the trials and tribulations of transgenders, Vinayan faces opposition from his family as he is a woman trapped in a man's body.
When Vijay, the most trusted aide of the slain kingpin Kali, is killed, his brother vows in fervour to avenge his murder.
An innocent man gets punished for a crime he did not commit. Enraged, he gets into bad habits and later challenges the lawmakers to punish him again.
After embracing love, Mumbai-based Gauri and ‘Punekar’ Gautam decide to get married. Navigating pre-wedding jitters, the duo embarks on a new journey.
After Bergman is thrown out of his seminary for committing a sin by Sam, he returns years later to corrupt Thomas, an orphan in Father Sam's care, as revenge.
Madhavan Ezhuthachan strived to build a school in his village. But, after his death, it gets neglected. Will Sudhakaran, the school's donor, save it?
Though married, Vishnu always flirts with other women. What happens when he gets caught red-handed with a young girl in his house?
A brave-hearted Liger works his way up to find his dream spot in the MMA world. But, his life gets complicated when he crosses paths with Taniya.
Naga is a buffalo dealer in Bellary. His stepfather, not trusting his children, wills his property to Naga, much to the fury of his family.
Based on V.P. Kale's novel Badali, a kind-hearted Madhav gives shelter to a family of ghosts who in turn help him overcome his hurdles.
When a series of mysterious events stirs pandemonium in a village, an eccentric cop Vikrant Rona sets out to solve the case wherein everyone is under the radar.
Kumar returns home after years. When G.K. Menon sets out to ruin him, Kumar calls his friend Ravi for his help to tackle the business tycoon.
Durai, a ruthless and cold-blooded henchman, would go to any extent to collect money from loan defaulters. What happens when motherly love is bestowed upon him?
Spurred by his dark past, Arivu wants to become a police officer. However, his training instructor Moorthy may become a hurdle and shatter his dreams.
Arjun keeps mum on a crime he witnessed. He falls in love with Nisha. But when he finds himself betrayed by her, he sets out on a path of violence.
Anal Murugan, an aspiring actor, helps an old man save his orphanage from a corrupt politician. But how will he succeed without any supporters?
Can art foretell the future? A novelist inherits a villa full of his artist father's paintings that begin making ominous predictions.
Mohan, a village simpleton, lands in Mumbai only to realise that it is plagued with corruption. Can his simple ways adjust to a warped system?
A man who is against smoking takes on the owner of a cigarette factory. Before he can put his challenge into action, he has to face various obstacles.
Astronaut Chris Hadfield recounts how perilous a single tear drop in space can be.
Having been ditched at the altar, Radha is against marriage. What happens when her ex-boyfriend saves her from a big crisis in her life?
A girl and her brothers find themselves on a thrilling adventure with a boy who refuses to grow up.
After narrowly escaping a molester, Lucky seeks shelter in Aditya’s car. Chaos ensues when a terrorist attack breaks out, but the two stand by each other.
Valarmathi, a rich girl, falls in love with Pandi, who rents out mikes and speakers in Dindigul. However, before the wedding, he meets with an accident.
A re-telling of the 1955 classic, Lady, a pampered Cocker Spaniel and Tramp, a lovable stray, come to understand the value of home despite their differences.
Sidharth has anger-management issues. One scary night, his short temper just may land him and his wife in serious trouble.
An extraordinary story of an ordinary superhero who cannot fly or swing; but fights for justice by exposing corruption and unmasking the truth.
Elephant Shani and her son Jomo set out on an epic journey across the Kalahari Desert following the footsteps of their ancestors on a quest to reach paradise.
Sixty years later, a new generation of Disney animators and filmmakers offer an exciting reinterpretation of classical compositions for today's audiences.
Darby Thorne, a young woman who is stranded by a blizzard, stumbles across an abducted girl hidden in a van, leading her to a terrifying life-or-death struggle.
Traumatised by her boyfriend Rahul's death, Kajal relocates. There she meets his lookalike, who falls in love with her, but her heart belongs only to Rahul.
Kunjulakshmi falls in love with Chandran, but he loves Kamala and marries her. When they get separated, Kunjulakshmi tries to reunite them.
A simple guy, Pawan Kumar Chaturvedi, who is a Hanuman bhakt takes it upon himself to help a lost; mute girl, reach her home in Pakistan!
The teenage son of the king and queen of Auradon offers the trouble-making children of villains a chance to attend prep school in the kingdom.
Mukundan lives a simple life in Chennai and is in love with Sumithra. His life takes a turn for the worse when his classmate Viswanath, a conman, visits him.

title_name: The Nutcracker And The Four Realms
description: Clara, a young girl, is transported to a mysterious world of gingerbread soldiers and an army of mice.

title_name: Lilo & Stitch 2: Stitch Has A Glitch
description: Stitch suddenly starts behaving erratically due to some programming bugs in his system. Can Lilo and Nani fix his glitches and save him?
A classical dancer, Priyamvadha, earns her living by teaching dance. A carnival arrives in town offering good money to local artists, and she joins it.

Eagle is a Malayalam thriller, starring P Sukumar, Poonam Dasgupta, Kuthiravattam Pappu and Anandavalli, directed by Ambili. A serial killer is running amok. And his victims are all women. Watch the full movie, Eagle, online, only on Hotstar.
A grieving widow Kajal crosses paths with Raja, who falls head over heels in love with her. But chaos ensues when her husband Ravi returns from the dead.
Four people with different aspirations face various challenges in life. Will it be too late before they realise their worth?
Beloved characters from Disney Animation’s 100 years come together for an unforgettable reunion.
V.P. Sathyan strives hard to make a fulfilling career in football. However, his dreams are cut short due to an injury, leading him to depression.
Dejected after losing his girlfriend in an accident, Ajai comes to Bengaluru to try his luck in the music industry. What happens when he meets Anjali?
Sujatha, a widow, strives to support her child's education. However, her unambitious daughter believes she can only become a maid like her mother.
When a goon repeatedly misbehaves with Rashmi, a furious Prashanth kills him. After his jail term, he is horrified to learn about Rashmi's sad plight.
A wily inspector and his rookie sidekick investigate a theatrical whodunit.
An estranged Kumar leads a life of crime and rises through the ranks while garnering enmity from his fraternity.
Four men are frustrated with corruption in the society and decide to change things. What will they do when corrupt officers and politicians corner them?
The brilliant Dr. Brenda Bradford transforms John Brown, a naive security guard, into Inspector Gadget to fight against the evil Dr. Claw.
One of the three best friends learns about his father's involvement in corruption. Together, the trio decides to teach him a lesson.

title_name: The Simpsons meet the Bocellis in “Feliz Navidad”
description: Homer surprises Marge with the ultimate gift: an unforgettable performance from Italian opera superstar Andrea Bocelli and his children Matteo and Virginia.
When Gary Unwin meets suave agent Harry Hart, he realizes his great potential and enlists Gary as a trainee in the secret service.
Saravanan, a jobless youth, becomes the head of a national party. Things get unnerving for him when he beats his politically ambitious uncle.
Dive into the waters below and watch the aquatic wildlife from the world of Nemo and Dory.
A police detective loses everything in search of a serial killer. Just when the trail goes cold, the killer comes back, leaving clues for him to decode.

title_name: Forky Asks A Question: What is a Pet?
description: Forky meets Rib Tickles and finds her charming and pleasant, only to be schooled by Rib on the dangers of law enforcement.
Kaveri's illness shatters Nagi's dream to make her a doctor. A criminal comes to her aid for Kaveri's surgery but on the condition that Nagi marries him.
Achamma works as a nurse abroad and leads a content life with her husband. Their life changes when she goes back to her village and meets her ex-husband, John.
Raghavan hates music because he suffered from being the son of a classical singer. What happens when his son, Sivan, is drawn to music?
The Kingsman join forces with Statesman, an allied US spy organization, to defeat a common enemy and free the world from his clutches.
School teacher Suma and local inspector Charanraj are old friends. When he finds out the reason behind her reclusive lifestyle, he decides to make her happy.
Paramanandham aka Burma is a car thief. Everything is going great in his life until one particular car theft invites unforeseen complications.
Balan and Raju are good friends. One day, Raju murders Balan's wife and runs away with his money. Balan decides to seek revenge.
The young wife of an elderly village head seeks solace in Arjun's arms. The cuckold retaliates by framing Arjun for the rape of Miss Tanakpur, his buffalo!
A young girl visits Kunjoonjamma and claims to be her granddaughter, changing the old woman's life for the better. However, what is the girl's motive?
An Indian queen seeks her bodyguard's help to seize the gold, which the government had raided from her palace during the Emergency in 1975.
A police chief discovers that an invisible creature, an extraterrestrial big game hunter known as the Predator, is killing criminals and cops.
Having followed and observed Veda on multiple occasions, Satya feels attracted to her. But he has a lot of unexpected battles to fight to win her over.
Ravi pretends to own farmland that belongs to his friend. But things go wrong when Colonel Menon visits and wants him to marry one of his granddaughters.
Three rich sisters love making prank calls. When Abhijit gets a call, he lures Meghana to meet him. She goes without telling her sisters. Is trouble brewing?
An evil queen banishes princess Giselle from her magical land to the streets of Manhattan, where she falls in love with a charmingly flawed divorce lawyer.
A teacher by profession, the thought of retirement has Ashwath feeling disheartened. Hence, he decides to start a school of his own.
Thampi leads a solitary retired life in his ancestral home. He is happy when his grandson pays him a visit with his friends. But soon tragedy strikes.
Kushal's trip to Kodagu for an alliance takes a turn when he meets and falls for Khushi. However, a shock awaits him. Will he still accept her open-heartedly?
Pughazh is a student who tracks down baddies. He meets Janavi at a wedding and falls in love but also targets her father. But a shocking secret awaits him.
Much in love, Jeeva and Karthika part ways post-college after her family relocates. Years later, when they meet again, will they feel the same about each other?
Donald attempts to practice child psychology on his three visiting nephews.

In this spin-off of the Air Bud franchise, five pups follow an ice cream transport truck to a plane and end up flying with the ice cream shipment to Alaska. There they find a pup friend and a boy who needs five dogs for a big race.
When Gayatri, a Brahmin girl, begins working as an Arabic teacher in a Muslim school, a few with vested interests spark communal problems.
Ramakrishnaiah is a hardcore Kannadiga, but his daughter marries a Muslim, which is opposed by her cousin and prompts him to take an extreme step.
An MLA's aide learns about his plans to distribute funds to the public, but the minister's nephew has something else planned.
Harishchandra, the wise ruler of Ayodhya, is known for his honesty. The gods decide to test him. His life becomes an ordeal, but he remains true to his path.
Desperate to resolve his financial issues and marry his lover, Sughu decides to go to Qatar for a task that promises quick money. Then he bumps into a Sheikh.
Dayalan, a teacher at a government school, fights to improve conditions for the students. His revolutionary ways irk the management, who plan to ruin his image.
Jai Bakshi, an ex-military man,  pledges to bring the government down. Now it is up to Colonel Abhay Singh, his superior, who has to stop him at all costs.
Murali and Lakshmi meet in college and fall in love. However, circumstances force her to marry someone else, and her life takes a tragic turn.
In the aftermath of Indira Gandhi's assassination, Devender Singh and his family get trapped in endless danger as the anti-Sikh riots break out in Delhi.
Singer Dev and TV reporter Paaru are attacked and separated from each other in a village known for honour killings. Will the two lovers find each other again?
A daughter of a rich man, Radha, falls in love with Venu, who is a poor musician. However, her father fixes her marriage elsewhere. What will they do now?
The last thing Manja expected was to be pulled into the world of crime when he protected his girlfriend from eve teasers. Now, how will he get out of it?
While on a study tour, Bhama meets Devan, a celestial being, and falls for him. Her family wants them to wed, but will the laws of heaven allow them to unite?
