The documentary follows a newborn monkey and its mother as they struggle to survive within the competitive social hierarchy of the Temple Troop.
Based on a true story, this drama was adapted from the life of Brandon Teena and his courage to live his life as his true self.
Struggling with panic disorder, Janaki is ecstatic when Unni Mukundan proposes to marry her. Things go south when Janaki's fears land her in serious trouble.

title_name: Tangled: The Series - Queen For A Day
description: When the king and queen leave town, Rapunzel gets ready to lead, but when a blizzard threatens to destroy Corona, the princess faces some tough decisions.
While searching for news, two incompetent journalists end up finding a CBI Officer's dead body. Chaos ensues when they are considered as the prime suspects.
In the deep abyss of the ocean lies the Red Mercury! To extract it, a group of scientists set off to a remote island. But dangers lurk at every corner.
Maari, a local don, in his new naughty-turned-nice avtar, manages to get into the bad books of Beeja, a Murakami fan, who will stop at nothing to destroy him.
On the tropical Hawaiian Islands, a little girl named Lilo adopts what she thinks is an innocent puppy, Stitch, completely unaware of his origins.
The final hour of the popular virtual reality game Yggdrasil has come.
Shivaji, a Sri Lankan Tamil, lands in Vizag after political upheaval in his hometown. The situation worsens when his jealous stepbrother enters his life.

Ente Sonia is a Malayalam drama movie starring Ratheesh, Geetha, Ramu, TG Ravi, Priya, Yuvasree and directed by Arun. Ratheesh and Geetha are in the lead roles in this gripping drama. Watch the full movie, Ente Soniya, online, only on Hotstar.
Unable to conceive, Susheela and her husband opt for in vitro fertilisation. Years later, their son gets killed in an accident, and it takes a toll on Susheela.
Shiva and Indu are teenagers who fall in love. Her parents then ask her to read a book called Pathinaaru to change her mind. What will Shiva do now?
Achuthan is a simple man with a wife and two daughters and dreams of building a house. When he dies one day, the little family is left without an anchor.
A blind poet wishes to become famous. While spurned by all, he meets a girl who helps him get his vision. But he realises that life is still not a bed of roses.
After the death of Pareekutty, his wife and two children go to her parental home, leaving her father-in-law shattered. However, life is not easy any longer.
Witness Europe's Wild West where packs of wolves stalk herds of ancient mustangs and tree-climbing carnivores keep entire forests on edge.
Trouble follows a lazy and confused man in any job he takes up. However, destiny has plans for him when he helps the police nab a gang of criminals.
Shamala Devi lives a celibate life. She forces her niece and nephew to follow suit. However, they decide to give her lessons in love, and everything changes.
When a helpless student has nowhere to turn to except a housewife who's also a small-time lawyer, what they uncover is a quagmire of an educational scam.
Abandoned by her parents, Thulasi and her grandmother move to Muttam village where a local boy falls in love with her. His mother is, however, against it.
Two corrupt politicians, who pilfer government funds, find themselves in trouble when they mistake a crook for a CID officer.
A scary journey begins when a small-time thief, Rudra, enters a haunted castle and gets pulled into the mystery of its mistress - Annabelle Sethupathi.
Scriptwriter Manja is asked by his boss to pen a love letter and send it to a fake name and address, which, by a twist of fate, turn out to be real.
Sarojam is in love with the rich Mohanan. After much opposition, their marriage gets fixed. But destiny plays spoilsport as she gets shunned by society.
An honour killing, a scandal and an explosive story - all seen through voyeuristic cameras, exposing raw human emotions.
Donald Duck’s gluttonous cousin, Gus Goose, comes for a visit.

title_name: Lady And The Tramp II: Scamp's Adventure
description: In search of adventure and real dog life, Scamp the son of Lady and the Tramp runs away to join a gang of junkyard dogs.

title_name: Machine Gun Kelly's Life in Pink
description: Machine Gun Kelly’s Life in Pink takes you through the raw realness and pressure of a rock star’s rise to the top.
An ex-elite commando, Frank Martin, defies the FBI to get his employer's son back safely and thwart the kidnappers.
A story about the power of Lord Shiva and his wife, Goddess Parvati, this film depicts the meaning of true religious faith.
A strict doctor, Aparna, whose divorce proceeding is underway, has made many enemies in her hospital. When she is found dead, there are many suspects.
An elite team of adventurers and fearless scientists go on a quest to uncover the secrets of a mysterious boiling lava lake in the South Atlantic ocean.

title_name: Shang-Chi and The Legend of The Ten Rings
description: Shang-Chi, a martial arts master, must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.
A playful young dolphin named Echo must master his vital role in the coral reef community.
Santha, who cares for his mentally ill sisters, becomes a scapegoat in a police case and sent to jail. He emerges a changed man and then leads a criminal gang.
Champak, a simple Mithai-seller, will go to any lengths to fulfil daughter Tarika's dream of studying in London, triggering a chain of hilarious misadventures.
When a fluke gets an awkward 7-year-old invited to compete in a beauty pageant, her misfit family rallies behind her.
Rini, the right-hand man of a corrupt businessman, decides to have a life of his own. He asks his boss to help him settle down, but fate has other plans for him.
Tamil is a visually impaired singer who falls in love with Sundanthirakodi who is also blind. However, she wishes to marry someone with perfect vision.
Two men get kidnapped by tribals in a forest. When the duo sees death in front of them, they convince the tribe that one of them is the son of God!
Monty, a musician, hallucinates strange visions. To take a break from his ordeal, he lands up in a place that opens a secret from his past life.
Tommy Santorelli wakes up as a 12-year-old on his childhood sandlot. Earl Needman threatens to bulldoze the sandlot unless Tommy's friends can beat his team.
Rajalakshmi adopts Solomon after he loses his parents in an accident. Later, Solomon helps her resolve the problems that she encounters in her life.
Arjun and his jobless friends are petty thieves. Things take a comical turn when these rookies are hired to pull off the biggest heist. Can they crack it?

title_name: Journey to the Center of The Earth
description: An Edinburgh professor and assorted colleagues follow an explorer's trail down an extinct Icelandic volcano to the earth's centre.
Bucchiraju is a salesman, but tells his girlfriend's father that he is the owner of a big saree store. What will happen when her father discovers the truth?
After several years, musician Anantu returns to his home town. He never anticipated any problems till a popular singer tries to destroy his career.
In a twisted turn of events, when a group of deadly terrorists kidnap Ronnie's elder brother in Syria, he sets off on a mission to bring him back.
While on an assignment, journalist Sudheshene visits her village. Seeing everyone leaving for the city for work, she resolves to change their outlook.
Circumstances put an abrupt end to Raja and Mamta’s love story. But destined to be together, they meet again, albeit in the aftermath of a personal tragedy.
This spectacular aerial journey across the globe reveals LGBTQ+ Pride as it’s never been seen before. Flying cameras capture the spirit of Pride from big cities from across the world.
An anthology of three short stories that feature heart-warming sequences and shed light on the true meaning of Christmas.
Circumstances force three brothers to go their separate ways, but when their ancestral house is being auctioned they join forces.
Gopan falls for his paying guest, Sheetal. Seeing their neighbour couple living separately, they decide to unite them. Will they succeed in their mission?
When Subash Chandrabose is wronged by the system, he sets out to cleanse it, targeting terrorism, exploitative god-men and other evil that plague society.
47, an elite assassin, has his sights trained on a mega-corporation that plans to unlock the secret of Agent 47's past and create an army of killers.
A Hindi dubbed family drama about an auto driver, who has to go back to his hometown to fix things, which he had left during his childhood.
Dolly Levi uses her matchmaking skills in New York City to orchestrate the love lives of her friends, all the while trying to get the man she likes to fall for her.
Siddappa works as a signalman with the railways. One mundane day, he encounters something that endangers his family.
A misunderstanding forces two best friends Shiva and Jenny to part ways. Although they realise their love for each other, egos hinder their reunion.
Introverted and awkward Dr Freddy Ginwala desperately searches for a soulmate. When he finally finds her, the relationship becomes as painful as a root canal.
An impressionable young boy, Naru’s pursuit of the meaning of life by doing the most he can for others. This film is inspired by true life events from Indian PM Modi’s life.
Kichha, a henchman of a local don, meets his match in a girl who fights injustice. While Kichha tries to change for her, trouble arises when his boss finds out.
A plan to make quick money by abducting a rich baby goes astray when the kid turns out to be smarter than his kidnappers.
A group of mountaineers set out to find the mythical plant, Sanjeevani. On their way, they see a host of strange creatures but no escape.
After being framed for murder, Major Ravi moves to Dubai and becomes powerful. His success earns him rivals and encounters with criminals. Can he defeat them?
Ammini is thrilled when her husband becomes rich until she learns that he has earned it through illegal activities. What will she do?
Once a mafia don, Deva gives up violence after making a promise to his dying wife and moves to Gandhipuram. But the past tends to catch up with the present.
Jill Young and zoologist Gregg O'Hara decide to rescue their innocent friend Joe, a smart fifteen-foot-tall gorilla, from poachers at all costs.
To teach New York-bred spoilt brats John and Korah a lesson, John�s dad sends them to Kerala. But they get into trouble as they try to live on a tight budget.
When a tiger named Shere Khan threatens to kill Mowgli, a young boy raised by wolves, his friends Bagheera and Baloo help him escape his clutches.
Watch what happens when an old couple hatches a plan to escape the anguish caused by their negligent children.
Set in the World War II era, Sita's brother, Eeshwar, disapproves of her relationship with Hari. Life changes when both men have to fight in the war together.
An easy-going Prabhu falls in love with Shruthi, the governor's daughter. His life goes into a tailspin after getting embroiled in a political intrigue.
The film chronicles the life of MLA Vangaveeti Mohana Ranga from Vijayawada, who rose to power after his brother's murder and was assassinated in his prime.
Subhash, an NRI businessman, falls in love with Indira, thinking that she is traditional. However, Indira has an ulterior motive to marry him.
This film will take viewers to the isolated shores of Lake Natron in northern Tanzania for a birds-eye view of the mysterious lives of flamingos.
Dr Ramdas decides to move out of the city for his children's sake. However, strange occurrences in the region jeopardise his family's lives.
Despite being wealthy, Kaalaiyan leads a humble life with this brothers. His life gets upended when Sundaravelu executes his sinister plans to take him down.
National Geographic takes a look at the December 2015 floods in Chennai, one of the worst floods in India.
Thiruvambadi is set to protect his father from a politician's fury. His life takes a turn when his father accidentally kills the politician's sibling.
Kalyan and Indu's lives become intertwined after a corrupt politician, Gadappa, rises to power. How will they defeat Gadappa and bring justice to the villagers?
Raja Vamana Varma dies mysteriously. Many murders follow. The government delegates anthropologist Dr Menon to investigate the deaths in and around the palace.
Gajendra is unemployed. He is in love with the daughter of a rich businessman. He has to first face the father, who is against him before wooing the girl.
Hosted by Ryan Seacrest, the jolly event full of celebrity performances featuring BTS, Pink, and Adam Lambert amongst others.
Donald Duck buys a rattletrap used airplane from devious Ben Buzzard.
Nightcrawler infiltrates the White House and attempts to assassinate the president. It is time for the X-Men to band together and track him down.
After Goddess Durga's prophecy about Panchamuki's death comes true, her daughter is left in a coma. Things change when her husband bumps into her lookalike.
Life is not easy for seven dear friends. While each one is dealing with personal issues, Charulatha takes a firm stand after a disagreement with her boyfriend.
Purl gets a job at a start-up and must decide how far is she willing to go to be accepted.
Soldier Thankachan is excited to go home. However, he cancels his leave and returns to the war after hearing certain rumours about his childhood sweetheart.
Seeing the impoverished being tortured, Ithikkara Pakki, a fisherman in Kollam, looted the rich to help the poor. Soon, he became the local Robinhood.
Dr Ananthan falls in love. When he realises that the girl of his dreams is in trouble financially, he helps her to repay her debts.
Kiccha quits being a henchman for a local don to make a decent living after meeting NGO activist Aishwarya. But things go south when he gets arrested.
Desperate to reunite with his daughter, a divorcee disguises himself as a nanny at his ex-wife's house. What follows next is a series of comic confusion.
Valiant officer Sethupathi, foils a notorious terrorist's plan to assassinate the Prime Minister. He is then forced to face the terrorist's vindictive brother.
Krishna Kumar is popular in college for his musical talents. His life changes when a gang of goons target him and the fianc�e of one of them falls for him
Sanjana and Siddu are family friends who fall in love. A turn of events causes them to elope, but they get separated. Will destiny reunite the young lovers?

title_name: Superstructures: The Making of Terminal 2 Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru
description: Discover what it took to build Bengaluru’s new two billion dollar Terminal, with its massive 2.5 million square feet terminal and unique architectural wonders.
Singaperumal and Gajendran are rival dons. They lock horns when two men run away with a stash of cocaine that both gangs are after. How will this chase end?

title_name: The Wonderful Summer of Mickey Mouse
description: Mickey Mouse and his friends recall the wild events leading up to the Annual Summer Fireworks Spectacular.
Aditya and Varsha are head over heels in love with each other. But will they be able to get past their differences and get their happily ever after?
Srikanta Shastri seeks compensation from the government for his daughter's death. The delay in the process frustrates him, and he decides to commit suicide.
While parents want their children to focus only on studies, there is one school teacher who supports his students' individual interests.

Ugragami is a Kannada drama starring Kishor, Neethu, Karibasavaiah, HMT Nanda, Vathsala Mohan, directed by Baraguru Ramachandrappa. The movie takes an insightful look at terrorism and its many facets. Watch the full movie, Ugragami, online, only on Hotstar.
Varun, an NRI medical student, falls in love with Bhanu, a village belle. However, their chalk-and-cheese personalities create obstacles for them.
When Thoota, a gangster, is hired to throw acid on a girl, he ends up falling in love with her instead. What will his next move be?
Troy and Gabriella share a passion for singing. When these two polar opposites try out for the school musical, it disturbs on East High's rigid social order.
Jai's reunion with his long-lost influential father Veera gets chaotic when the latter's past returns to haunt him. How will Jai save Veera from his ill-fate?
Three gifted yet distant siblings have to reunite when their estranged father announces he is dying.
Joshi's life turns around when his mother dies and his estranged father returns. Will they connect with each other, or will past baggage make things worse?
The story of a team of mutant heroes comprised of the first graduates from Charles Xavier's school, dubbed as The New Mutants.

title_name: Hostile Planet: Masters of the Freeze
description: Meet the animals that live in the world's coldest habitats and fight against all the odds to ensure their survival.
A young couple travels to an exclusive island restaurant, but they soon learn that the dinner guests are about to be served some shocking surprises.
Siddharth, a vibrant, hard-working and honest journalist, fights hard to eliminate the illegal activities, but a Don stands in his way.
Detached from her self-obsessed parents, Gauri yearns for happiness. But when fate makes her shelter in a village, she finds solace in the countryside life.
ACP Krishna befriends Sailaja, whose father is accused of murder and absconds from the police. However, he ends up falling in love with her.
Based on the well-known novel, Chowringhee, take a peek into the lives of the people working and staying at the renowned hotel Shah Jahan Regency.
Sudheendran gets a chance to work in films as an assistant cameraman. However, he is in trouble when a photo mix-up in his studio impacts a girl's life.
Bada Dosth follows the colourful and dangerous life of underworld don, Dayashankar (Suresh Gopi). Watch the full movie Bada Dosth online, only on Hotstar.
Two friends launch a website that helps young couples to elope. Although initially a hit, they soon get embroiled in a chaotic situation.
Thomas and his fellow teen Gladers have unearthed an evil plot by a mysterious organization WCKD. Now they must plan a way to them.
Farmer Graham Hess discovers a message carved into his crops as he investigates the unfolding mystery, what he finds will forever alter the lives of his family.
A long-lost relative's spirit helps Allie introduce her girlfriend to her family.
Naagan and Aruvikkara Thampy are sworn enemies. Later, they learn that they are brothers and were pitched against each other by evil forces.
Former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.
An upright cop goes toe to toe with an ex-havildar over a petty case. As the quarrel between these egoistic men gets intense, how far will they go to win?
Carefree Nani is killed by Sudeep, a wicked businessman. But he reincarnates in a unique form to protect his lover, Bindu, from Sudeep's evil clutches.
The movie depicts the circumstances that lead to the origination of the first American Bred Horse, the Morgan Horse.
Alibaba, a poor woodcutter, discovers the treasure cave of a dacoit and his forty thieves. When he steals a piece of their loot, a cat-and-mouse chase ensues.
Wings of Life presents the unsung heroes of the global food chain showcasing fantastic journeys that are full of wonder, drama, and beauty.
A poet and a courtesan's tragic love affair set against the backdrop of the fantastical world of Paris nightlife.
Dr Balasubrahmaniam's son joins an engineering college and is killed during a ragging incident. The upset father then decides to avenge his son's death.
Kaali and his politically charged friend Anbu get into a heated debate over walls on which to put up party posters. How far will they go to prove their point?
A teen forms an unlikely friendship with an eccentric activist protesting a landmark medical case.
Mickey Mouse stars in this retelling of the classic story, as Mickey, a poor peasant, and the Prince, son of the dying King.
Day and Night discover each other's unique qualities and realize that each of them offers a different window onto the same world.
Narayanan goes to Dubai to make a better living. While he encounters several challenges as an illegal migrant, he strives to keep his family in India happy.
Young, middle-class boy Nani has to protect his sister-in-law, a transport official from a gangster, who runs an illegal transport business.
Presenting the annual highlights of the biggest moments of a historic year that proved to be unlike any other in modern-day history.
A poor boy is in love with a rich girl. Disapproving of the alliance, her father decides to violently end their love himself.

title_name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules
description: Back in middle school after a good summer vacation, Greg Heffley and his older brother Rodrick will have to deal with their parents' attempts to have them bond.
Pooja's happiness is threatened when her husband cheats on her and moves in with a hot model. To get him back in line, she decides to get even in her own way.
Vijay is all set to wed Pavitra, the daughter of his wealthy rival. However, when his car crashes into Merin and injures her, things take a turn in their lives.
To woo the police chief's daughter is no mean task for martial arts expert Anandan. However, things get ugly when he's caught in a police-mafia crossfire.
A search is on for a suitable groom for a princess. However, she is caught in a dilemma when she is forced to marry a logger who saved her life.
A middle-class boy gets married to a simple girl, and the newlyweds lead a happy life. However, their dreams are shattered after she gets gang-raped.
Three guys help their friend to marry his love against her father's wishes. But, when they find themselves in trouble, they are forced to question the lovers.
This special feature documents the first manned dives to Titanic in nearly 15 years, as experts capture unique footage of the ship to analyse its rate of decay.
Arjun is forcefully married to Satya when her brother Pedababu predicts her first husband's ill fate. To make his prophesy true, Pedababu crosses all limits.
Seenu and Mahalakshmi fall in love. While his parents are happy with his choice, hers are against it. Can Seenu convince them that his love is genuine?
Kuttan becomes rich after getting rid of an ill-fated statue. But soon it finds its way back to his doorstep, and the world starts crumbling around him.
Three cousins - Divya, Kuttan and Arjun - have always dreamt of living in Bangalore. When they get there, they end up discovering their true selves.
An accident triggers Dr Dolittle's dormant powers of talking to animals. As his family and friends are concerned, he is busy tending to his new animal clients!

title_name: Star Wars Rebels: The Siege Of Lothal
description: After an absence fighting with the rebel fleet, the rebel crew returns to Lothal to save a defecting Imperial officer, only to be confronted by Darth Vader.
For orphaned Raju, life is incomplete without his four elephants-cum-companions. But after he marries Tanu, he has only one choice - lifelong friends or family.
After surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and warns anyone who will listen about the predators.
Akash and Shivani decide to set up their parents Bhaskar and Anu. But their first meeting starts off on a bad note. Will they ever bury the hatchet?
Two Jedi Knights set out to search for someone who can bring peace to the Force as the Sith returns to stake claim to the Force.
Stranded after a tragic plane crash, two strangers must forge a connection to survive the extreme elements of a remote snow covered mountain.
Back in his hometown after years, Raj befriends Bhola, an elephant. As time passes, he discovers a deep-rooted poaching scandal, which changes his life forever.
Kishore charms Indu, but he gets her married to Ekanth, who loves her. Her sister, Bindu, too falls for Kishore. But Ekanth's death leaves Kishore in a quandary.
Conan, who was sold into slavery when he was a kid, sets off to find Thulsa Doom, the sorcerer responsible for the genocide of his family and people.

title_name: Hum Bhi Akele, Tum Bhi Akele
description: Runaway bride Mansi meets runaway groom Veer at an LGBTQ+ party. An epic road trip follows, which takes them on a journey of unconditional love.
A dutiful rowdy cop is deputed to deal with the murder case of a police commissioner. But there's more than what meets the eye.
Dilli, a convicted criminal, is out on parole to meet his daughter. However, a drug bust sets him off on a mission to save the life of police officers.
Basavaraj's father dupes Ganapathi's grandfather and takes over his properties. The younger generation decides to correct the wrong done by the elders.
Shankara's girlfriend wants him to lead a dignified life. But when his company dupes him and the villagers, he is forced to go to Bengaluru to earn a living.
Childhood friends Sagar and Sangeetha gradually fall in love. When Sangeeta's parents accept a proposal from a politician's family, the lovers decide to elope.
Racing superstar Lightning McQueen zooms back into action, with his best friend Mater, to take on the globe's fastest and finest cars.
Prem, an aspiring pop star is abandoned by Nisha on their wedding day. Later, he meets Priya, a videographer and a new relationship blossoms.
When consequences drive Siva to contemplate suicide, a twist in the tale makes him rethink his decision and fight evil in the pursuit of redemption.
An incident makes Sulochana hate the military so much that she also runs away from her wedding to an officer, but fate has something else in store for her.
Zen – Grogu and Dust Bunnies is a hand drawn animated short by Studio Ghibli.
The legendary saga of Ramayan is narrated from Ravan's perspective; the valiant, intelligent, and brave King of Lanka. An epic battle of good vs. evil.
Akbar Basha rescues a woman who was raped as an act of revenge. But when Akbar gets arrested on a false charge, how will she get justice?
In 1915 British India, an Indian doctor gets falsely accused of bombing a train. In jail at Port Blair, he witnesses the cruel treatment given to the inmates.
In a village plagued by deaths, SI Maya grapples with superstition and the spirit of a mysterious girl. Can she unravel the puzzle and save the community?
Three dead bodies inside a temple spark a political uprising in Odisha. Soon, as the investigation takes its pace, the darker side of politics rears its head.
Padma leaves the country with her mother after her father's murder. A few years later, she meets Dev and is drawn to him, but can she live with his ideologies?
Rhea, an Indian-American teen, discovers that she has a natural gift for DJing and producing music, but must find the courage to follow her true inner talent.
Kuttan, a rich man, decides to get Lallu, his granddaughter, married to Rajan, whom he met during an interview. For this, he seeks the help of her friends.
A quirky rescue mission that begins with a kidnap takes a wild turn when the kidnapper gets embroiled with the kidnappee's affairs.
Fear takes over a medical college when three students are murdered mysteriously. When the police fail to find evidence, DIG Daisy Wilfred steps in.
Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny.
Shobhana belongs to an upper middle-class family, who has to spend time in a government college. But things change when she falls in love with Muthu.
With his pal and ride, Mooshak, Bal Ganesha embarks on an adventure-filled journey, battling the evil forces and saving the world.
Ramdas and Vijayan are sent on a mission to the US to retrieve a priceless gold crown stolen from India. With barely any clues, the duo embarks on an adventure.
To forget a painful past, Archana chooses to be a teacher in a small village. She meets Sukumaran and decides to marry him. But life is not as smooth-sailing.
Ralph and Vanellope von Schweetz navigate the vast and dynamic world wide web in search of a replacement part to save Vanellope's game, Sugar Rush.
A righteous IAS officer decides to protect the tribal people in his area from corrupt politicians and ends up joining their rebellion against them.
Nandakumar runs an Internet cafe. His carefree life changes when he has to look for his ailing father, who had abandoned the family years ago.
Rani and Padmini, two strangers, meet during a journey. While travelling together, they develop a bond and help each other solve their personal problems.
Disneynature's True Life Adventure of an adorable baby chimp named, Oscar and his entertaining approach to life.
Maasthi leads an isolated life near a forest. On learning that tigers are illegally being hunted and killed, he sets out to save them and make things right.
The lives of a retired childless couple, Ravunni Nair and Saraswati, changes when Maya comes to live with them. But will their happiness last forever?
10-year-old Ryan struggles with math lessons. But when his grandfather, a collector of antiques, gifts him a magic pen called Monkey Pen, it changes Ryan's life.
Aiyanna and his wife get killed by goons. His brother, a simple guy, takes the law into his own hands to avenge his death.

title_name: Bal Ganesh and the Pomzom Planet
description: When his dear friend Moushak is captured on an unknown planet, Pomzom, Bal Ganesha comes to battle the evil forces and rescue him.
To pay off his mounting debts, Gopalakrishnan decides to sell his property. However, his tenants refuse to leave the premises.
Vellayani Paramu is in for a shock when he returns home after many years. He learns that his uncle has looted the family wealth and left his mother to suffer.
A tale of mistaken identities where identical-looking Gaurav and Rishi cross paths only to create confusion and chaos in their lives and of those around them.
Shambu is a famous sculptor. After his wife's death, he lives the life of a loner till he meets Durga, and his life takes a turn.
A failed cricketer unable to get over his ex-girlfriend marries a girl who has been madly in love with him. However, things change with a blast from the past.
Ranjeet and Sharda lead a happy married life. However, this perfect family breaks down when a storm named Nirmala enters and Ranjeet goes with the flow.
When a decorated policeman is suspected of killing the murderers of his wife and children, he is left with no choice but to unearth the actual culprit.

title_name: The Making of Happier Than Ever: A Love Letter to Los Angeles
description: Go behind the scenes of "Happier Than Ever: A Love Letter to Los Angeles."
Animesh experiences a dilemma, differentiating between love and infatuation. A chain of events brings some twists and turns in his quest for true love.
30 plus and a virgin, Debu really wanted to change his 'shameful' status. When he gets help, he gets a bit more than what he asked for.
Kiran has not been able to recover from the tragic death of his family. He finds a deaf-mute boy who witnessed his mother's murder and adopts him.
Professor Kurian Fernandez escapes from jail. Inspectors Unnikrishnan and K. Purushothaman Nair land in Bangalore thinking he would visit his daughter there.
A famous singer decides to take Anandan under his wing after seeing his passion. Things take a turn for the worse when Anandan falls in love with his daughter.
When the devious don Rasiya terrorises his village, Chooran teams up with his friends to fight against the evil forces and rescue the captives.
Padmini becomes attached to an orphan girl, Gigi, with special needs. Later, when her estranged husband tries to reconcile with her, she is in a dilemma.
Savitri is a motherless girl. She is in love with Satyavan but circumstances force her to marry an elderly widower. And her woes have just begun!
Sunny Palomattam, a businessman from Singapore, leads a carefree life with his girlfriend, Sandra. What happens when he meets his business rival, Mohammed Ali?
Set in Kolkata, a young Minnie is introduced to cinema by the bioscopewala. Years later, when he disappears without a trace, she decides to complete his story.
A family is haunted by what seems to be a ghost until a psychiatrist arrives to solve the mystery. Together, they unravel shocking facts and a dangerous secret.
Why did Kattappa kill Amarendra Baahubali? Unveil the mystery and many more secrets that lie in the depths of the Mahishmati kingdom.
The Chennai Sharks reunite for Raghu's wedding. However, a cricket match against a local team soon causes a series of unfortunate events in their lives.
Radha is a dancer who tries to provide for her family by performing. Eventually, she goes to the city but is unprepared for what is in store for her there.
Ariel, a mermaid, is off on an adventure to save her father's beloved kingdom from the sea witch Ursula, with her best friends Flounder and Sebastian.
Eshwar aka Chikku's world crumbles when his beloved niece goes missing. Will this emotional pursuit test the limits of love?
Harikrishnan, a software engineer, suffers from obsessive-compulsive disorder. A job assignment to Trivandrum changes his life for good.
Hitman is about a trained assassin only known as Agent 47, who is hired by a group known only as 'The Organization' that's trapped in a political conspiracy.
College tutor Seetha learns that her stalker is a student of criminology and specialises in studying rapes. His research into her past reveals a shocking truth.
Mr. Verma, a business tycoon, disapproves of his daughter’s relationship with Ajay. Things go awry when the overprotective father hires a goon to kill Ajay.
A small boy called Kris is kidnapped by a bunch of ruffians. Lord Krishna comes to his rescue in the form of a young shepherd boy.
Balu loves Chakravarthy's daughter and insults Lord Vinayaka while trying to please her father. But Vinayaka won't let the barb go unpunished.
Noorjahan and Sabna get married into the same family. While Sabna brings good dowry with her, poor Noorjahan is treated like a servant by her mother-in-law.
Jo and Swathi's lives get intertwined after a scientist reveals that they are leading parallel lives. However, things take an ugly turn when Swathi is killed.
To avenge his father's death, a young medical student, Krishna takes law into his own hands. On the road to justice, he falls in love with his classmate.
Prem and his family devise a strategy to reform his girlfriend, Sanjana’s mafia uncles who want to inherit her wealth.
Greg is about to begin middle school and wishes to become popular among the students. However, his attempts to gain fame land him in sticky situations.
Charlie is smitten with the new girl in the neighbourhood and tries unsuccessfully to impress her with little help from his best friend and dog Snoopy.
As Seabrook students struggle to coexist with new students from Zombietown, an unlikely friendship between a cheerleader and a zombie could unite their community.
A father hides his unusual son, and then must face the consequences.
Bunty is a mischievous boy who dies of an unfortunate accident, and his soul enters the body of a dog. Will Bunty manage to explain to his family what happened?
College student Shanthi falls in love with Shekhar, but Ramu, who is after her, prevents their wedding. Later, he gets murdered, and Shanthi is blamed for it.
Mickey operates a steam shovel on a busy construction site.
When a thief turned Godman falls in love, he decides to come out clean and redeem himself. Is it too late?
Rajakumaran moves to Kochi to join as a teacher at a training institute. There he meets two women. Will they change his life for the better or worse?
Howard attempts to make it up to his son Jake by buying the toy on every child's list to Santa and the hottest action figure of the season — Turbo Man!

title_name: Phineas and Ferb The Movie: Across the 2nd Dimension
description: The boys discover that their beloved pet platypus Perry is a secret agent and they join him on an adventure to fight evil Dr. Doofenshmirtz.
Good Samaritan Mahadevan didn't think he was walking into trouble when admitting accident victim Radhika to the hospital. There he has to face her friend.
Sugunan is the typical male chauvinist who thinks a wife's job is to cook and do household chores. After years of misery, Bindu decides to take a drastic step.
Lovebirds Veer and Geet are soon to get married, however, problems arise when the groom-to-be messes up his first meeting with Geet’s peace-loving father.
America-based Sharada is forced to give away her illegitimate son, Raja, to Jyothsna and marry Shekar. However, fate will make the mother-son duo reunite.
Brought together by a tragic twist, Kizie and Manny embark on a bittersweet journey into the heart of that crazy little thing called 'life'.
A sports agent stages an unconventional recruitment strategy to get talented Asian cricket players to play Major League Baseball.
When Surya flies to Saudi Arabia to meet his friend, Sriram, he finds out that the latter has been accused of killing his lover. How will he prove his innocence?
Arjun gets into scrapes with gangsters and falls in love with Anjali. He comes across Bhavani who fiercely defends him. Who is she, and what's her motive?

title_name: The Wonderful World of Mickey Mouse: Steamboat Silly
description: Mickey and gang must stop hundreds of old film reel versions of Mickey from wreaking havoc all over town.
Deepak and Kavya throw a party before their wedding. While returning from the party, Kavya runs over a man, which alters her life drastically.
When his sister's marriage falls apart, Kundan’s father is devastated and dies of a heart attack. This turns Kundan into a rebel as he vows to seek revenge.
Maari, a local don, is notorious for troubling people and extorting money. Tables turn when he falls for Sridevi, who gives him a taste of his own medicine.
Kannadada Kanda is a Kannada family drama, directed by B N Vijaykumar and starring Leelavati and Vinod Raj. Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.
Beena, Gopinath's daughter, believes her friend Anu when she tells her that she saw her father with another woman. How will Beena tackle the situation?
Mirchi Malini predicts the future of a person by tasting the food cooked by them. Hell breaks loose when a few chosen ones have to taste the food cooked by her.
Channa's life is destroyed when village goons kill his parents. He escapes but returns to avenge their deaths.
A mysterious death makes Detective Chandrakanta spring into action! His first suspect is the dead man’s wife but as he delves deeper, dark secrets unfold.
Seemaraja, the irresponsible prince of Simhadripuram, tries to woo the local school's PT teacher. But things take an ugly turn when a blast from the past returns.
Mohan faces some strange incidents after his brother, Sankaran, dies due to a snake bite. Then Sankaran returns as a ghost to haunt his brother.
A bunch of CCB police officers are expert sharpshooters. However, they fall into trouble when the police department starts opposing their work.
Car mechanic Putta loves Sinchana, the daughter of his boss. Things take a strange turn when Prakasha, claiming to have a job abroad, wants to marry Sinchana.
Secret agent Shakti, disguised as a tourist guide, comes across a box of diamonds, which also comes with a special story. What adventures are in store for him?
Sankunni is the main performer of a local circus group. On one of the tours, he meets Savithrikutty. What happens when Prathapa Varma gets her kidnapped?
Siddharth and Avni’s life changes when they move into his ancestral home. In this maze of superstitions, how will they find their way?
After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break with the help of three good fairies.
After the divorce of a couple leaves the wife with custody of their three children, the husband dresses up as a British nanny to spend time with his kids.
Notorious sandalwood kingpin Veerappan's life is an open book. This film focuses on his childhood and other less-explored aspects of his life.
Auto driver Mathai always helps the needy. However, on the day of a strike, he tries to resolve a doctor and his wife's fight, leading to a series of conflicts.
Innocent young girls are targeted, raped and killed by a serial killer. Who will catch him?
Two Pixar filmmakers strive to bring their uniquely personal SparkShorts visions to the screen.
Heart set on becoming a princess, Lisa Simpson is surprised to learn being bad might be more fun.
Seetharama Rao saves a rich girl from an accident and is mistaken for her fianc�. While he decides to play along, he falls for her best friend.
Seethamma, who is brought up by Panchami, her mother's sister, loves Chengan, a fisherman. But their village tradition does not allow them to be together.
The childhood stories of Lord Ganesh and his companion Mooshak the mouse, as they set out on a series of adventures.
The hapless manager of one of the poshest hotels tries to keep both the orangutan and his finicky boss under control when they check-in to their hotel.
A mediator between the deity and the devotees, Velichappad gets caught in the crossfire of beliefs and disbeliefs. Is there a way out for him?
College students Karthik and Shwetha fall in love, get intimate and soon Shwetha finds herself pregnant. How will their families react to this startling news?
Rocky is a common young man whose life turns 360 degrees and makes him a deliverer of vengeance.
Much-in-love Rajesh and Meena decide to get married. When her parents object, Rajesh decides to win them over in the quirkiest way possible.
Palanichamy makes life for Michael's family difficult on their newly purchased farm. Things change when Michael's brother Chandy comes over.
A cocky, naturally-gifted snare drummer from Harlem helps his Atlanta College marching band defeat a long-time rival in a southern battle-of-the-bands.
A kindhearted troll takes refuge in Central Park and, after meeting some friends, they let loose their mischievous magic on New York City.
Sivakumar's family were master weavers, but their heritage sank without a trace. The happy-go-lucky man finds a purpose and vows to revive his lost legacy.
Akku comes to Thirthahalli to earn a living. However, she faces many challenges because of male domination in the village.
Jayachandran has no plans to get married. One day, when asked to come home urgently, he is shocked to find an unforeseen situation waiting for him.
The much-talked-about Sardar Sarovar Dam displaced over 100,000 tribes people. Three decades later, this deep dive investigates whether they are better or worse off.
Lord Ganesha embarks on an adventurous journey with his friends to take down the evil forces and save the world.
A weary Logan is forced out of hiding to protect Laura, a young mutant, who is pursued by an evil corporation.
Jassi falls head over heels in love with Sukhmit, only to discover her family is out to finish him over an old family feud. How will love triumph over revenge?
Directed by Sasi Mohan, this film stars Rahman, Baiju, Chembakam, and Narendra Prasad in lead roles.
Mangalashery Madhavan Menon is a village landlord. His daughter, Gayathri, is in love with her cousin Venu. But life is not as easy as it seems.
Manoj, a young boy who lives with his crazy clan, sets out to unravel the legend of the lost prince and the hidden treasure in an abandoned palace.
Sadasivan becomes a saviour to a family whose head has committed suicide. He even protects the widow from evil eyes. Surely, this is not without a motive.
A woman decides to walk out of her decades-long difficult marriage after her son's wedding, leading to a look back at the fragments of her married life.
In "Becoming Cousteau," Liz Garbus takes an inside look at Jacques-Yves Cousteau, adventurer, filmmaker, innovator, author, and conservationist.
Radha, a college girl, falls in love with Rajan, a writer. Their life takes a turn when an evil man bothers her, and Rajan tries to save her from his clutches.
Runaway Rinku gets forcefully married to an already engaged Vishu. The love triangle gets weirder when Rinku's lover Sajjad shows up.
In a country where acid is cheaper than cold drink, acid-attack survivor Malti relentlessly fights for justice. A story of triumph over trauma.
When Bobby learns that a girl in his college loves him, he tries to find her. He mistakes Malavika to be his secret admirer and starts pursuing her.
Under Dr. Kalam's visionary leadership, an earlier failed launch transformed into success with the launch of India's first rocket, SLV-3.
A young girl�s strange behaviour has her family believing that she has been possessed by an evil spirit. An exorcist is called when things get out of hand.
Krishna falls in love with Nandini, a rich businessman's daughter. When her father disapproves, Krishna tries various methods to win him over.
When conjoined twins Charu and Latha fall for the same man, fate plays a cruel game in which the sisters have to make painful choices.
Back from abroad, Chaitra's father visits his village with the family. However, because of his strict nature, they decide to stay back in Madikeri.
A group of cousins set off on a fun trip before one of them gets married. But their plans are ruined by a murder. Will they unravel the mystery behind it?
The players of a college team ridicule their socially inept 31-year-old waterboy. But, this all changes when the new coach lets him stand up for himself.
Duped by an agent, Babu's Dubai dreams get squashed. While stranded in Mumbai, he meets and falls for Vasundhara, but her uncle has set his evil eyes on her.
Michael and his girlfriend, Anu, often discuss the supernatural, but he does not believe in it. However, his belief changes with one specific pizza delivery.
Sanika, a free-spirited girl, gets caught in the mist of love after she befriends JD online. To meet him, she travels to Goa, which changes her life forever.
A scary journey begins when a small-time thief, Rudra, enters a haunted castle and gets pulled into the mystery of its mistress - Annabelle Rathore.
Vishwas and his two friends plan to marry Shanthi and her sisters. But they get jailed for Shanti's friend's murder. Will they be able to prove their innocence?
Absconding with a minister's money, a conman and his family get trapped inside a haunted bungalow. In order to escape ghosts, he must go back the past.
Khan is a kind-hearted sub-inspector. When he finds a group of underprivileged children harassed by cops, he decides to be their saviour.
Romance blooms between an artistically inclined Tintin and a free-spirited Rohini. But as they plan to get married, a never-ending loop of problems arises.
Saraswathy Mathew believes in fighting for the rights of the workers. What happens when she finds herself caught in the murder investigation of her husband?
Priya's father's death is a mystery. Vijayan tries to help her resolve it. But there is just one clue that they have - her father's diary.
Bella faces a choice that threatens to reignite the struggle between vampires and werewolves.

title_name: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
description: Jyn's father is forcibly taken by the Empire to help them complete the Death Star. Later, she joins a group of resistance fighters to get her revenge.
Somanath and his friends rape Malani and Madhu. Malani decides to take revenge and kill the perpetrators.
Bar dancer Laura Singh stabs Black, a goon, and escapes with her sister to Kochi when he tries to force her into marriage. She meets Ameer there, but is she safe?
NASA’s 1977 Voyager mission carried a golden record which took the first ever Indian voice to space, that of Kesarbai Kerkar.
After Pappanna betrays them, Shankar and his family plan to commit suicide in a haunted house. But Pappanna gets killed, and his killers hide in the same house.
Journey alongside a young tigress raising her cubs in the fabled forests of India.
Aladdin falls in love with Princess Jasmine. To marry her, he finds a magic lamp that turns him into a prince, but first, he must face the evil Jafar.
Hazel and Augustus are teenagers who meet and fall in love at a cancer support group as the relationship takes them on the journey of a lifetime.
Remy, a rat, aspires to become a renowned French chef. He teams up with an inept young man and scores a job in a restaurant started by his idol.
Swathi is the life of her three doting brothers, Shiva, Raghu and Shankar. However, things take a turn for the worse when she gets married into a rich family.
Manu, a professional kick-boxer, will do anything to fulfil his mother's wish. Through ups and downs, he struggles hard to become the ultimate champion.
Walter and Samy constantly compete at pickpocketing, but Walter wants to become an actor. When they meet the love of their lives, will their mentor approve?
Robin Hood conjures up one famously funny and daring deed after another to outfox greedy Prince John and bring happiness to the residents of Sherwood Forest.
Lifelong friends Pádraic and Colm find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, bringing alarming consequences for both of them.
Radha falls in love with a kind-hearted Suriya after learning about his past. When his paths cross with his old flame, will his heart sway again?
The tale of Tarzan's misadventures as a boy as he searches for his true identity and the meaning of family.
Jeeva takes Kiran under his wing and trains her to handle weapons to avenge the death of her family. In the process, Jeeva confronts his haunting past.
Singer Sanjay discovers Sharanya's talent and convinces her to pursue it. However, she does not go for the recording as her life takes a turn for the worse.
When the sacred elephant of a Vietnamese village is dead, Captain Sam finds a replacement to retain the village chief's loyalty.
Gautham is a businessman and Nithya a sand artist. Both suffer from memory loss but fall in love with each other. What does the future hold for them?
The innocent pair of Tod and Copper frolic in the forest and become the best of pals, unaware that the days ahead will put their friendship to the test!
Pencil is a budding crime novelist looking for inspiration when he crosses paths with five generations of women who come together with for vengeance.
Small-time reporter Engels' life changes drastically when he meets his ancestral goddess Ammoru Thalli. What happens when she puts forth an intriguing plea?
When a group of bus passengers get stuck in a landslide, a single mother struggles to protect her son and secure his oxygen cylinder from a desperate officer.
When Kris Kringle decides to retire on Christmas Eve, Noelle must find her brother Nick and bring him back in time to save Christmas.
Maggie Peyton is the new owner of Herbie, a freewheelin' Volkswagon bug as she aims to become a NASCAR competitor.
When his father refuses to support his choice of a career, an aspiring chef tries to fulfil his dream by helping his grandfather run his small eatery.
In dire need of money, Jerry gets drawn into the dangerous world of drug trafficking. Things go awry when she decides to quit.
Herc, the mighty son of Zeus, discovers the truth about his origins and sets out to prove himself a hero so he can return to his mythological home.
Arjun and Shravan are close friends. When Kalappa Kariyanna tries to molest Shravan's wife, Prakruthi, she kills him. What happens next?
Maari, a local don, in his new naughty-turned-nice avtar, manages to get into the bad books of Beeja, a Murakami fan, who will stop at nothing to destroy him.
Krishnakumar is a musician studying in an engineering college. He gets attacked when he takes on the real estate mafia and liquor lobby. This changes his life.
A righteous policer officer's life turns chaotic after a key witness in a communal riot case gets killed despite tight security. How will he expose the culprit?
Vasu, a goon, clashes with Mohana in a theatre. Moreover, Tulasi Das, a crime boss who has an axe to grind with Mohana's cop father, hires Vasu to kidnap her.
Eshwar aka Chitta's world crumbles when his beloved niece goes missing. Will this emotional pursuit test the limits of love?
Sahana and Karan, a young working married couple, discover how overwhelming parenthood can be, its consequent impact on their careers and priorities.
Sangolli Rayanna, a brave patriot, served the kingdom of Kittur in the 19th century. Watch his story as he revolted against the British and fought colonialism.
After Sonia rejects him, Dharani meets Kallaka. However, he tries to hide his past when she begins to get over-possessive of him.
Priya Nair, Manu's boss, is a short-tempered lady, who treats everyone badly. When her promotion is due, she pretends to be Manu's fianc�e. Will he play along?
Separated at childhood, a set of triplets find their calling in life. Years later, when they cross paths, an old grudge surfaces as a bone of contention.
Garfield not only has to compete with Odie, his newfound rival, for his owner's affection but also rescue him from kidnappers' clutches.
Nick Fury finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster by launching the Avengers initiative.
Sivaji reunites with his daughter who was missing for two decades. On learning that she was kidnapped by his lookalike, Sivaji decides to bring him to book.
Two antiquated robots risk everything for freedom and for each other.
Kariyachan has high hopes for his beloved daughter. However, the entry of a new basketball coach into her college causes tensions between father and daughter.
Ripley squares off against an unholy genetically modified strain of the alien that has haunted her.
A middle-aged couple with twelve children decides to pursue more demanding careers - only to discover that big families and big careers are a difficult mix.
Young Louis suffers from mild autism. He is taken in by Mary Kutty, who is a victim of a bad marriage.
In the kingdom of Atlantica where music is forbidden, Ariel discovers her love of an underground music club and sets off to an adventure to revive music.
Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.
Teacher turned sub-inspector, Biju Poulose goes through several ups and downs in his career. Will he emerge victorious through it all?
"Playing with Sharks" captures the life of Valerie Taylor, a living legend and true pioneer in both underwater filmmaking and shark research.
Saleem is a doctor who does quite a lot of social work and lives a happily engaged life, until he takes on the case of a gangrape victim.
Madhavi, a child bride, loses her husband in an accident. Years later, she decides to marry her lover until a blast from the past creates trouble.
A film director's son falls in love with a rickshaw driver's daughter while shooting for a film. But will this love story see a happy ending?
During the pandemic, Kalidasan gets stranded in his newly rented flat which turns out to be haunted. How will he cope with this eerie and mysterious lockdown?
Singer Raphael falls ill and gets admitted to a five-star hospital. While he witnesses unethical practices there, he is shocked to learn that he was adopted.
Dr Anand drops a mysterious woman at a cemetery. Later, he experiences a chain of strange events connected to the woman. How will he unravel this mystery?
Alagar manages the family's red chilli business. He has a quiet life until he decides to rescue Thenmozhi from the clutches of three criminal brothers.
Film star Kallesh, vegetable seller Mallesh and a local goon Chik Chethan are lookalikes. Their similar looks lead to a comedy of errors and confusion.
When Ajay and Madhu's rich dads oppose their relationship with Kajal and Raja because they are poor, the four rally behind their love and concoct ways to rebel.
An accidental meeting brings Jyothi face to face with her long lost love, Karthik, who has become a notorious gangster. Can Jyothi bring him back on track?
Haribabu and Sita's love story is cut short when her brother Eeshwar kills her. Years later, Haribabu and Eeshwar come face to face in a war-torn Germany.
Terrorist Charles hijacks a bus carrying politicians and demands the release of his henchmen from prison. Ex-cop Ali is entrusted with the job of catching him.
Trying to cope with the hardships, Bhamini and Anil's life turns catastrophic as Lucky Singh invades. Secrets unveil when this uninvited guest starts his game.
Honest police officer Hrishikesh takes on the corrupt from within the system and the underworld after he begins investigating a bomb blast.
When the daughter of a business tycoon gets abducted, two divine serpents rescue her. However, they are unaware of the danger they are facing.
Gowtham suffers from anger issues and falls in love with Tara, an independent, practical girl. Time forces them to make tough choices. Will they part ways?
Mechanic Manoharan leads a happy and simple life with his family. But his life takes a turn for the worse when the sketch of a bomb-blast accused resembles him.
Anil and Malini are college sweethearts. Though their marriage gets fixed, complications soon arise.
Hari, a teenager faces modern religious divides, when his interfaith parents face racism and other criticism during a financial crisis.
Ananthan returns to his hometown to fulfil his mother's last wish. But there he encounters the black magician Digambaran, all set to turn his life upside down.
Neelima and Aisha are engineering students. Their life takes a turn when they befriend Karthik, who studies in the same college, and his pal Kunjumon.
Howard is the untold story of Howard Ashman, the brilliant lyricist behind Disney classics like The Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast, and Aladdin.
Rookie officer Veerababu finds himself smitten by Haritha, a captivating village belle. When faced with challenges, will his love stand the test?
Gautham and Shreya's love story takes a turn for the worse when her father learns about his past. Will he accept Gautham openly after that?
Raghuram joins college where he meets Sindhu. While she falls for him, he thinks of her as a friend. Offended, she decides to take the legal route.
Satyavati's pilgrim to Badrinath gets cancelled due to her son's illicit acts. As his atrocious behaviour grows by the day, what will she do?
Four humans gain superpowers after being transported to an alternate universe. And, together they have to prevent Doctor Doom from destroying the Earth.
In a hilarious turn of events, Gaurav and his friends rediscover themselves when they decide to follow their hearts and defy the expectations of society.
A day after Kaladarshana, a mimicry group, performs in jail, the son of their old nemesis, Khader Bhai, is found murdered. The troupe comes under suspicion.
Following the deaths of intelligence officials, IAS officer Joseph Alex and supercop Bharathchandran get involved in the case, only to uncover a terrorist plot.
A dutiful son, a prince in his fathers' eyes, retains his purity of character despite the many challenges thrown his way.
In the wilds of Yukon, a sledge dog named Buck experiences the adventure of a lifetime as he finds his true place in the world.
Ajay has an affair with Sofia, the wife of his boss, Sheshadri. Later, Ajay and Sofia kill Mayuri, his former lover. Will they be able to hide their crime?
A group of students camping in a forest accidentally set free a spirit who is out to avenge her murder. What happens when she begins to kill them one by one?
Gopalan, the trade union leader, fights against the illegal activities and corruption in Vasukuttan's factory. Will he be able to handle Vasukuttan's fury?
A city-bred girl falls for a village boy who moves to the city for his studies. Tragedy strikes when his fiancée dies, making him mentally unstable.
Tragedy strikes the lives of two brothers, Raj and Kumar, when their father is killed. They strike back by deciding to avenge their father's death.
The search of his missing brother leads a man to a dreaded truth about him. But when he meets his brother's enemies, all hell breaks loose.
A mentally challenged Chanti moves to Ooty with his mother to work at a tea estate. Things take an ugly turn when he finds out a shocking truth about his boss.

title_name: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
description: The ancient tablet of Ahkmenrah is dying, which means the end of the magic of the museum. Larry Daley heads to London to save the museum with his allies.
Adu weaves a web of mystery as it takes the audience into the world of black magic.
Kunjachan, a small-time thug, gets freed from jail. His attempts to lead a good life goes for a toss when he meets Mikhael and gets trapped in his family feud.
The film touches upon the humorous side of two very important aspects of law - the police and the advocates.
Manoj and Neelima's love life is shattered when Balaji falls for her. In an unexpected turn of events, Manoj gets framed for a murder.
Four friends with a history of troubled childhood reunite at a resort. As their past and present collides, unforeseen consequences fill up the night.
Vasu, who belongs to a close-knit joint family, falls in love with Sri, a businessman's daughter. Will he convince her father to believe in age-old rituals?
Facebook friends Kittu and Lalli decide to meet, but nervousness makes them send someone else in their place. What will this confusion lead to?
Shankar Gawde a faithful aide of Forest Minister Prakash Jadhav is blinded by his devotion. However, his world shatters when Jadhav frames him for a crime.
Aditya and Tara fall in love and decide on a live-in relationship. However, their perception of marriage changes when they meet an old couple in love.
Former military captain John Carter finds himself battling a new and mysterious war in the wounded planet of Mars.
A Sanskrit expert-cum-tantric sets out to solve the murder of his brother in a haunted house. Is it a vengeful spirit or a skewed Vastu that killed him?
Three childhood friends get caught up in a web of gambling and betting. Easy money or trouble, where will this addiction take them?
When two siblings go against their father's will to choose a career of their liking, an unexpected rivalry takes over their relationship. Who will win?

title_name: Mickey: The Story of a Mouse
description: A look at Mickey's evolution into different versions that reflect his creator and society's changes.
Engaged to Anwar, Sajna rejects Ameer, who is poor. However, her marriage gets cancelled. Will she now accept Ameer, who still loves her?
The Mighty Ducks are selected to compete in the Junior Goodwill Games as Team USA competing against the best teams from all over the world.
Based on a true story, this is a heart touching account of a Parsi couple’s search for their son who went missing during the 2002 Gujarat riots.
Rani and Jackie are lookalikes with totally different personalities. Major confusion takes over when Raju, a photographer, enters their lives.
Mini and Pushpabaran are happily married. Chaos ensues with the arrival of Mini's dominating mother, who firmly believes that a wife should rule her husband.
A business tycoon from Portugal gets engaged to a rich girl with an ulterior motive. But his life turns upside down when he goes to his native land.

title_name: Night at the Museum: Kahmunrah Rises Again
description: Nick Daley is the new night watchman at the American Museum of Natural History. When the maniacal ruler Kahmunrah escapes, it is up to Nick to save the museum once.
As a collection of history's worst tyrants and criminal masterminds gather to plot a war to wipe out millions, one man must race against time to stop them.

Geeya Geeya is a Kannada romance drama. It's about Jeeva and Swarna who share a love-hate relationship. Directed by Krishna Reddy, it stars Akshay Krishna and Swarnamalya. Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.
In this live-action retelling of 1992 classic, Aladdin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that can make their deepest wishes come true.
Dumbo has huge floppy ears, with the support of his best friend, Timothy, he learns that his spectacular ears make him unique and special.
Kutty's job is to build houses for Georgekutty, an NRI. To settle his debts, he rents them out. However, Georgekutty arrives unexpectedly and chaos ensues.
The last thing bank receptionist Harleen wanted was to be used as a decoy for a mysterious thief who stole the Kohinoor. What awaits her next?
RTO officer Om Prakash strikes a golden opportunity to meet his icon, Vijay Kumar. But when his love gets spurned by the superstar, a clash of egos ensues.
Ishaan, a music producer, is commitment-phobic until he starts feeling a connection with Gauri, his next-door neighbour.
The mundane life of a woman running a photocopy shop goes into a tailspin when a revolutionary writer leaves the manuscript of his unpublished novel with her.
Raghava, a grumpy cab driver, ferries Vijay, an heir to millions, who has to reach court in time for a major hearing. Will the crabby cabbie help or hinder him?
Mariyana comes to a mental asylum for research and meets Sidharthan, one of the patients, whose unique personality and spirituality makes her study him more.
Surya hates women. He decides to teach Amrutha a lesson after overhearing her talking against men. When Amrutha learns of his trick, she decides to play along.
Vengamamba's life becomes hell when her husband dies. An ardent devotee of Lord Venkateswara, will he help her through difficult times?
The animosity between the two brothers extends to their wives and children. However, what happens when the younger generation ends up paying the price?
Balachandran, an undercover cop, sets out to investigate gold smuggling in a hospital. While on his mission, he uncovers shocking details.
When his dreams of becoming a CBI officer is shattered, Iniyan, along with some friends, pose as CBI officials and raid the corrupt.
Sing along with your favourite songs with on-screen lyrics as you watch “Beauty and the Beast."
The Mighty Morphin Power Rangers come to rescue the planet from the other-worldly villainess Divatox.
Kadhir, an irresponsible youth, relentlessly pursues his neighbour Anitha. His life takes a change of course after she helps him discover his true self.
Venkat and his friends go to Rangoon for an illegal business deal and end up getting embroiled in some unexpected situations. How will they get out of it?
After being hurtled from Rio de Janeiro, Blu, his wife Jewel, and three kids go back to the jungles of Amazon. Will the city bird family fit into the wild?
Rishi is shattered to learn about his uncle's hand in his parents' murder. Now he has to succeed in overpowering his uncle, who has become an underworld don.
Hard-working Rahul and good-for-nothing Karan's lives turn upside down when Rahul is accused of the rape and murder spree happening in the city.
Sanjana's fortune changes when she becomes an actress and marries a film financier. But when her past clashes with her present, she makes a harsh choice.
Himanshu and Parminder are all set to tie the knot but things go hilariously wrong when he tries adding adventure to his love story.
Uma is in love with her childhood friend Charley and believes he loves her too. But Charley leaves to learn music and returns with Manasi.
Vaishnavi and Sandeep's love life takes a spooky turn when Vaishnavi gets possessed by Mohini's spirit, who looks exactly like her. A sinister coincidence?
Famous painter Chandru takes shelter in Ranga's house and rapes Ganga. He later marries her, but she is not happy.
Unable to find a house, Srinivas and Padmavathi pretend to be a married couple to find one. However, things get complicated when they fall in love eventually.
"Director by Night" follows film composer Michael Giacchino’s first foray into directing.
Zed and Addison continue to steer Seabrook High toward unity! But the arrival of a group of mysterious werewolves shakes things up and causes a rift between them.
The government sends an engineer to build a dam in a drought-hit village. However, an evil force hinders his work.
Rajeev and Pranathi are lovers. While Santosh helps Rajeev go abroad, Pranathi starts working with him. But rumours spread about Santosh and Pranathi.
Hari leaves his village and goes to Banaras for higher studies. He gets into a relationship with Amritha, but the love of his life is waiting for him back home.
Bhoominathan has a pressing mission on Earth just before he steps on Mars. This NASA astronaut will stop at nothing for the farmers of his native village.
Amidst the chaos of demonetisation, down-on-luck Armaan finds a business opportunity in money laundering. Where will this shortcut take him?
In the Anjootti family, not even a leaf moves without Michael's will. When rebellious youngsters start revolting, how will Michael hold his ground?
Bud Fox, an ambitious stockbroker, meets Gordon Gekko, who takes him under his wing and leads him to a world of fast money, women and immoral business deals.
Venkateswara wants to make it big on TV by landing a juicy scandal. He falls for Alekhya, and somehow they get targeted by a gang of thugs. What's the way out?
Jaitun, Jugnu and Vijay's dreams are hanging by a thread. While they struggle to prove their mettle, life keeps taking them for a spin.
For Nachiketa, his mother is his life. However, his wicked neighbour plans to kill her. How will Nachiketa save his mother from evil hands?
Aaron, a blind boy, strives to become a cricketer. He finds hope after he joins the Indian cricket team for the blind and meets its coach.
Village landlord Shruthi gets a bank notice for a loan she never took. On enquiring, she is told that it was for the construction of a well that does not exist.

title_name: Bono & The Edge: A Sort of Homecoming with Dave Letterman
description: Bono and the Edge invite Dave Letterman to Dublin for a unique performance of their songs.
To defend their home against poaching, four friends embark on a mission assisted by their companions, a squirrel and a bear. Will they succeed?
With an aim to become an honest cop, Dhana teams up with the police commissioner to round up few criminals. What happens when he finds out he's being framed?
A woman spends all her savings to buy a vintage car, only to discover that it is haunted by a revenge-hungry ghost.
After years of being away in Dubai, Joshua returns for his sister's funeral. But it gets weird when he starts seeing his beloved sister's spirit.
Kaththi leads an aimless life until he falls in love with Parineetha and wins her over. However, he must also win the challenges put forth by her father.
Back in his village after six years of forced exile, Sreehari tries to catch up on the time lost. However, he finds that things have changed drastically.
Rayudu lets out his ancestral home, Gandharva Mahal, but the future in-laws of his elder daughter want it as dowry. However, the house comes with a deadly past.
A commitment-phobic man gets engaged to his girlfriend of three years. But he is unable to fulfil his duties, and they break up. Will love triumph in the end?
Dr. Strange faces a difficult choice of whether to return to his life of luxury or to protect the world as the most powerful sorcerer in existence.
A poor man saves an abandoned child from a cruel life. However, the girl breaks his heart when she grows up to be spoilt, arrogant brat.
Nandakumar and Ananthan are doctor brothers. While treating one of his patients, Nandakumar makes a mistake. Will Ananthan be able to help him?
Goddess Lakshmi is the mediator between Vishnu and his devotees. But it is her embodiment of love, forgiveness and fortune that makes her auspicious.
Lovers Shiva and Sindhya get married after she gets pregnant. Her psychiatrist brother comes up with a plan to get him a job, but what are his true intentions?
In a village plagued by black magic, a policeman sets off to seek justice for his brother's meaningless murder but discovers something unexpected.
Orphan Balan rescues a girl when thugs attack her. Indebted, her father provides him with a home, and he soon becomes part of the family.
Sister Achamma's decision to give up nunhood does not go down well with the church authorities. Will they ever understand her dilemma behind her decision?
A business man throws his son out of the house on discovering his MBA lies. Managing life without money, he falls in love with a woman who spells danger.
Criminals have their eyes set on a magical stone, which has the power to rule the world. But there's only one man who can guard the stone and save the world.
The life of an automobile mechanic based out of Detroit, takes a tragic turn when he gets compelled to participate in the city's booming drug trade.
Caught smuggling for Ittichan who refuses to help him get bail, Achutty goes to jail. Years later, when he is released, he is determined to take his revenge.
Mike and Sulley, two arch-rivals, join the Monsters University to graduate as the scariest monsters on the planet.
Set in the Comanche Nation 300 years ago, this is the story of Naru, a fierce and skilled warrior, who hunts an alien predator with a technically advanced arsenal.
A spirited young mermaid makes a deal with an evil sea witch that allows her to experience life on land, but that ultimately puts her life in jeopardy.
Her grandmother's ailment forces Carrie to leave the pavement of the big city for a ranch in Wyoming where she bonds with a wild horse.
Voice is an RJ's treasure, but what happens when he starts losing it? As Shankar battles laryngeal cancer, Dr Reshmi tries to bring back his lost hope.
Madhavan is disliked by his family when he opposes their illegal ideas. He leaves for a pilgrimage. Things take a turn when Madhavan gets implicated for murder.

title_name: Forky Asks A Question: What is Time?
description: Rex uses the age of dinosaurs as an example to give Forky an understanding of the concept of time.
Devadas Menon and Bhavani's daughter goes missing after a bus accident during a school trip. However, more shocks await them.
Owner of Janatha Garage, Satyam earns a reputation as the saviour of the neighbourhood. His life changes when he meets Anand, an environmental science student.

title_name: Star Wars Rebels: Twilight Of The Apprentice
description: After gaining information about the Sith, Kanan, Ezra and Ahsoka battle the Inquisitors with the help of a new ally.
Ittoop, Kochuthresiamma's happiness knows no bounds as it's their youngest granddaughter's engagement. Things go for a toss when Ittoop gets an old love letter.
In a desperate attempt to save his job, a reporter takes up the task of interviewing a lawyer, Deepa. While she is busy, Vineeth has a tough time chasing her.
Young footballer Sam is looked down on because of his financial condition. How will he overcome the rage of his peers when he is appointed as the team captain?
Shankar, an aspiring cop, gets into a fight with his village head. To settle the score, the village head leaves no stone unturned in hindering Shankar's dream.
Dhoolpet is teeming with notorious criminals and their activities go unchecked, until a father-son duo of cops set out to stamp out crime.
The story follows Thomas Popper, who buys a restaurant called Tavern on the Green while watching the penguins and growing closer to his family in the process.
A bright college student, Manya Surve, sets foot on the wrong path when his brother is shot dead. Based on a true story.
When kicked out of his house of being good for nothing, Nanda becomes a hitman. Nandita, who loves him, is shattered when she witnesses him committing a crime.
A passionless marriage leads a woman to have an affair with her college love. But their liaison turns dangerous when her her husband learns of it.
Alex must defend his house and himself from four wanted hitmen, who want to recover the chip located inside his toy car.
Jafar comes for revenge on Aladdin, using a foolish thief and Iago's treachery to find a way back into power.
In this highly anticipated trequel, The VKs return to the Isle of the Lost to recruit a new batch of villainous offsprings to join them at Auradon Prep.
Suruli and Mynaa are lovers, much to her mother's distress. The situation worsens for the cornered couple when the police get involved.
As her parents are against her relationship with Babu, a painter, rich girl Sosamma elopes with him. However, they face many challenges in the city.
Scott Cassell takes his manned submersible beneath the waves to examine the myths about the Great White shark.
When Inferno's powers are stolen by a young and powerful villain, it's upto the Secret Warriors to defeat their new foe and help their friend.
Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker as the Resistance prepares for battle with the First Order.
Mater decides he wants to learn to fly and is recruited by the elite group, the Falcon Hawks. At the big airshow, Air Mater is joined by Lightning McQueen Hawk
An undercover agent is assigned to expose a drug racket and make a wanted drug lord come out of hiding. Will he succeed?
The government's decision to push a Hero Registration Act to regulate heroes creates a rift among the Avengers and other heroes.
Getting a new sibling at 25 is the last thing Nakul expected. Will he ever come to terms with the embarrassing 'good news' of his parents being pregnant?
This special explores the return of Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker to the screen, as well as Ewan McGregor and Hayden Christensen to their classic roles.
Father Sunny learns that Vavachan is running an illegal trade in his old-age home. When Sister Sophy shares proof, the priest and the nun face shocking charges.
Sekhar, a carefree youngster, works for his father. A conflict between his father and a politician makes him take a step that could change his life forever.
Krishna's parents want him to marry, but his bitter past hampers his decision. However, the girl selected for him agrees to marriage after he opens up to her.
Sulley, a lovable monster, and his friend Mike try their best to help a little girl to return home after she accidentally wanders into Monstropolis.
Adrenaline gets addictive for Mumbai-based stuntman Siddharth! Ready to make a mark in the outlaw competition ‘Maidaan’, inescapable risks await him.
Krishna goes abroad for studies. While he plans to settle down there, his parents wait for his return home.
Raghu, a great detective with some of the toughest cases to his credit, is assigned the task of finding a dangerous outlaw who kidnaps children for ransom.
Based on the life of infamous sandalwood dacoit, Veerappan, the film charts the events leading to Operation Cocoon, his ultimate downfall.
A father finds his missing son in an orphanage after ten years. However, the boy has lost his memory, and the orphanage owner claims that he is his son.
Balakrishnan, a teacher, falls for his colleague Nirmala. He decides to accompany her to her village but is unprepared for what happens during the journey.
Lord Shiva blesses Mrukanda Maharshi with a child. Markandeya is meant to live only till he is 16. But he worships Shiva with devotion and even overcomes Yama.

title_name: Winnie The Pooh: A Very Merry Pooh Year
