description: Winnie the Pooh and his pals in the Hundred Acre Wood celebrate Christmas and New Year's Eve in this holiday special.

title_name: The Art of Racing in the Rain
description: A heartfelt tale narrated by a philosophical dog named Enzo, who through his bond with his owner, has gained tremendous insight into the human condition.
Pluto is pressed into duty to deliver a sack of mail to a remote arctic outpost helped by a playful arctic rabbit.
Asha is a college-going girl who works at an orphanage. When she plans to raise funds for the orphans, things take a difficult turn.
Ten years after the revolution, Anya is separated from her family. She teams up with conmen Dmitri and Vladimir to reunite with her family.
Tamizh's life takes a drastic turn when his father commits suicide. Determined, he sets off to find the perpetrators, who have a link to his past.
Two lovers face a lot of challenges because of their relationship. Will they be able to overcome the obstacles that come in their path?
A new holiday adventure that features magical storybooks, catchy songs, stop-motion animation…and drugs! Lots of them! Merry Bingemas!
Irandaam Aatam is the next offering from Vijay Chithiram, a story of a wife who struggles to keep her husband grounded when middle age crisis strikes.
The childless king Rajasekhara Pandiyan adopts an abandoned child found in a forest. That little prince grows up to be Lord Ayyappan.
Raja Harishchandra was known for upholding truth and justice under any circumstance. He did not even spare his family when it came to honesty and equity.
Dinesh is madly in love with Shobha. A successful businesswoman, she can't stand his lackadaisical attitude. Will he mend his ways and win her over?
Bobby's feud with Jambulinga Satyamurthy takes an ugly turn when the latter's brother is killed. How will Bobby escape the clutches of a vengeful Satyamurthy?
Ghost-Spider teams-up with the Secret Warriors to bring down the villains Sheath and Exile. Can Quake convince Ghost-Spider to join the team?
Appukuttan goes to town pretending to be his twin brother and do dirty work for a goon. Trouble arises when he falls for the goon's daughter.
Police officer Vikram finally captures Vedha, a dreaded gangster. When the latter engages Vikram in a mind game, it challenges his notion of good and evil.
Tenida and his inseparable friends arrive in Darjeeling on a blissful holiday. Soon, they meet a scientist and embark on a new mission to save the town.
On realising that his wife and best friend share similar interests, the once happily-married Appu starts suspecting them of having an affair.
When Raja's mother, Shanthamma, insists that his wife, Thara, abort her baby, she refuses and leaves the house. Raja then marries Radha.
An orphan, Parvathi, marries a rich man only to leave him. Now, their son, Prabhu, will play Cupid and reunite his parents.
A neighbourhood park is under threat and is to be taken over by a corporate company. The locals stand up and protect what is theirs.
A local guy Bobby takes on a corrupt panchayat president, creating unrest all over. However, only his elder sister can control him.
Kunjikrishnan and Unnikrishnan are the sons of a village ayurvedic physician. While Unnikrishnan becomes a doctor, his brother poses as a godman and fools all.
Savitri is humiliated at her in-laws' house. Unable to take it anymore, she vows revenge on her in-laws and decides to turn their home into a battleground.
Vishnu lives in a men's lodge where the primary vice of the tenants is drinking after work. However, over time, that vice turns to addiction.
Obbava's lover Badri gets killed while fighting a don who is after her father's wealth. To seek revenge, Badri's spirit enters Obbava's body to seek revenge.
Nagamma and Vasanth Shetty engage in various crimes, including kidnappings. Inspector Prathap, an encounter specialist, takes them on.
A meek village girl switches place with her tomboyish lookalike. While everyone is shocked by the personality change, the village girl does the unthinkable.
Ram Pathare faces hurdles while arranging finance for his new venture. Frustrated and angry with the local MLA, he decides to take their power back.
During one of his official trips, Keshavan meets Reetha and gets involved with her, thus neglecting his family. What happens when he learns the truth about her?
Kochu, a spoilt brat, breaks ties with his family and leaves after a heated argument. Years later, he returns for his share in the property. But will he get it?
With the help of her coach and the boy who drives the Zamboni machine, Casey pursues her dream to be a champion figure skater against her mother's wishes.
Ajay is wrongly convicted as a rapist and sent to prison for seven years. After four years he’s out for good behaviour but seeks revenge.
Caught in a tricky situation, Pooja pretends to be engaged to Kabir. However, she must find a way to tell her boss that she is really in love with his son, Raj.
Rabi falls in love with Riya, who lives in a slum. Initially reluctant, soon she unites with him only to mysteriously disappear one fine day.

title_name: Fantastic Four: Rise Of The Silver Surfer
description: The Fantastic Four meet their greatest challenge yet as the enigmatic, intergalactic herald, The Silver Surfer, comes to Earth to prepare it for destruction.

title_name: Rise Of The Planet Of The Apes
description: Caesar, a chimpanzee, is empowered by a new drug to think and react like humans. When he finds himself subjected to injustice, he decides to revolt.
A famous actress, Gracy, loses her mind and disappears after the girl she adopts dies following a scandal. Reporter Aleena tries to piece Gracy�s life together.
A mix of six stories, the film deals with suspicion, betrayal and mistrust in married lives.
Revathy, Karthik and Vishnu are good friends. While people around them are involved in drug smuggling and other crimes, will they manage to stay out of trouble?
Single mother Meera is a beautiful young woman living in Sydney. However, when she falls in love with an Australian man, Will, it is not just scandalous, it is Un-Indian!
The Coast Guard makes a daring rescue attempt off the coast of Cape Cod after a pair of oil tankers are destroyed during a storm in 1952.
A simple 'mestri' manages workers at a construction site. On observing his workers being exploited by an evil minister, he makes a decision.
In order to prove himself to his ex-fighter dad, KJ demands respect at an underground Compton dojo.
Vishnu agrees to act as Kalyani's husband for a fee that kick-starts a hilarious journey. Things takes a striking turn when Vishnu reveals his true identity.
The sleepy village of Thenkasimangalam witnesses the bitter rivalry between two warring families that stretches three generations.
On the verge of losing it all, down-on-luck stuntman Luo and his horse become overnight celebrities when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.
Mildred Hayes, a woman in her early 50s, goes to war against her local police force, believing them to be too inept to solve the murder of her daughter.
When Jayadev, an honest police officer takes it upon himself to bring justice to his colleague, who is murdered, he has to fight the big fish of the bad world.
The movie is a coming-of-age story about one young boy experiencing an unforgettable summer filled with gelato, pasta and endless scooter rides.
Olaf sets out to comb the kingdom to bring home the best traditions for Elsa and Anna for the holidays.
Deva’s life is shattered when the police implicate him in the murder of his brother and sister. Will he be able to prove his innocence?
Ramakrishna is a successful sportsman whose sister goes missing mysteriously. How will he find her and get her back?
A rich man entraps women for his selfish motives. What happens when he tries to lure a woman one of his employees has fallen for?

title_name: LEGO Star Wars: The New Yoda Chronicles - Duel of Skywalkers
description: After fooling Darth Vader into thinking he was destroyed, Luke Skywalker voyages to Mustafar only to accidently open the remaining Holocron.
Subramanyam, a money-minded guy, helps Seetha get back on her feet after she gets duped by her boyfriend. Things take a hilarious turn when he meets her family.
The movie is the exploration of the rise of one of the greatest cricket players the world has known, Shane Warne.
A failed love marriage makes Kausalya hell-bent on protecting her daughter, Shobha, from falling in love. Can Shobha forgo her feelings for her mother's sake?
Alone for the holidays, Max Mercer will do whatever it takes to protect his home from trespassers.
This short features a welding bot on the Axiom Starliner named BURN-E, who, while repairing a light bulb, is locked out of starliner by EVE and WALL-E.
Friends Chandu and Siri promise to stand by each other through thick and thin. Their friendship takes a backseat when they fall in love with Ritu and Uday.
A stunt biker's life takes a 360-degree turn when he falls in love with an event manager and he has to make a tough choice.
Pampered by her brothers, Parvathi becomes an arrogant girl. When she accuses Sivasankaran of misbehaving with her, he decides to take a tough stand.
Though diagnosed with cancer, Sheela has to manage a dysfunctional family. Will her son, who comes from London, help her deal with the trauma?

Sthanarthi Saramma is a Malayalam comedy starring Prem Nazir, Adoor Bhasi, Prathapachandran , Nellikkodu Bhaskaran , Sankaradi and directed by K S Sethumadhavan. Saramma is in love with Johny and they wish to get married. Saramma's father Mathai is a converted Christian and the conservative Christians do not approve of the relationship. Watch the full movie, Sthanarthi Saramma, online, only on Hotstar.
The film is based on a real-life rescue mission to save the Indian nurses stranded in Tikrit, Iraq, during the country's civil war in 2014.
A spiritual leader receives a death threat leading to a series of murders. Police Superintendent Haridas Damodaran is assigned the task to investigate the case.
A jealous Captain Thomas suspects his girlfriend Alice, a teacher, of having an affair with one of her students, and he takes a drastic step.
Small-time lawyer Tenali Ramakrishna will do anything to make money, even lose a case on purpose. But then he takes up a case that changes his life forever.
Sathya's simple life takes a drastic turn after he tries to help an unknown woman in trouble. How will he escape from this complicated situation?
Gautham, an intelligent mountaineer, runs an institute in the Himalayas. When an aeroplane with confidential documents crashes, he is assigned to recover it.

title_name: Home Alone 2: Lost In New York
description: Kevin is left behind in New York during Christmas season, and he is fending off burglars again at an abandoned house in a new city.
IPS officer Arun Kumar is assigned a case of a missing patient from the mental asylum. While on the job, he exposes many secrets about the asylum and outside it.
Much in love, Nanda and Aankhi are all set to marry each other. However, when Nanda fails to show up at the altar, Aankhi sets out in search of him.
Anjali and Raj meet in Europe and fall in love, unaware that they are spying on each other for their best friends.
After a rescue mission in space, Jean Grey behaves unstably. The X-Men must find a way to save her soul and our very planet from this menacing force.
Duraisingam is a fierce cop who falls in love with Kavya. Their lives take an action-packed turn when they cross paths with Mayil Vaaganam, an extortionist.
Major Mahadevan and his team of commandos put their lives at risk to save the hostages when an Indian aircraft gets hijacked by terrorists.
Taking us back to the 1962 Sino-Indian War; this is the story of a disabled man, popularly known as Tubelight, his love for his family and self-belief.
An honest cop, Bharath, does not hesitate to take on anyone, even the home minister. But his actions lead to dangerous consequences.
Abandoned as a child near Mookambika Temple, Aravindan does odd jobs at a guest house, keeping everyone happy. However, he secretly desires to meet his mother.
When Jay's Dubai-based uncle stops his monthly allowance, Jay and his friends come up with a plan to make some cash. But is their plan foolproof?
From a regular boy to becoming the first Indian to open a football club, here's the journey of Nagendra Prasad Sarbadhikari, the Father of Indian Football.
T.P. Balagopalan is a middle-class postgraduate who lives for his family. He meets Anitha, falls for her and loses a lot in loving her.

title_name: folklore: the long pond studio sessions
description: An intimate musical concert featuring Taylor Swift performing every song from her recent album “folklore.”
Prashant and his friends decide to take a break. They go to a forest but get lost there. However, during their return, strange things begin happening to them.
When publicly embarrassed, photographer Selvam vows to not wear slippers until he has avenged the humiliation, thereby triggering a chain of hilarious events.
Indu falls in love with Raju, an orphan, but her aunt, Dr Rajalakshmi, opposes their relationship. What happens when Rajalakshmi realises Raju's true identity?
The AKs and VKs prepare for Auradon's Jewel-bilee ceremony!
Navarathna's husband dies in a car crash. Enter Akash who gets attracted to her. But when he refuses to marry her as she is a widow, she finds an alternative.
A singer who specialises in the Janapada culture of folk songs falls in love with a city girl. However, his fame draws some evil elements to disrupt his life.
Radha Krishna lands a job as a police officer. After a bomb blast at an election campaign, he sets out to uncover the truth.
Shiva falls in love with Indu, the daughter of a local politician. When circumstances separate the lovers, Shiva discovers Indu's ulterior motive.
The incredible tale of Bella Baxter, a young woman brought back to life by a brilliant and unorthodox scientist.
Unaware of Varun’s intentions, Pakhi decides to marry him. Left at the altar, she must face his harsh truth.

Thangiya Mane is a Kannada drama starring Vijay, Swathi, Bhavya, Shobaraj, Dharma and Sarika. Written, directed and produced by M.S. Srinivas, the film explores the limits of sister's love and family's devotion. Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.
After years of prayer for a son, King Ishwarkutty of Nagamadam is upset when a girl is born. Unaware that she is blessed, he tries to kill the princess.
A classic adventure story about the friendship between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.
Classmates Akash and Nandini are in love with each other. However, Akash is arrested for rape when photographs of Nandini get leaked.
A victim of circumstances, disillusioned Julie becomes a call girl. She meets Mihir, and they fall in love. Will he accept her for what she is?
Government employee Shivaramakrishnan struggles with his life. To earn extra money, he and his friends start a day-care centre. But things are not easy.
Appu, Sabu, Balan and Dileep dream of meeting their favourite actress, Khushboo. What happens when Dileep gets a chance to act in a movie opposite her?
Small-time reporter Engels' life changes drastically when he meets his ancestral goddess Mookuthi Amman. What happens when she puts forth an intriguing plea?
A game of Ouija board goes hilariously wrong when seven bachelors unexpectedly invite a spirit and try to make the best out of the situation.
Tony Stark builds an AI system named Ultron, and when things go wrong, it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villain from enacting his terrible plan.
In this new chapter, a group of cold-blooded killers are brought together on an alien planet to be hunted by a new breed of alien Predators.
Veerabhadran takes over the village after the death of his father. Though he has a heart of gold, he rules with an iron hand amongst disputes and deceit.
A wheelchair-bound man's desperate attempts to trace his lost love and daughter lead to well-meaning guys 'finding' his offspring and chaos ensue.
A successful model marries a rich businessman. Soon she realises that he has a big agenda in life, and that is to avenge his friend's death.
Ronak, a music composer, loses his talent and hearing to drugs, alcohol and a devastating accident. Enter Gauri. Can she rekindle his passion for music?
An incomplete teenage romance, a school reunion and a heartbreaking blast from the past, how will Ram and Jaanu tie the loose ends of their love story?
A lionhearted taxi driver Balu's life takes an action-packed turn when he steps in to protect a charitable trust from a greedy and ruthless mafia don.

Research professor Albert Dooley is stuck with past-due bills and one dense lab duck. But an ordinary bird turns extraordinary when he is accidentally zapped with radiation and casually starts laying the golden eggs.
A dejected Piglet sadly wanders off into the woods, realizing that he is missing, his remorseful friends use his scrapbook as a map to find him.
Pemba, a mamma's boy, is forced to mature fast after her mother's injury to survive! Can he sever those apron strings and face his fears to launch into adulthood?
A suspended RAW agent lives in despair after losing his wife at the hands of a drug lord. Years later, he sets out to avenge her death.
Captain Vijay forms a bond with his uncle Kumaran. When Kumaran dies after an accident, Vijay learns a shocking truth and sets out to avenge his death.
Naveen falls in love with Pallavi. However, circumstances lead her to believe that he is a cheat, and this threatens to destroy their relationship.
A software engineer falls for a sex worker, and the two decide to get married. But will she be able to leave her dreaded life behind?
When a businessman's murder makes news, the manner in which the crime is executed leaves the police without any leads. Then DCP Niranjan takes over the case.
Best friends Aravindan, Chandru and Krishnamoorthy get separated after a secret from the past resurfaces. Will fate help the trio to reunite?
The special feature follows two lady cadets through their journey at the Officer’s Training Academy where they undergo rigorous training to join the Indian Army.
After their break-up following her father's disapproval, Sweety and Gagan go their separate ways. But destiny has other plans in store for them.
The film traces the investigations following the serial blasts that rocked Bombay in 1993 via different perspectives - police, victims and the traitors.
The movie documents the lives of senior year girls of high school step dance team in Baltimore.
Kuttiyappan is notorious for his relationships with women. His life takes a turn when he sets out to fulfil one of his strange fantasies.
An attempt to stop illegal activities in the neighbourhood puts smuggler Simon's life in danger as he becomes the target of the local gangster.
When fear grips Chennai as girls get abducted in the city, blind ex-cop Durga becomes the prime witness in the case and the kidnapper's object of obsession.
Chanchala, an honest IAS officer imprisoned in a haunted house, gets possessed by the spirit of an ancient princess.
A celebrated cop is forced to commit crimes before a suicide bomber blows up a school. As he races against time, the idyllic town around him descends into chaos.
An educated woman from a small town adopts a baby girl. After several years, she gets to know that the child is HIV+ since birth.
Raised by three eccentric uncles, Sapna is pampered and protected. Unaware that Sapna is in love with Raja, the three set out to find a suitor for her.
Unaware that their lookalikes are using their identities for petty thefts, honest cops Arjun Singh and Pyare Mohan are baffled. Can they catch the duplicates?
Minnal and Vasu work in a circus. However, their friendship is put to test when Minnal disapproves of Vasu's relationship with her sister.
Dr Ruben Isaac is praised for his gentle way of dealing with mentally ill patients. However, he gets a shock when another doctor claims to be the real Dr Ruben.
Ramu is married to Kaveri, but she is in love with his best friend, Vasu. Several years later, Vasu returns, and Ramu gets suspicious.
Animals that have adapted to survive in the most hostile places on Earth must now adjust to a new reality in the blink of an eye.
A criminal who looks like the marshal of a village decides to save them from a villain. Meanwhile, the appearance of half a treasure map makes things exciting.
Mammootty and Ravi are freedom fighters, who face many challenges and hardships when they fight against the British during India's freedom struggle.
A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom.
Barber Kumaran has to look for his missing father if he wants to marry Lakshmi. Besides this condition, her rich father tries his best to separate the lovers.
Gauri moves into a mansion with her husband, Jai but feels trapped by the haunting shadow of his late wife. Fighting her fears, she unveils some grisly secrets.
Narayanankutty is a handicapped man who owns a stationery shop. Things take a turn for the worse when he unknowingly gets embroiled in a murder case.
An unconventional English teacher encourages his prep school students to put their individuality before norms and follow their own dreams.
Venu gets a job at a detective agency and meets Madhu through one of his cases. However, he soon realises that all his subjects are being killed mysteriously.
After her father's death, Sarada faces the responsibility of looking after the family. However, a meeting with Balachandran changes her life for the better.
A pious and disciplined master carpenter is quite firm in his traditional beliefs. However, his rebellious son refuses to accept them.
In pursuit of his lost sister, an impoverished Sathya gets embroiled in a situation that forces him to impersonate a dead multi-millionaire.
When a young man tries to protect the woman he loves, he learns a secret about his own past. Will this change his relationship with her?
Stuck between the free-spirited Mala and his perfect match, Devika, Amit must choose between his heart and logic.
A collection of four short stories by late writer Saadat Hasan Manto, shedding light on the mayhem during the 1947 Partition of India.
Neha and Samir find out that their adopted child has special needs. When the child's biological mother claims her, the couple must fight with all their might.
After the unexpected death of her husband, Beth is left alone in the lakeside home, where she learns about the secrets behind her disturbing nightmares.
In Japan, Wolverine faces his nemesis in a do-or-die battle as his inner struggles come to the fore. It is an ordeal that will see him change forever.
Velu's past makes him a top underground fighter. To start a new life with his lover, he plans to rob the gangster controlling the street-fighting racket.
Shreya and Omm fall head over heels in love with each other. Problems arise when Shreya’s mother opposes the relationship, but the duo dares to battle all odds.
Out of desperation, unemployed Anil decides to work for Thankappan, a shrewd lottery franchise owner. Will he be able to give his family a decent life?
After her father’s suicide, Meghna gets led by one obsession - vengeance. The trail ends at her estranged mother’s doorstep, sparking a rampage.
Terminally ill Sethu spreads joy among the patients and doctors of a hospital. When he learns that a doctor is in love with a patient, he decides to help them.
A cop falls in love with a girl whose father wouldn't approve of a groom from a different caste. Their lives change when she attempts to end her life.

title_name: Timeless Heroes: Indiana Jones and Harrison Ford
description: Track the legend of Harrison Ford across the years – and the mileage – as movie history is made.
Rich boy Param has always followed his heart. He is in love with Deepa while Sanvi adores him. Whom will he choose between the two?
A thief and his friends experience spooky incidents in an old bungalow, where they are hiding after committing a robbery.
Brilliant student Bhavish falls for Gowri and ends up scoring poorly in his exams. He realises that life is not all about love when she weds someone else.

title_name: The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special
description: On a mission to make Christmas unforgettable for Quill, the Guardians head to Earth in search of the perfect present.

Arjun, an aspiring actor mistakenly receives a gun as a parcel, which leads him to cross paths with gangsters. Later, he attempts to unveil a mystery.

Maalika Paniyunnavar is a Malayalam drama. The workers who build houses for people are no longer available once the structure is over. The film deals with such strange cases in our life, with architecture as the medium. Watch the full movie, Maalika Paniyunnavar, only on Hotstar.

Wendy loves to tell stories about Peter Pan, a boy who never grows up. But, one day Wendy and her brothers visit the fabled Neverland with Peter Pan himself!

title_name: Winnie The Pooh: Springtime With Roo
description: Rabbit isn't interested in celebrating Easter and would rather spend the day focusing on spring cleaning but, Roo has an idea to rouse Rabbit into the spirit.

Spanish Masala is a Malayalam romantic comedy film, directed by Lal Jose, starring Dileep, Daniela Zacherl and Biju Menon. Charlie, an illegal immigrant in Spain, finds a job as a cook at the residence of an ex-diplomat who has served in India. Charlie charms their daughter Camilla with his Spanish Masala dosa. Will Camilla choose Charlie over her boyfriend Rahul (Kunchacko Boban)? The film portrays several Spanish arts, festivals and sports such as bullfighting, flamenco dance and the La Tomatina event. Watch this full film steaming online on Hotstar.

title_name: Star Wars: Attack Of The Clones
description: Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padme Amidala, while Obi-wan Kenobi discovers a sinister plot to destroy the Republic.
After a New Year's Eve party, a drunk Swapna witnesses a murder. The killers spot her and begin to trail her.

title_name: Marvel Super Hero Adventures: Frost Fight!
description: The Marvel Heroes unite to try and stop Loki and the frost giant Ymir from conquering the world as the duo try to steal Santa's powers to do so.

title_name: Kyo Kii... Main Jhuth Nahin Bolta
description: Raj, a lawyer, has no qualms about lying through his teeth to win cases. However, his behaviour takes a U-turn one day when he can't stop speaking the truth.
Apu’s life turns upside down when his rebellious cousin Durga comes to stay with his family. In the process, his perspective towards life changes for good.

Awakened by a rumbling that could only be made by the much-feared Heffalump, Winnie The Pooh and his friends set out to catch the dreaded creature.

Acharya is against love and girls. Nisha, who joins his college, hates him as his father had misused his powers against her family. Now she wants revenge.
An extremely possessive wife, Seetha, decides to get her husband, Jayaram, married to another woman after a shocking discovery. Will Jayaram agree to this?
When Chinese kids Gabriel and Rob become friends, Rob's dad questions Gabriel's feminine behavior.

title_name: Miley Cyrus | Endless Summer Vacation | Backyard Sessions
description: Miley Cyrus takes the stage performing songs from her new album and reflecting on who she is today.
Warring Alien and Predator races descend on a rural Colorado town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.
Desperate to make it big, ad filmmaker Santhosh uses tricks to woo his rival Shivani. How will Santhosh save his career when his cover is blown?
A casanova filmmaker feels lonely after a heartbreak. Meanwhile, a notorious art thief has a change of heart after falling in love. Are there any dots to join?

title_name: Pocahontas II: Journey To A New World
description: Pocahontas sets off on a journey to England with Meeko, Flit, and Percy. Hearing rumors of John Smith's death, Pocahontas tries to prevent war and battle.
An innocent prank by some college students takes a serious turn when it goes horribly wrong, leading to heart-wrenching consequences.
Karunakaran's daughter falsely accuses their devoted servant Chinnayya, of an attempted rape, leading to his expulsion. What is her motive behind the act?
Two youngsters decide to take a break from their jobs and go to Goa. However, their life takes a turn for the worse when they find a strange bag.
Thieves, gangsters, and the police cross each others' paths while in hunt for a precious diamond.
Putting her busy life on pause, Cheeni reaches her hometown to take care of her mother. During the brief stay, she lifts the lid on a long-buried family secret.
Sid has to choose between his love for Khushi and climbing the ladder of success. But things get complicated when his best friend starts falling for Khushi.
A high schooler forced to join her high school track team, finds herself falling for an unexpected teammate and discovering what real love feels like.
Gowri and Shweta marry each other, despite her father's disapproval. Upset, he employs a mafia leader to separate them. How will they get out of this together?
When his parents are paralysed, Sankara prays to Lord Shiva asking him to cure them. However, every boon comes with a sacrifice. What will he have to trade?
DJ is an undercover officer fighting crime in the guise of a priest. Things take a turn when he falls in love with Pooja, the daughter of a corrupt minister.
When insulted by Choudhry Hoshiarchand, Shaadiram, a matchmaker gets a coolie to pose as a millionaire and marry Hoshiarchand’s daughter.
Arjun, a young boy, works at a tea stall but dreams of becoming a speed skater. Impressed by his dedication, his coach decides to send him to a state-level race.
Puppeteer Dasu finds an abandoned girl who is handicapped. He takes on the challenge of bringing her up, but what happens when her parents return for her?
Mark Watney is presumed dead and is left behind on planet Mars. NASA discovers that he is alive and commissions a mission to rescue him.
Why did Kattappa kill Amarendra Baahubali? Find out the answer to this monumental question as you watch Amarendra's son in action in the sequel.
Post 26/11 Mumbai attacks, a special intelligence task force will stop at nothing to foil another such assault on the Indian soil.
Baiju is a laidback government employee who spends his time with youngsters playing cricket. He's the neighbourhood do-gooder but a no-good husband at home.
Intrepid wrestler Keerthi marries a narrow-minded Veera, albeit hiding her true self. Oscillating between dual lives, will she be able to keep up the charade?
In an attempt to spruce up each other's love lives, an uncle-nephew duo realise they will have to part ways to stay alive. What will they do next?
Buchi Babu is an NRI looking for a wife. He meets Anjali and is attracted to her, but she is in love with someone else. However, fate throws the two together.
Tired of her stepmother Lakshmi's ill-treatment, Meenu and her brother leave house. The tables turn when Lakshmi gets a taste of her own medicine.
Exposing the horrors of sex trafficking, it's a young girl's fight to save her sister, who is sold off by their own father.
The son of a rich tycoon flies back to India after his father's demise only to fall in love with a beautiful woman. Now he has to impress her father.
Naive cub Simba is made to believe that he killed his father hence he flees into exile. After several years, he returns to claim his kingdom.
While trying to earn some quick money to save his pregnant wife, Durgaprasad discovers a lethal terrorist plot and decides to save the city from destruction.

Poomarathanalil is a Malayalam drama movie starring Sreenivasa Varma, Devan, Anju, Vijayakumar, Ushakumari, Janardhanan, Mala Aravindan and directed by A K Muraleedharan. Nancy is the only daughter of Susanna. After her father's death, their family business is run by Nancy's uncle who is determined to rob her of her inheritance. Watch the full movie, Poomarathanalil, online, only on Hotstar.
Accompanied by Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym, Scott Lang must once again don the Ant-Man suit and fight alongside the Wasp.
A staunch Gandhian, Prabhakaran's way of unbiased justice earns him the wrath of corrupt politicians, and he ends up making more enemies than friends.
A tea vendor, Bhagavathi, saves every penny for his brother Guna's future. However, things take a violent turn when Guna gets his girlfriend pregnant.
Sinatra and Gardel are said to have been locked together in a dressing room. Are the rumors true?
Four young men get smitten by Maya who moves into their neighbourhood. While romance is far from her mind, she has a mission on hand.
Mythili meets the man from her dreams but is shocked to find out that he hunts down hapless women. But there's more than what meets the eye.
Johnny Rico joins the Mobile Infantry and, soon, he finds himself fighting against alien bugs that are hell-bent on destroying life on Earth.
Birdee Calvert must choose between her morals and her heart after her husband divorces her, and a charming young man comes back into her life.
Cowardly Mohandas is forced to join the police because of his father, a constable. Once he joins the force, he has to deal with the notorious Ananthan Nair.
A wannabe kidnapper, an NRI facing a life-altering decision and an aspiring cricketer tussle with their fate amidst the hustle-bustle of Mumbai.
It is love at first sight for happy-go-lucky Raj after he spots Priya at a wedding. He manages to get her contact number, but there are complications ahead!
Sub-inspector Unnikrishnan's brother, constable Ramakrishnan, has always protected him from criminals. Things change when Unnikrishnan arrests his father-in-law.
Babu loves Ammu. His sister Sumathi is in love with Balachandran. As they strive to be together, the situation turns chaotic and creates turmoil in the family.
After interacting online, Ramesh and Preethi fall in love. However, they inadvertently become rivals offline when he opens his shop near hers.
Tracing the life of Nobin Chandra Das, Bengal's legendary confectioner. Inspired by his beloved, the budding sweet maker invents Rosogulla, the iconic dessert.
Balaji is a middle-class man working with Chandrakanth. His son kills Inspector Avinash and ends up in jail.
Mickey Mouse is driving a steamroller when his twin nephews stroll by.
Bhumika and Balraj lead a happy married life. Everything changes when Balraj's friend Malathi comes over and Bhumika sees them in a park together.
Amal, a school teacher, discovers that he shares striking similarities with the legendary Count Dracula. As time progresses, he deals with his evolving traits.
Angry with Maheshwara for humiliating him, ex-commissioner Pradeep kills the former's wife and pins the blame on him. How will he prove his innocence?
Trying to get over a traumatic affair in the past, Ananth and Sreedevi find comfort in each other's company. Is this the beginning of a new love story?
Jeeva dreams of playing for the Indian cricket team someday. But his love life and politics in the game of sports become obstacles to his ambition.
Six friends go on a trek to a remote mountain. Soon, they start experiencing peculiar phenomena that endanger their lives.
The story revolves around the Anglo Indian community-based in North Kolkata and their difficulties in retaining their identity since the end of British India.
Kunjiraman returns from the Gulf intending to settle down in matrimony. But his plans are thwarted by his cousin Laalu and a curse that has gripped the village.
In this Oscar-nominated short from The Simpsons, Maggie navigates an eventful first day at daycare.
Anjali and Gowtham love each other. While trying to save Anjali from eve-teasers, Gowtham accidentally kills one of them. How will the lovers tackle the situation?
Janamma falls in love with Rajappan, who works under her father, a butcher. He marries her without any dowry. However, their married life becomes a struggle.
When world-famous movie star, Olivia faces a PR disaster after being snapped with her married lover, Valet Antonio is enlisted to pose as her new boyfriend.
Kitty falls for Cauvery, much to her police officer brother's dislike. However, while trying to save her from trouble, Kitty finds himself falling into a trap.
Pandu, a thug, takes assignments from local dons to make money and woo Shruthi. However, he discovers a shocking truth about himself.
A Kasaragod-based financier, Nithyananda, seeks revenge against an ex-minister who swindled him hours before demonetisation got implemented.
Vijay, an illustrator, hates the world of films and the people involved. But, in a twist of fate, he falls for Sameera, an actress. Will he forgo his prejudice?
Circle Inspector Peter Kurinshinkal loses his son to a ruthless multiple murder. Unsatisfied with the current investigations, he sets out to unravel the truth.
Abdullah is hired by a royal family to kill their king. He enters the palace disguised as a classical singer. Will he succeed with his plan?
In love and engaged to Gopinath, Sharada is very attached to her future in-laws. What happens when Gopinath returns from the US with a white woman as his wife?
A biopic on the brave Neerja Bhanot, the head purser had sacrificed her life for the safety of her passengers when terrorists hijacked Pan Am Flight 73.
Astronauts talk about the scarce resource of water, and the importance of space exploration.
The East High Wildcats take centre stage at the Lava Springs Country Club, where Sharpay tries to lure Troy away from Gabriella and his friends.
In the tranquil village of Anjanadri, a petty thief stumbles upon Hanuman-like abilities. With the impending threats, can he rise to become the hero they need?
Moving back to their ancestral home in Kerala from Dubai was not an easy choice for Abin and Priya. But they may have got more than what they bargained for.

title_name: Lego Disney Princess: The Castle Quest
description: Tiana, Moana, Snow White, Rapunzel, and Ariel must work together to save their kingdoms.
As the devils and beasts wreak havoc on the earth, Bal Hanuman is equal to the task and takes over the challenges with valour.
Rich man Vinayan loves his family and is always helping the needy. However, in a fit of rage, he accuses his wife of being barren, leaving her shattered.
Phoenix was brainwashed and trained to kill by Madame Rose, but her target this time is a person she cannot even imagine alive.
The villagers of Nelakondapalli seek solace in Rajanna's daughter's songs. However, trouble arises when a jealous landlord starts bullying her.
Imagine Dragons returns home to perform at the city's largest stage, Allegiant Stadium.

Grahana is a Kannada drama starring Anand Paricharan, G K Govinda Rao and Malathi Rao, directed by T S Nagabharana. Brahmin girl Honnarathi is unmarried even after attaining puberty. Her parents abandon her when people consider her a disgrace to the community. Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.
Arjun, Vijay and Radha are orphans. When Radha goes missing, Arun and Vijay embark on a journey hoping to find her.
A young couple faces problems from a ruthless man noted for his vices when he tries to covet the girl. Will he succeed in his evil motives?
After an explosive chance encounter, a lone male hyena and a female leopard join forces to begin an unconventional hunting partnership.
Four sisters are married off to ordinary men by their rich father, who favours his only son. However, what happens when the son shows his true colours?
This action-packed drama revolves around Bharat who discovers the truth about being an adopted child and sets out on a journey to find his biological parents.
Abhay and Ritika's marriage is arranged by their families. Amidst the obvious awkwardness on their honeymoon, the couple tries to conquer their incompatibility.
When humans find a cure for mutation, Professor Charles Xavier and the X-Men must hold fort while Magneto and his followers try to turn the cure on the humans.
Friends Vikas and Sunil plan a phoney kidnapping of their girlfriends, Ayesha and Mamta, which turns completely awry when a notorious terrorist intervenes.
Velu, an ironsmith, strives to make a living. He wants to get his daughter married into a good family. Trouble starts when she falls in love with someone else.
In Depression-era London, a now-grown Jane and Michael Banks are visited by the enigmatic Mary Poppins, helping them rediscover the joy missing in their lives.
Three thugs pose as photographers to kidnap an adorable baby of a rich couple but are unable to deal with the antics of the little tyke.
This special is the story of the creatures that endure the harsh reality along the shoreline Alaska's rugged coastline.
A young couple decides to elope when their love takes precedence over family but flip their choice later. Watch this heart-warming tale of love and reunion.
A gentle lady brings up two young boys as her own. However, she doesn't know which one of them is her son.
During summer break, 14-year-old Darious explores the boundaries of his manhood.
Lamp Life answers the question of what happened to Bo Peep and her sheep before she makes her comeback in Toy Story 4.
An aspiring lawyer learns shocking secrets about his family and parents relationship from his grandmother.
Sam, a rebellious princess, joins a top-secret training program for a new class of second-born royals tasked with saving the world.
Judy Hopps, the first rabbit to join the city police force, is determined to solve a dangerous case. Despite, everyone's lack of belief in her abilities.
Industrialist Shrikanth finds his family missing when he returns from England. Realising he needs help, he employs five youth to track them down.
The cast of "Encanto" reunites for this concert experience celebrating the global phenomenon.
Sekharankutty takes care of his foster sister. But there is a dark secret that he nurses in his heart. When she falls in love, his worst fears get realised.
Love can be tricky when a rich guy tries to woo a middle-class girl. It can be trickier when the guy's father is too powerful.
Val Garcia, a Mexican-American half human/half vampire teenager, struggles to fit in either world.
"The Ballad of Nessie" is a whimsical and colourful tale about the friendly Loch Ness monster, Nessie, and her best friend MacQuack, the rubber duck.
Yogi falls in love with the beautiful Gunasagari. However, he is shocked when she gets married to his elder brother.
Venu buys a lottery ticket and wins the jackpot. However, he realises that his ticket is fake. How will he resolve this problem?
Two village heads have been at loggerheads for decades. When one of them gets killed in the dispute, his son leaves the village. But the enemies follow him.
Venugopal leads an easy-going life in the village. His father sends him to the city to get him married to his niece Lakshmi. However, there is a problem!
Four youngsters plan to commit suicide in a deserted house. But soon one of them gets possessed by a female spirit. What will this lead to?
10-year-old Gopal and his kid brother Chottu struggle to make ends meet. But they also fancy attending an upcoming grand feast.
Maharishi, an innocent villager, arrives in the city with his mother and sister. Here circumstances force him to fight dreaded criminals.
After hundreds of lonely years of doing what he was built for, the robot WALL-E discovers a new purpose in life when he meets a sleek search robot named Eve.
A filmmaker plans a biopic on the mystical yet legendary actress Maayakumari. As the shoot begins, he reflects on her stardom and mysterious disappearance.
Newlyweds Harsha and Mohini move into their new home unaware of a lurking evil spirit. Things take a turn for the worse, when the spirit does the unthinkable.
A Chinese student uncovers his true identity when trying out for a leadership role at a U.S. school.
The villagers of Vellimala compel the government to build a dam in their village. But when there is a threat from it, the authorities decide to destroy it.

Mrithunjayam is a Malayalam drama about Issac, who is sentenced to death, for murdering four people. The church priest comes to him with his siblings. After the visit, Issac makes a confession. Watch the full movie, Mrithunjayam, only on Hotstar.
Kochi Corporation is facing a waste management crisis. Some corrupt politicians decide to dump all the trash in the village of Sivaramapuram.
Failing to find a job, Nibhay joins his friends' catering business. During a wedding, he meets and proposes to a girl. But that love attracts negative attention.
To get rid of his financial problems, Nandagopal decides to sell his father's property. But with Nachiappa Gounder occupying it, he is faced with challenges.
To make an honest living, Madesha starts a business with friends. His life takes a turn for the worse when he sacrifices a lot more than he signed up for.
Karate champion Bond Ravi is in love with filmmaker Meera. In a case of mistaken identity, drug mafia don Charlie kidnaps Meera, and the lovers get trapped.
Outraged by the growing corruption in the nation, a skilled freedom fighter takes it upon himself to punish the wrongdoers, even if that includes his venal son.
In a bid to focus on his career, a budding politician neglects his wife. This results in not only his marriage taking a toll, but his work also suffers.
When Walter and his friends discover the plan of oilman Tex Richman to raze the Muppet Theater, they help Kermit to stage The Greatest Muppet Telethon.
Venky, an unemployed youth, heads to Hyderabad to attend a wedding. A brief vacation gradually turns into something more as the soon-to-be bride falls for him.
Chandu and Vennela are in love, but their parents disapprove. When they plan to commit suicide and fail, the attempt makes them lose memories of each other.
Close friends Arjun and Shivan fall for Parvathy. When a conflict arises between them on the college campus, Shivan is forced to leave town.
Good-for-nothing Krish falls in love with Barsha, but she puts forth a difficult condition. What ensues next is total chaos, confusion and comedy.
A carrom player gets inadvertently entangled in a sprawling gang war between two mobsters, completely altering the course of his life.
Bhargav is an angry young man from a middle-class family. Trouble arises when his brother-in-law turns out to be a smuggler and puts the whole family in danger.
Siddharth is on his way to Singapore to search for and confess his love to Tanu. He meets a scriptwriter who gets hooked on to Siddharth's emotional love story.
After Ramachandra's father dies, Srikanta becomes a temple priest. But when Ramachandra's son, Anantu, returns to the village, he wants to take over the temple.

title_name: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
description: Indiana Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.
Sanjukta wholeheartedly raises Ajay, her husband’s illegitimate son, as her own. All is well until property division creates a crack in relationships.
Accused of killing his father and ill-treating his mother, 13-year-old Narayanan is sent to a juvenile home. When he returns to his village, trouble finds him.
When their parents mysteriously vanish, two Korean American sisters must unite to get them back.
Shivan Kutty's increasing debt has him worried. In a comic turn of events, he is mistaken for Jeevan, a wealthy businessman, who is his doppelganger.
Caroll Shelby and Ken Miles battle against all the odds to build a race car for Ford Motor Company and take on the dominant Ferraris at the Le Mans in 1966.
After Raja is killed by his conniving relatives, his look-alike, a gangster, is asked to pose as him. How long will this imposter last?
A bunch of amateurs set out to find a serial killer on the college campus, who uses social media as a tool. Can they find him before he claims his next victim?
Chieftain Vaanavarayan's wife lands in grave danger after his rival seeks vengeance against them. On her deathbed, she asks for a promise from him.
The lives of four petty criminals change when they head to Chennai, where they come across a woman who alters the course of their lives.
A road movie, it has a group of young cricketers, on their way to a selection match, and the challenges they face while trying to reach their destination.
Romance blossoms between a Sambalpur-based boy Samir and Kanika, a girl hailing from Cuttack. However, problems arise when devious Krunal enters their life.
Muthu earns a living by extracting and disposing corpses from rivers. While his son wants him to have a decent job, he becomes a sidekick to a moneylender.
Jayakrishnan lives a dual life, one in town with his friends and the other in his village. He falls in love with two women, and thus begins his problems.
Debasis, a young man, gets falsely incriminated by a crime lord Mukka Ready. With nothing more to lose, he seeks vengeance against the ones who wronged him.
Rajendra is a wealthy and arrogant industrialist who misbehaves with women. When this habit goes too far, the police take him to task.

title_name: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny
description: The legendary hero archaeologist returns in this highly anticipated final instalment of the iconic franchise – a big, globe-trotting, rip-roaring adventure!

title_name: Our America: Accomplices - The Story of Ady Barkan
description: Ady Barkan's journey with ALS is shifting the conversation of what it means to be an accomplice to historically underrepresented and marginalised communities.
Mohini and Harsha move to a different city, but the lustful spirit of Captain Raju strikes their world again, how will they face him?
A live action retelling of the beloved tale of a wooden puppet who embarks on a thrilling adventure to become a real boy.
Thomas wakes up in an elevator and finds himself in a strange world of young boys who are trying to escape through the Maze that surrounds their living space.
A colourful fairy tale musical inspired by "A Midsummer Night's Dream" where goblins, elves, fairies, and imps battle over a powerful potion.
Appukuttan is an honest young man who falls in love with Sarojini. But she does not like him. One day, a dancer is found raped and killed! Who is the murderer?
When a famous radio jockey loses his voice to laryngeal cancer, his world comes crashing down. Little does he know that a second chance at life is awaiting him.
A chance meeting sparks love between Sridhar and Preethi, but they part ways without sharing their details. Love-struck, they go on a quest to find each other.

title_name: A Hero’s Journey: The Making of Percy Jackson and the Olympians
description: Being a demigod isn’t easy. Go behind-the-scenes with Walker, Leah, and Aryan on their epic quest.
Veeraiah and Ranganath's lives get intertwined after the former secretly swaps their babies at the hospital. How will everyone find out the truth about this?
Embark on a compelling behind-the-scenes journey, unveiling the visionary mind of Hideo Kojima.
Ram and Balaram are cops. While Balaram investigates a murder, Ram attacks the Bullet Group. How will the brothers protect their bond in their profession?
A man, who comes from a joint family, falls in love with the daughter of the chief minister. Problem arises when he suddenly calls off the engagement.
Figaro is trying to take a cat nap, but the canary insists on singing.
When an incident at school suddenly puts Trevor in the wrong spotlight, he struggles to navigate his own identity and determine how he fits in a challenging world.
Based on Victor Hugo's classic novel, Quasimodo defies his evil guardian and ventures from his tower to the joyous Festival of Fools in the city.
Little Bittu loses his parents in an accident. Years later, he comes across their reincarnations in a tale of eternal love set over a course of hundred years.
An intense rivalry with IG Joseph lands Kaduva in jail. But when he gets released, the battle for supremacy continues, wherein losing is not an option.
Facing opposition, Sanju and Mili elope. However, just before their marriage, they decide to return and seek the blessings of their elders.
Sivadas Swamigal runs a drama troupe in which Kaliappa and Gomathi are his disciples. While they have a strong bond, constant rivalry separates them.
With his peculiar powers, Ghatothkach sets out to battle the evil forces with his friends and an elephant pal, Gajju.
Mickey and Pete go head to head in a variety of sporting events.
When mysterious occurrences plague a historic temple, a dynamic cop Bhimaa quests to uncover and confront the sinister truth hidden in the shadows.
A baker and his wife can't have a child due to a curse cast by a witch and, to lift the curse, the couple has to obtain four objects that she desperately needs.
After Jithu's parents die in a plane crash, his father's friend brings him up like his own son, much to the dislike of his daughter, Sheeba.
Chey's life takes a comical turn when he falls for Meera and decides to help her marry the love of her life. Will he find his own better half on this journey?
A thug, an MLA and a good-for-nothing plan to rob a bank. However, loyalty and honesty rarely go hand in hand with earning easy money.
An old couple believes that a 20-year-old boy is their reincarnated son. When their daughter-in-law reluctantly accepts the situation, their lives get affected.
Honest army officer Captain Shivraj's happy life takes a drastic turn when his family is killed in a terrorist attack.
The Ducks win scholarships to a snooty private school but, their new coach adds to their woes as they fight hard to save their scholarships.
Conjoined twins Charu and Latha choose to separate via a surgery. When one of them marries her childhood friend, strange things start happening.
Two childhood friends, Gabbar Singh and Samba, become police officers and decide to fight crime together. But what happens when they are at crossroads?
The natives of a village join hands to oppose the renovation of the Someshwara Temple. Will they get what they want?
A principled officer’s eldest son, Vikas is killed in a planned accident. While the family is grief-stricken, the younger son, Vishal goes rogue.
Suri, a young man from a rural area, falls in love and pays for it with his life. The narrative takes form of a mother recalling the tragic story of her son.

title_name: The Incredible Dr. Pol: Blue Ribbon Kids
description: The cute, the cuddly, the wild, the wooly, we have an entertaining cast of kids who will do anything for their animals
Rajesh, an aspiring filmmaker, loves Anu, a beautiful yet lonely girl. However, things get complicated when Koushik also falls in love with Anu.
Lakshmi was once the main artist in a circus. With age, however, she gets mistreated and is relegated to the position of a servant.
A series of mysterious killings in the family forces Raghupati to get his daughter married to Krishna to protect her. But is she safe with Krishna?
Babu returns home after years. When he learns that his aunt and her daughter have ruined the family name, he decides to set things right.
After the Republic's victory on Christophsis, Anakin and his new apprentice Ahsoka Tano must rescue the kidnapped son of Jabba the Hutt.

title_name: Oozham - It's Just A Matter Of Time
description: Surya, a demolition expert, watches his whole family being murdered on a video call. After coming to India, he learns the plot is more sinister than it appears.
When the dreaded gangster Billa dies, DSP Jayaprakash finds his lookalike and trains him to impersonate him. But for how long will this ruse play out?
On learning that a statue in his house is the reason for his bad luck, building contractor Nambiar tries to get rid of it. But that seems like a daunting task.
Scott has moved into his neighbourhood and to fit in with the neighbours join the local sandlot ball team. But, he doesn't know how to play baseball.
Masquerading as a male soldier to protect her father and tested every step of the way, Mulan must harness her inner-strength and embrace her true potential.
Ramya loves Madhu, but she dies before he can reciprocate her feelings. In another world, lookalikes of the two strive to save their planet from extinction.
A crime branch cop is assigned to a gruesome murder case. What follows next is a series of tangled mind games with horrifying twists.
Guru, a goon, marries Aisha and decides to make a fresh start. However, their happiness is short lived when a serial killer makes an entry.
Sing along with your favourite songs with on-screen lyrics as you watch “Muppets Most Wanted."
Pandemonium ensues after four carefree college students unintentionally become a part of caste politics.
When a budding writer moves to a hill station to write her new book, little does she know that an evil plot is about to unfold and take her into the past.
Ajay works for a TV channel. He goes to shoot in a village near Ukkadagathri along with his crew. Once there, they find some strange occurrences.
Everything is pretty smooth in Sakthi and Priya's married life. Trouble arises when she gets pregnant. How will he react on finding out she doesn't want a baby?
Separated at birth, identical twins Ramesh and Mahesh lead different lives. However, an important connection brings them together. What is it?
A loner violinist tries to save an injured girl, but she passes away and starts haunting him instead. Why is she torturing the man who saved her?
A dancing sheep loses his groove when all his wool is sheared off. Can he find the drive to dance again?
BTS's SUGA interacts with global artists and finds his voice through his new album.
Ravi, a collection agent at a bank, sets out to teach a con woman a lesson. However, his ordeal begins when she falls for him.
Ten years after he was ousted by the selection committee, a Ranji player returns to play cricket for India. Will he succeed in fulfilling his son's wish?
Newly married Sreeja's chain gets stolen while travelling with her husband. In the chaos that follows, they land up in the police station with the thief.
Naresh is born with a boon of being immortal. He falls in love with Lord Yama's daughter, making him furious. Now Naresh has to make a tough choice.
Orphan Sethumadhavan is friends with rich boy Jagadish. An invitation to Jagadish's house creates a problem when Sethumadhavan becomes a victim of suspicion.
Pooja and Karan are childhood friends. They lose touch when Pooja relocates. All grown up, they meet as strangers while searching for each other.
Sanju can go to any lengths to save the life of his lover Padmini, but Babu Rao will not let them have their happy beginning so easily.
Former lawyer Vijayamohan takes on the challenging case of a blind girl with unusual evidence. How will he navigate the legal odds and secure justice for her?
A group of friends go on a holiday to Hamsa Estate. There one of them begins to experience a strange phenomenon and fears that his nightmares might come true.
With Genovian law stating that princesses must be married before being crowned, Mia's in for a parade of suitors who'd all like to be her king.
Nandu is a simple villager while Paddu is from the city. They meet when she visits his village. Will he learn city ways, or will she take to village traditions?

title_name: Assembled: The Making of Secret Invasion
description: Cast and crew invite viewers behind-the-scenes of the heart-pounding thriller, "Secret Invasion."
Gopi finds a discarded suitcase full of money. When he decides to keep it for himself, he is unprepared for the trouble that lies ahead for him and his family.

title_name: LEGO Star Wars: The New Yoda Chronicles - Race For Holocrons
description: Obi-Wan urges Luke to travel to Tatooine. With Darth Vader also on the hunt, it's a race for the Jedi Holocrons!
Krishna plans a mass suicide trip for depressed people who want to die. But when they are on the bus that is to meet with an accident, they realise their folly.
All hell breaks loose when Lizzie's family unexpectedly flies to Italy, desperate to change their newly transformed pop star daughter back.
Sudhi, an auto driver, falls for Meenakshi but faces strong opposition from her rich family. The only person who fights for their love is her grandfather.
A fan of Dr Rajkumar, Muthuraj aspires to be a singer. However, he gets diagnosed with throat cancer. Will his dream come true?
During the Cold War, fellow mutants Charles Xavier and Erik Lehnsherr join forces with other mutants to save humanity from a nuclear attack.
Casanova Roshan meets Janu, a call centre employee, at a bash and befriends her. However, a mysterious photo at her house has him distancing himself from her.

title_name: Toy Story That Time Forgot (Tv Special)
description: During a post-Christmas play date, the gang find themselves in uncharted territory when the coolest set of action figures turn out to be dangerously delusional.
A simple guy from a small town moves to the city to be united with his lady love. However, her egoistic father is determined to break the relationship.
Eswaran aka Chithha's world crumbles when his beloved niece goes missing. Will this emotional pursuit test the limits of love?
Oscar Diggs arrives in the Land of Oz where he meets a witch, Theodora, who assumes that he is a wizard hired to kill her competitor.

In the kingdom of Arendelle, Anna sets off on an epic journey to find her sister, Elsa, whose icy powers have trapped their world in eternal winter. Follow the on-screen lyrics to sing along with your favourite Frozen songs.

title_name: Star Wars: Return Of The Jedi
description: Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side. Meanwhile, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star.
As the 60th anniversary of Jane Goodall's arrival to the chimpanzee kingdom in Gombe approaches, she spends some time with her family in Tanzania.
Sujatha breaks up with Madan after he cheats on her and marries his cousin instead. But with Madan out to seek revenge from her, how will she save her marriage?
In Los Angeles, a few devoted craftspeople keep over 80,000 student instruments in good repair.
Playful pup Pluto Junior disturbs Pluto's slumbers with a ball and balloon.
Honesty is the best policy. However, it's not true for Kush and Khushi, whose marriage hits rock bottom when they refuse to be honest with each other.
Arjun and Anu's lives get entangled after both of them are forced to return home, owing to personal tragedies. Will they fall in love with each other?
Shiva, an arrogant businessman, rejects Nayana's feelings. Life comes a full circle for him when he discovers a life-threatening disease.
Mrudula and Vivek face problems when her parents try to control their marriage with unnecessary meddling. This causes friction in the life of the newlyweds.

title_name: Forky Asks A Question: What is Cheese?
description: Buttercup, annoyed with all of Forky’s questions, speed teaches everything there is.
A frog prince who wants to be human again engages in a fateful kiss with a princess that leads them on an adventure through the mystical bayous of Louisiana.
A struggling writer uses a Panchatantra tale to convince a commercial film producer about his script of four women, which strangely runs parallel to reality.
Enraged with the havoc, Kunjava decides to get rid of his pet dog. Unable to part ways with the furry buddy, Kunjava and Sinto set out to rescue Neymar!
When Shubham, an industrialist, discovers he has a brain tumour, his life changes forever. He meets Rinki, who then helps him in his quest to understand faith.
A lionhearted Sekar's dream comes true after his idol recruits him into a powerful gang. Soon, he finds himself in a bind when his love overshadows his duty.

title_name: Bal Ganesh and the Pomzom Planet
description: When Mooshak and his friends are held captive on the planet Pomzom, Bal Ganesh embarks on a mission to save the day with his wits and valour.
When an attempt is made on the life of a reigning gangster, his three sons take it upon themselves to hunt the culprit, all amid a succession battle.
Following the murder of a minister, an MLA steps in to save the government. He is made home minister. Thus begins the game of power, deceit and betrayal.
Murugan protects the villagers from deadly tiger attacks. But a drug dealer takes advantage of his innocence and frames him in a crime he never committed.
Wade Wilson's life is changed forever when an experiment by twisted scientist Ajax goes wrong. With his new powers, Wade decides to make Ajax pay.
JK, a cop, gets pulled into an important case just as he decides to go on leave. Soon, he gets caught in a web of gruesome and intriguing developments.
While making a documentary on Alzheimer's disease, a man realises that there's more to his subject's inexplicable behaviour - something sinister and terrible.

title_name: Extreme Engineering : Driving That Extra Mile
description: This Extreme Engineering special is about the fuel network that spans across India and exploring it through the eyes of the people who make it possible.
ACP Thirupathi is assigned the task to nab Michael, a don. During his investigations, he learns that Michael is Dhanraj, whom he has hated all his life.
Tired of being dominated their entire life, the wives of the family decide to change their husbands' perception and behaviour. Will they succeed?

title_name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2
description: Bella and Edward seek to forge new alliances after the birth of their child awakens sinister forces.
Alankar meets Priya at a party. They fall in love and plan to marry. But his friends play mischief, and Priya gets abducted.
The film showcases the history of Moon Missions from across the globe, successful missions of USA, former USSR & India.
A girl comes to live with her grandmother in the village and falls for the grandson of a well-known person there, leading to the oldies playing matchmaker.
Latha gets a ransom call demanding Rs 5 lakh for a deadly secret about her businessman father. She hires Captain Hariharan, but will he be able to help her?

Nakshathrakkodaram is a Malayalam drama starring Suresh Gopi, Swetha Menon, directed by Joshy Mathew. Nirmala Menon is a tomboy who is always in the company of boys. Jeevan Roy, a handsome young man, enters her life and they become close. Nirmala's friends are against this and plan to get her back. Watch the full movie, Nakshathrakkodaram, online, only on Hotstar.
Narayana, a school teacher, tackles local goons after he saves Krishna, his former student, from them.
For a better future, Manimala wishes to move to a modern house. But her grumpy father-in-law is too connected to the ancestral home. And this sparks a feud!
Five-year-old Malootty, her family's darling, wins hearts of whomever she meets. One day, while on vacation, she falls into a borewell when playing.
When a lottery ticket sold by Kashi wins a bumper prize, he decides to fool the winner and get it for himself. However, the actual winner is dead!
Vetrivel is a jobless MBA graduate who depends on his father. His life changes when he falls in love with Priya. Now he needs to impress her father.
Ramu's marriage gets fixed with his cousin. However, things take a turn for the worse when her family finds a photograph of him with another woman.
An orphaned teenager faces trials and tribulations at school and in society. How will she fight all of these and emerge victorious?
Priya has recently moved to Kochi along with her husband and brings along an antique Jewish trunk, unaware that it contains a dybbuk, a revenge-hungry spirit.
To win back the love of his fans, an actor known for negative roles decides to become 'the bad guy' in real life also. What happens when he goes too far?
Puppy Paws, the fun-loving son of Santa Paws, gets tired of the North Pole. And, the naughty Buddies are the only ones who can team him the true meaning of Christmas.
After a sleepover-hypnotism gone wrong, best friends and a soon-to-be stepsister wake up with no memory of the night before and must find the missing birthday girl.
Pluto steals a bone and gets chased by Butch the Bulldog.
A behind the scenes look at the "Obi-Wan Kenobi" special event series starring Ewan McGregor as the iconic Jedi Master. Coming to Disney+ in 2022.
Set in a small village near a forest, an invincible hunter named Pulimurugan goes on a quest to protect his village from man-eating tigers and the drug mafia.

title_name: Marvel's Iron Man & Captain America: Heroes United
description: Iron Man and Captain America battle to keep the Red Skull and his triggerman, Taskmaster, from unleashing an army of Hydra Brutes on the world.
Troy and Gabriella joined by the rest of the Wildcats, stage an elaborate spring musical reflecting their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.
A small-time thief's life changes when a little girl claims to be his daughter. He then decides to punish the criminals who are responsible for her plight.
The reboot of 2012 special follows the two rovers operating on Mars - Opportunity, rolling on Mars since 2004, and Curiosity, who landed in 2012.
Jesus, son of Joseph and Virgin Mary, faces several challenges and humiliations on his journey to lead humankind to a better path.
Chhutanki, a disciple of Guru Akhand Dev, embarks on a mission against the evil forces of Takla Baba, who desires to rule the world with his devilish powers.
Being a thief is what Johny is good at. However, his career of ill-repute takes a hit when he meets an orphan.
Namitha helps and supports Gopi when he gets bullied in college. Later, he meets his old friend Gayathri. Whom will he be loyal to now, Gayathri or Namitha?
Abhiram decides to seek revenge from Krishnamurthy, the man responsible for his father's misfortune. Will he get Krishnamurthy to pay for his sins?
Ambika Nair and her brother, Mahadevan, are business tycoons. When her life is at risk, Mahadevan hires Soloman, a thief, to act as her heir.
Kannan is an unemployed youth in a village. His parents send him to their relative's place in the city to make a life. But he ends up falling in love.
A novelist inherits a villa from his late father and moves in with his girlfriend. Soon, his father begins to speak to him beyond the grave.
The Predators have returned to Earth and, only a ragtag crew of ex-soldiers and an evolutionary biology professor can protect the human race.
In the heart of the forest, Bambi sets out to explore his new world with his friends, Thumper and Flower, with some guidance by the wise Friend Owl.

title_name: Bal Hanuman IV – Attack of the Universe
description: As guided by Bal Hanuman, Monkey Head Chhote Maharaj challenges the malicious Crocodiles Gutter and Shutter for a high-stake Kabbadi match to bring peace.
An industrialist constructs a high-tech armoured and decides to use his suit to fight against evil forces and save the world.
The film enables Gleeks to relive the unique experience of the Glee Live! In Concert! Tour along with intimate behind the scenes footage.
Chemparundu has committed many murders in the village. His daughter falls for an orphan. Then Unnikrishnan, a young man with a mysterious purpose, comes there.
Sanjeev's dreams to join the police force are quashed by the commissioner. However, the former has to pay a very heavy price to fulfil his ambitions.
Sing along with your favourite songs with on-screen lyrics as you watch "The Little Mermaid."
Five jobless youngsters struggle to pay rent. While trying to gets jobs, they get involved in illegal activities. How will they save themselves from trouble?
Karan returns to India to marry his girlfriend. Little does he realise that he will have to marry a tree first with a ghost, who now calls him her husband.
On a dark and somber night, monster hunters gather to pay respects to their deceased leader and are thrust into a deadly game.
Surya, an underworld don, is targeted for a politician's misdeeds. Later, he falls in love and marries Suhasini. However, she has a motive.
Dinesh makes an MMS clip of Aarti's private moments. However, he plans an acid attack on her when she confronts him. How will she save herself?
A Northern Cheyenne teen finds an unexpected connection to their family and community.
When charismatic Stanton Carlisle endears himself to clairvoyant Zeena at a travelling carnival, he crafts what seems to be a golden ticket to success.
When Riley's family relocates to a new city, the five emotions located in her mind have a difficult job at hand to save their and Riley's existence.
When Shobhraj, an underworld don, gets killed in an encounter, DSP Mohandas uses his lookalike to pose as him in order to capture the rest of his gang.
Sukumari, a saleswoman, struggles to make ends meet. However, her life changes when she encounters a business tycoon.
Satya falls in love with Veda after seeing her serve the poor. His search for her lands him in Kurnool where he comes face to face with her strict father.
While trying to rescue her sister's kids from kidnappers, Geetha excavates shocking secrets about her dubious neighbours. What are they hiding?
To impress his crush Darcy, Gulliver travels to Bermuda Triangle. But his boat gets wrecked, and he finds himself on an island filled with miniature people.
Miley Stewart struggles to juggle school and her secret pop-star persona. So, her father takes her home to for a dose of reality and adventure.
On the eve of Angel's wedding, Sebastian coaxes her to elope with him. Next morning, she and her family is shocked to learn that he was high the previous night.
Lecturer Kiran Shankar becomes an invalid after an accident. When his wife gets pregnant, he is aware that the child is not his. What will he do now?
Nachiketa is attached to his mother. He is in love with Navya. Things take a turn for the worse when a violent neighbour disrupts his life.
A retired judge raises his little girl in a boarding school. One day, when he is found dead, a man with visual impairment is blamed for the murder.
A renowned don, Suri, has a new rival on the block, Stephen. How will he win the battle against Stephen and his female bodyguards?
Four jobless guys go on a hunt for a load of cash hidden away by a rich businessman. However, a cop is also after it.
Madhurima gets stranded on an island with Raj, a man with a tragic past. Soon, she falls for him, but Raj is disinterested as he is on a secret mission.
Film-makers Bedi Brothers follow the lives of elusive snow leopards in the stunning terrain of Spiti Valley, focusing especially on the dominant male, Karma.
Panchapakesan Devasagayam may be an eccentric fellow, but he sure knows how to solve the recurring murders taking place in the coffee estates of Ooty.
When rich and successful Srinivas visits India, his parents insist that he marry Manimala. He puts forth a test before her. Will she pass this test?
A conman with different identities marries women only to swindle them. When he is finally caught, secrets get revealed from his dark past.
Mobster Vikram orchestrates a heist in London and frames small-time crooks Kadhir and Azhagu. What happens when the duo gain access to the stolen fortune?
Yas and Dom, two 20-somethings both reeling from bad break-ups, help each other potentially restore faith in romance.
Chandru, a medical student, unknowingly helps a dying fugitive. Now, cops have begun chasing the escapee and Chandru.
While Balu falls in love with Anu at first sight, she is oblivious to his feelings. However, he has to face a lot of challenges to win her heart.
In an attempt to settle a communal riot among the fisherfolk, police officer Amarnath faces many hurdles. Will he be able to bring the criminals to book?
Due to the divorce of their parents, twin sisters get separated at birth. Years later, they meet each other and decide to reunite their parents.
Peter, who works for a gangster, has been saving up for his daughter's treatment. However, when he gets deceived during a deal, he loses the trust of his boss.
Four lives, four different paths and ambitions. How will fate bring them together and help them achieve their dreams?
A falsely accused convict Sethu gets released from prison, but society still despises him. Will he be able to attain his self-respect and lead an honest life?
Debashis and Akansha’s married life begins with conflicts, which makes them detest each other. But as their relationship evolves, romance begins to bloom.
After losing her parents, Ella is at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and stepsisters. But, a kindly beggar woman changes her life forever.
When gangster Bhattu steals a box of gold biscuits, it finally lands in the hands of two unemployed youngsters. They decide to sell the gold, and chaos ensues.
Lattu, a budding singer is in love with a model, Sweety. His lifelong dream of being her boyfriend finally comes true, but with a hilarious twist.
In this celebration of life and bonding, a grandson decides to make his aging grandfather get the most out of his remaining sunset years.
Durganath decides to take revenge on Kubher Rao by making his daughter marry Balu, a poor unemployed simpleton.
Raja, a small-time loafer falls head over heels for Pooja. Things spiral out of control when his lookalike Rocky, a devious criminal, tries to take his place.
Stark opposites, Fateh Singh and Pooja reach Canada with dreams in their eyes. They cross paths and sparks fly. However,  life has a different plan for them.
After suffering a huge financial loss, a shattered Maradonna decides to commit suicide. However, a divine force holds him back, giving him a new lease of life.
Alita, a female cyborg, is revived by cyber-medic expert Daisuke Ido and she sets out to learn about her past and true identity .
Percy Jackson and his friends set off on an adventure to retrieve the Golden Fleece as they attempt to save Camp Half-Blood.
Poles apart, Sridevi encounters Shoban Babu and falls in love with him. But can their story survive the long-standing dispute between their families?
The star of a hit TV show sets off on a cross country journey when he is sent to New York City instead of his Hollywood soundstage.
A surgeon with a nasty temper turns to drugs and alcohol when his girlfriend is forced to marry another. But there's more to this love story than meets the eye.
Best friends Krishna, Gopi and Shyam are always seen together but for all the wrong reasons. Their lives take a new turn when they fall in love and get married.
Aravindan takes to begging to pay for his mother's surgery. In the colony of beggars, he meets Chippy and his life changes for the better.
Venu takes care of Raja, his mentor's brother. He even sacrifices his love and gets him married to Devi. However, what happens when Raja gets into bad company?

title_name: The Lion Guard: Return Of The Roar
description: Set in the African Savanna, the film follows Kion as he assembles the members of the 'Lion Guard' to maintain balance within the Circle of Life.
Greg Heffley dreams of becoming famous while surviving middle school with his best friend, Rowley.
After the disappearance of her scientist father, Meg, with her brother and her friend are sent to space to find him.
