A hapless hunchback yearns for love but finds himself in the middle of a murderous feud between the Pope and the king of France.
William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.
Mumbai to Ajmer, a squabbling family, a band and clashing values. Along the roads of friendship and life, this journey only gets crazier!
Jayaraman, a blind elevator operator gets framed for a murder that he didn't commit. A cat and mouse game ensues as he fights back to prove his innocence.
Gautham, an orphan, wants to marry Vaishnavi, a girl from a joint family. However, their love story hits a road block when Vaishnavi's father reveals his plan.
In a village, young girls disappear once they hit puberty. Who is behind this? Is some black magic involved?
Unlucky since birth, Rambo finds hope when he falls in love with Kanmani and Khatija. His life gets complicated further when they both pursue him.
Set the wintry mood for this year's holiday celebration with Anna and Elsa’s Arendelle Castle yule log.
The chief minister's daughter and his assistant's son are in love. But the CM goes against their relationship and has other plans.

Tarun, a rookie BSF officer, learns patriotism and brotherhood as well as the heavy cost of war from his comrade, Havaldar Mohammed Ali.
This internationally acclaimed anti-war film follows the lives of BSF soldier Tarun Chauhan (Bobby Deol) and stars Sanjay Dutt, Suniel Shetty and Ajay Devgn as armed forces officers involved in military operations across the country.
Ananthan is the son of an aristocratic Brahmin family with a mastery over the Vedas. His life changes dramatically when he falls in love.
Jedara, an unemployed youth with night blindness, is stamped as a sharp shooter in a case of mistaken identity. What new turn will his life take?
Adisankaran gets banished by society because of his caste. Yet, he tries to bring about a spiritual movement and a change in social norms with his philosophies.
A contract killer is hired to kill a judge. He blends with the latter's family and wins everyone's trust. But why does every shot aimed at the judge misfire?
Village head Madhava Menon is highly respected for his integrity. Trouble begins in his life when a rival clan causes devastation in his village.
Kenai, the human-turned-bear, forms an unlikely pair with his human friend Nita as they embark on a journey to rediscover the true meaning of their bond.
Two newspaper employees team up to bring down a corrupt establishment while campaigning for an upcoming political party. Where will this journey take them?
Mechanic Madesha is madly in love with Aishwarya. He goes mad when the goons of her mafia don father forcibly take her away from him.
Sreenivasan, a carefree guy, loves to work in the village theatre or pass time with friends. What happens when he applies for a job in the police department?
Deva and Ravi are twins who are separated at birth, but they cross paths again. What will happen when they find out the truth behind their separation?
Circumstances force friends Vijaya and Vatsala to part ways. Years later, when a desperate Vijaya commits a crime, Vatsala, now a lawyer, takes up the case.
Siddappaji kills a don's sibling to avenge his brother's murder and becomes famous as Masti. Later, he decides to change his ways when he falls in love.
While cleaning idols in the puja room, Sharada unknowingly removes her ancestor's anklets. She is punished and has to do penance. However, her situation worsens.
Pluto tries to help Mickey with some spring cleaning and leaf gathering.
Mickey with Minnie and his band of mice raise havoc in a cat’s house.
Manaf Hussain signs Madhuri to act in a play. Based on Yayati, an ancestor of the Pandavas who falls for two women, the play begins mirroring real lives.
On a quest to recover his father's money, a race-car driver faces a powerful gang, a rare diamond and a slave racket. What follows is an exciting chase.
Blu is a Spix's macaw born in Rio De Janeiro but raised in Moose Lake, Minnesota. He meets Jewel and goes on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with her.
Leopold Stokowski and the Philadelphia Orchestra joined forces with Walt Disney and his team to create an unprecedented motion picture entertainment.
Venu's dream is to make his daughter a doctor. To get her admission into the MBBS course, he decides to sell his property. But his family opposes him.
While investigating a friend�s murder case, ACP Moses loses his memory in an accident. Soon, he is caught in some strange events as he tries to track the truth.
Kidnapped as a child, Chotu grows up to become a bounty hunter. Chotu decides to look for his real parents and sets out on a search mission. Will he succeed?
Raja dies an untimely death and pleads to Lord Yama, who grants him a new life. He returns to earth as a minister, but can he win everything back?
A journalist investigates the controversial death/disappearance of Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose and his uncanny resemblance to Gumnaami Baba.
When Ashok's father disowns him, he catches the attention of his neighbour. But there's someone who wants to woo her. Where will this love triangle lead him?
Simple Dampya gets addicted to gambling and betting when his friend Namya tells him how to make easy money. How far will his addiction take him?
A toon-hating detective is the only hope for cartoon superstar Roger Rabbit to prove his innocence as the prime suspect in the murder of Toontown's owner.
In the shadows of a chilling serial killer case, veteran cop Abraham Ozler confronts dark secrets and heinous acts, reshaping his own fate.
Don Reddy has the support of the police in his illegal activities. His brother, Rajendra, becomes an IAS officer and advises him to surrender. But will he?
An unexpected situation forces a deeply scarred man and a haughty film director to embark on a journey that changes their lives forever.
When it is learnt that smuggler Silver Head has ill intentions against the nation, intelligence officer Jayachandran is called in to find and finish the enemy.
Lenore, Bryan Mills' ex-wife, is murdered and with revenge on his mind, he's driven to protect his daughter, Kim from her wife's murderers.
Witness the miracles of Sai Baba, his spiritual journey, teachings and stories of him healing his followers.
A father love knows no bounds! A simple cable operator hatches an elaborate plan to protect his family from the law when his daughter commits a grave crime.

title_name: Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
description: Captain Jack Sparrow with Will and Elizabeth sets out to find the heart of Davy Jones and repay his debts.

title_name: The Beatles: Get Back - A Sneak Peek
description: Get an exclusive sneak peek at acclaimed filmmaker Peter Jackson's feature-length music documentary, "The Beatles: Get Back," before it comes to theaters in 2021.
The lives of a superstar, a doctor and a journalist are in the hands of a traffic police inspector and their city.
Leela and Charlee are madly in love with each other. Apart from their families being at loggerheads, an international don makes an entry to add to the chaos.
Swamy lures young girls and performs black magic on them. A police inspector takes him on and tries to tackle his evil powers.
Alif is a shy, Madarsa educated boy. When he is suddenly enrolled into a convent, he finds it difficult to adapt to the ways of modern education.
Krishna loves Mahalakshmi but is too scared to confront her family. Unfortunately, a brutal incident leaves him with the custody of her three young nephews.
In this new rendition of the classic, the comic duo of Timon and Pumbaa retell the story of The Lion King from their perspective.

title_name: Bal Hanuman III – Return of the Demon
description: Brought to life by his devil followers, the crocodile demon tries to create terror on earth. However, his plans get foiled as Bal Hanuman comes to the rescue
A musical based on the New York City newsboy strike of 1899 when young newspaper sellers are exploited beyond reason by their bosses they set out to enact change.
Warrior Malaikottai Vaaliban travels through time and lands, defeating all who challenge him. Yet, his journey shifts when a vengeful adversary emerges.
George Banks struggles with the day-to-day traumas brought by the two most expensive and fateful words in his daughter's vocabulary - I do.
Anand, who loves Ajantha, a blind girl, dies in an accident. Ajantha's life takes an unexpected turn after her eye surgery, and she realises her destiny.
Tony Stark encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin, and after failing to him, he embarks on a journey with relentless consequences.

title_name: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
description: Indiana Jones is tasked by Army Intelligence to track down a staff that is the key to locating the Ark of the Covenant, which is being sought by the Nazis.
Small-time reporter Engels' life changes drastically when he meets his ancestral goddess Mookuthi Amman. What happens when she puts forth an intriguing plea?
This psychological comedy revolves around Parapancha Bar and Restaurant, where people walk in with myriad problems, hoping to find solutions.
Unlucky since birth, Rambo finds hope when he falls in love with Kanmani and Khatija. His life gets complicated further when they both pursue him.
Krishna, the son of a rich man, falls in love with Satya, who dislikes rich people. To impress her, he pretends to be poor. How long will he pretend?
A loving son comes forward to help his father, an honest government employee, who is being harassed by a corrupt politician.
The story of Richard Montañez, the Frito Lay janitor who channeled his Mexican American heritage and upbringing to turn Flamin’ Hot Cheetos into an iconic snack.

title_name: The Little Mermaid II: Return To The Sea
description: Ariel must return to the sea to save her teenage daughter Melody from Morgana's evil schemes.
Inspired by her father's work, Sanskrit professor Shabari wants to become a priest! But, will the society let her follow her passion?
Movie director Kashinath married his sister-in-law, only to find out later that he has been cheated. Will he leave his wife, or will all turn out well?
Jayanth and Rathi are in love. On learning that he is HIV positive, he decides to stay away from Rathi to protect her.
Thambidurai, a revenue inspector, is scared of almost everything. Problems arise when this cowardliness comes in the way of him winning over his true love.
Omanakuttan and Viswanadhan are happy to get away from their strict wives. What happens when two girls who have fled from a mental asylum get into their car?
A filmmaker’s love letter to his grandmas, who spend their twilight years dancing, stretching, and farting their sorrows away.
Prabhu and his four college pals vow lifelong friendship. However, his love for a village belle Eshwari sets off a chain of revelations and strains their bond.
Nayudu Gari Abbayi is a Telugu drama about fathers and sons, rich heirs and property disputes. Watch the full movie, online, only on Hotstar.
Three village guys dream of marrying white girls and living a fancy life abroad. So, they flee to Goa in search of love. But not everything is a bed of roses.
Raghava is brought up by a loving mother. Years later, he has to attend a job interview. But his mother falls ill, leaving him with a tough choice.
A jewel smuggler hires two petty thieves to locate a cursed medallion. Will they be successful in this magical heist, or will they fall prey to the spell?

title_name: The Mouseketeers At Walt Disney World
description: The Disco Mice of the New Mickey Mouse Club visits America's favourite vacation spot, Walt Disney World!
Six passengers board the last bus, anxious to reach their destination. But fate has other plans for them as this unexpected journey turns into a nightmare.
Appu works in a theatre troupe. There is a major twist in his life when he is made the lead actor in a play.
Ganya, an orphan, is troubled by his evil uncle and aunt for the property that he has inherited from his family. Who will come to his rescue?
Driven by first love, high school sweethearts Anik and Ranja remain inseparable. But as families intervene, their relationship must stand the test of time.
A baby elephant named Whispers finds himself separated from his mother. On his search to find her, he pairs up with an outcast from another herd and together they brave the wilds of Africa.
Identical twins Geetha and Anjali fall for Anoop. A turn of mysterious events starts to unfold when one of them commits suicide.
Anand loves Anjali, but she is not interested in him. However, she gets duped by a colleague. Will she learn her lesson?
Millionaire Ramesh manages to escape molestation charges made by a beauty queen, Bharti. Years later, he is found murdered and the fingers point at her.
A baby lamp finds a ball to play with, just when the elder Luxo thinks his kid will settle down for a bit, Luxo Jr. finds a ten times larger ball.
Story of India's Mars orbiter Mangalyaan launched successfully, amidst international acclaim.
Arjun and Anu meet while travelling to their respective hometowns from London and fall in love. However, a lot of complications soon arise.
The opening of a new pizza shop in the neighbourhood has two young brothers, living in a slum, yearning for a slice of pizza.
Mukundan meets and falls for Seethalakshmi. However, he feels threatened when Raghavan too likes her and wishes to marry her. Who will be the lucky one?
Akira Sharma, a college student takes on four corrupt cops to prove herself innocent, when she gets involved in a crime that she has not committed.
Set against the backdrop of the Emergency, three students are caught between turbulent political scenarios which complicate their relationships.
Impressed with Jayanthi during an interview, Anand selects her for his brother, Ganesh. But will he accept the choice of partners of his other two siblings?
Set during the Indian Emergency, a simple housewife's life changes when she ventures into an area where residents are protesting against the government.
An advocate fights only women's divorce cases. When charged with murder, he decides to investigate the case and stumbles upon a shocking truth.
Officer Vikram Kumar sets out to investigate a bizarre missing case that replicates the story from a novel. Who is behind this copycat crime?
Nandagopan wishes to marry a simple girl. His dreams are thwarted when his uncle decides to get his daughter, a modern girl, married to him.
Bound by an expensive pre-nuptial agreement, Rajveer cannot divorce his wife Sheena. Things go awry when he hires Vicky, a womaniser, to get rid of his wife.
A girl joins an all-boys class of an engineering college and all hell breaks loose. Things take a turn for the worse when she gets pregnant.
Old Avittam Thirunal Achutha Kurup's family is irritated by his intrusive nature. However, everything changes when they learn that he owns a huge estate.
A deep dive into the struggles of two athletes, who sweat it out to make it big in the bureaucratic world of Indian sports.
Terror grips a village after a school bus explodes thanks to a bomb. To make matters worse, bumbling cop Mahadevan is assigned the case.
Mathew Koshy and S.R.K. Nair are owners of football teams and are rivals. Problems arise when Nair buys Vijayan, the best player of Koshy's team.
Lloyd Dobler falls desperately in love with the class valedictorian, Diane Court. In Diane's tough times, he must convince her to let him help her through it.
Bad-ass cop Bajirao Singham is back as the DCP of Mumbai. To pave the way for justice, he has to deal with a corrupt politician and an immoral god-man.
A true-crime thriller about the trailblazing reporters who broke the story of the notorious Boston Strangler murders.
Jayamma is a religious lady. Her atheist son gets into trouble when some tantriks, who practise black magic and human sacrifice, target the girl he loves.
A teen girl rushes to perfect her late Tia Abuela’s special recipe for a local ice cream contest.
Tourist guide Joji thinks he has hit jackpot when he meets Nandini, a mentally ill but rich girl visiting Ooty. Soon he realises things are not as they seem.
Senku and his allies awaken the son of the Nanami Conglomerate, Ryusui Nanami, to man their ship. However, he turns out to be more trouble than he is worth.
When an aging relative gets diagnosed with Alzheimer, the Sarkar family comes together to tend to their loved one, keeping their past conflicts at bay.
When Siddarthan dies mysteriously, his son, Adi, decides to dig into his past and solve the mystery. Later, he writes a book on his father's memoirs.
Master sorcerer Balthazar hires Dave as an apprentice to aid him in saving the city from his arch-enemy Maxim Horvath.
It's a battle of brain, brawn and emotions for RAW agent Wisam Ahmad Kashmiri who struggles between eliminating his nemesis and maintaining a personal life.
College sweethearts Gunashekhar and Uma witness a murder. The situation worsens when the victim is connected to gangsters Keshava and Gold Reddy.
When their land is threatened by the evil forces of Lankasoor, Ghatothkach and his friends come to the forefront and see off challenges with valour.
Anoop Krishnan is a government school teacher who hates his job. Aspiring to hold an MBA degree, he neglects his job and has to face the repercussions.
Quadriplegic Stephen loves life while musician John is always worried about the future. Circumstances make them good friends until a nurse enters their lives.
Guy, a bank teller, discovers he is a background player in an open-world video game and decides to become the hero of his own story.
A staunch feminist who wants nothing to do with men finds one particular man constantly trying to win her heart. For how long will she resist his charms?
After a personal tragedy, filmmaker Ahana seeks a psychiatrist’s help. In the process, she meets an aspiring musician who changes her life for good.
A perennial bridesmaid is unhappy as her little sister is marrying the man of her dreams. She falls in love with a cynical journalist who's covering the event.
Shiva, a thief, and his gang of friends break into a haunted house after pulling off a heist. Soon they come in contact with a series of supernatural elements.
School-goer Banku moves into the Nath villa with his parents. His life takes an adventurous turn when he befriends an unfriendly ghost.
Srikrishnan and his best friend, Manickam, fall in love with the same girl, a village performer. However, Srikrishnan decides to woo her at any cost.
Feudal lords across the country practice slavery and torture the underprivileged. A common man decides to fight against one such feudal lord. Will he succeed?
Honest cabbie Shambhu returns Smitha's misplaced bag. But his generosity doesn't end there, and he helps her when her wicked uncle tries to loot her property.
When an Indian plane is hijacked by terrorists, a strict army man must forget his past and team up with a diligent ACP to plan a rescue mission.
A group of navy men accidentally end up on an island of little people. Their princess is engaged, but when she spots one of the officials, she falls for him.
Susheela falls for Arjun, a respected small-business owner. Their love story takes a hit when she discovers his concealed ambition to loot the rich.
During an adventure into a dark criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his future co-pilot Chewbacca and Lando Calrissian years before joining the Rebellion.
Sakkarai Pandi counsels convict Selvam, and he emerges from jail as a reformed man. But once outside, Selvam realizes that Pandi has an ulterior motive.
Vithal is a ruthless rowdy who hates women but ends up falling for Kaveri. However, things take an ugly turn when her lover makes an entry.
Ravi puts aside his father's dreams of him pursuing higher education and moving abroad when he falls in love with Sameera. But she loves someone else!
Best friends Haseeb and Irshad share a common interest of rearing pigeons for competitions. However, a tragedy has them recalling how many lives got ruined.
Immanuel strives to meet targets at his job in an insurance company. Soon he is exposed to unethical practices and frauds that the clients face in the company
Gayatri Devi claims to be Devadasa's second wife, creating havoc at his house as he is in a coma. What happens when his grandson falls for her granddaughter?
A medical company employee, Brinda also fights for women's rights. Her life takes a drastic turn when a series of murders takes place via poisoning.
Mohan Sanker, a brave cop, leads an uneventful life after losing his family in an accident. However, when his enemies begin to die, Mohan becomes a suspect.

title_name: Bad Times at the El Royale
description: Seven strangers meet at Lake Tahoe's El Royale, where everyone will have one last shot at redemption for one night before everything goes to hell.
An underage girl gets kidnapped and raped by her uncle. A fierce and diligent cop, Jhansi enters her life as a saviour to bring the culprits to justice.
Join Pete Docter for a tour around Pixar and get a sneak peek at several upcoming Disney+ releases.
Bhaskaran fails his BA despite several attempts. He falls for Chandrika, who has a very different approach to life. Can he get his act together to impress her?
Now in color, Marvel Studios’ “Werewolf by Night in Color” finds monster hunters in a deadly game.

title_name: Taylor Swift | The Eras Tour (Taylor's Version)
description: Experience the exclusive "(Taylor’s Version)" cut of the record-breaking phenomenon concert film with new performances & an acoustic collection.

title_name: Assembled: The Making of Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
description: Join the cast and crew as they delve deep into the creation of "Ant-Man and The Wasp: Quantumania."
In their fight against terrorism, two cops have to deal with a corrupt minister. Now they have to stop him at any cost.
Venu, a news cameraman, reaches Kerala to cover a scandal involving a local politician. There he meets his old flame Renuka and sparks fly again.
The story of the adventurous childhood of Prince Abhimanyu – son of demi-god Arjun and Subhadra, and how he learned his exceptional fighting skills.
Raja is an innocent man, living in the shadows of his evil brothers-in-law. However, a new friendship gives him the motivation to stand up for his rights.
A small-town dancer performs at political rallies. When molested during one such performance, will she fight back her perpetrator or bow down to his power?
Ram, a righteous man, who is devoted to his foster brothers, finds his life falling apart when a cruel dictator targets his peace-loving family.
In this sequel to the superhit action thriller Saamy, Aarusaamy's son becomes a cop and takes on Ravana Pichai, the criminal behind his parents' murder.
Three good friends get caught in a love triangle, which threatens to destroy their friendship. How will they cope with the situation?
Suruli is imprisoned for threatening to kill his lover, Mynaa, if she marries someone else unwillingly. What does fate have in store for the two of them?
A series of kidnappings is sweeping the state! Racing against time, an undercover cop must unravel the racket whilst probing its connection with his father.
Thomas Kora, the patriarch of a large family, is fond of his youngest son, Joji. When Joji gets accused of murder, Thomas goes all out to prove him innocent.
A mercenary delivery man finds his world turned upside down when a package he has been hired to transport turns out to be a beautiful, gagged woman.
Eight people get stranded on an island with a killer on the loose. As they are murdered one by one, everyone becomes a suspect.
Raju is against certain policies at his workplace. So he forms a union of workers, which later clashes with the management that believes in autocratic rules.
In the African savanna, a young prince overcomes betrayal and tragedy to assume his rightful place on Pride Rock.
Kiran, a constable's daughter, grows up to become a strong and righteous cop. However, she gets transferred to Bellary and her difficulties begin.
Prosecution is a Malayalam drama, directed by Thulasidas, starring Manoj K Jayan and Ranjini in the lead roles. Watch the full movie Prosecution online, only on Hotstar.
Mater is a famous daredevil who does all kinds of stunts. Lightning McQueen becomes an unwilling participant in Mater's greatest stunt ever.
When a small town gets plunged into the nightmare of serial killings, rookie cop Arjan embarks on a chase for the truth and unravels a gruesome conspiracy.
Prince and Sadasivan kidnap a girl for their friend Pavithran. However, they land in big trouble after abducting the wrong woman.
Unlucky since birth, Rambo finds hope when he falls in love with Kanmani and Khatija. His life gets complicated further when they both pursue him.
Raj repairs his deceased father Deven's unfinished car. Although a futuristic vehicle, it becomes too much for Raj to handle.
An ex-army man starts a unique movement to build a strong society, which brings him under the radar of powerful opponents. Can his vision help him fight them? .
A group of thieves commit burglary, leading a police officer on a quest to catch them. During his search, he unravels interesting information about the robbers.
With brother Max by his side, can Leo face his challenges and overcome his arrogance to become the King he's always dreamed he'd be?
Aravind and Divya separate after few weeks of marriage. Three years later, Divya comes back, this time demanding a divorce. Are they destined to be together?
Sing along with your favourite songs with on-screen lyrics as you watch “Tangled."
At his grandfather's request, Paramu goes to his ancestral village to collect a sacred ornament. But it is not going to be a smooth visit.
Being an adopted daughter who gets abandoned by her parents, Suguna's life gets challenging when her husband dies in an accident and her lover returns.
Posing as ghosthunters, three friends forge a business plan. But their lies turn into reality as they encounter real spirits. And there’s no coming back!
A visually impaired man, who is also a trained fighter, is assigned to protect the daughter of a police officer from his enemies.
At 16 years, Swathi Thirunal becomes the Maharaja of Travancore after taking over the throne from his aunt. This king also ruled through his music.

title_name: Good Chemistry: The Story of Elemental
description: Director Peter Sohn shares stories of his family and career and how it all inspired "Elemental."
Roja and Raja, who hail from different backgrounds, find love online. When their identities are revealed, will they choose love over obligations?

title_name: The Lion King II: Simba's Pride
description: Simba's daughter Kiara encounters Kovu, son of lioness Zira, once a close friend of the late Scar. Zira with her son's help plots against Kiara to avenge Scar.
Andy's boss Miranda Priestly makes her life a living hell with sarcasm and insults. She has to hold on to this job for a year to land her dream job.
Two villagers are childhood friends with different ideologies. One incident turns them into leaders of rival gangs, which causes their friendship to be tested.
When Rex finds himself left behind in the bathroom, he puts his limbs to use by getting a bath going for a bunch of new toy friends.
Arjun falls in love with Nisha, an inspiring dancer, and marries her. Problems arise when he starts resenting her passion for dance and asks her to quit.
Shekar secretly takes acting lessons and falls in love with his classmate without letting his strict father know about it. But what happens when he finds out?
Ranga loves thrills in life. Furious with his way of living, Swathi weds a police officer, who is pursuing a criminal. Will she be able to connect the dots?
Malavika falls in love with Abdul Rahman. She leaves her father, Avittam Thirunal Narayana Varma, for him, but he gets crippled in a clash with her brothers.
When Manny, Sid and Diego discover that global warming has endangered the ice at the end of their valley, they set out to search for a safer habitat

title_name: Eduru Maneli Ganda Pakkada Maneli Hendathi
description: Vasudev, a miser, tries to control his pregnant wife's spending habits. Furious, she leaves him. Years later, unknowingly she rents a house opposite his.
Two theatre artists who have grown up as brothers turn rivals when they want the same part in a play. How far will jealousy and rivalry take them?
Indira, a Naxalite serving a life sentence for a landlord's murder, visits her family when she is out on parole, but her welcome home is not as she expected.
Sakthi gets arrested for his parents' murder. He befriends four criminals in jail, and they break out of prison to go to Mumbai. But they end up in Renigunta.
In this grand live-action adventure, Dumbo, a flying elephant, soars to new heights alongside spectacular aerial artist Colette Marchant.
The son of a poor farmer gets adopted by a rich man, just so he can convince the father of the girl of his dreams to marry her. But is money enough?
Unlucky since birth, Rambo finds hope when he falls in love with Kanmani and Khatija. His life gets complicated further when they both pursue him.
An NRI goes to extreme lengths to raise awareness against electoral fraud and eventually contests as a non-partisan politician, risking his own life.
A young man uncovers a huge scam while investigating his parents' suspicious death. With danger lurking around, he sets out to bring the murderers to book.
Parenting is hard, especially when curiosity tugs at a young raccoon whose parent tries to keep them both safe.
A criminology student lands his first job with a detective agency. Things take an ugly turn when his subjects start dying mysteriously in one of his cases.
After the formation of Empire, Luke meets Obi-Wan Kenobi, who begins his Jedi training by taking him on a daring mission to rescue Princess Leia.
Happily married, Lakshmi and Menon live in the US. However, when Lakshmi sees Menon with a foreigner, she is determined to end her marriage.
Sixteen-year-old, June Sara Joy feels that she lacks any special talent. Here's her story of blossoming into an independent young woman.
A newlywed couple move into a haunted mansion only for the wife to get possessed. Between a psychiatrist and tantrik, whom will the family trust to save her?
Two fishermen face financial issues due to lack of resources. To add to their woes, a girl from the village tries to fight an industrialist who is looting them.
Wanting to marry a rich man, Sathi turns down Babu's proposal. Finding no luck, she plots to make him rich and marry him. But will she succeed in her scheme?
Gopal, Madhav, Lucky, Laxman 1 and Laxman 2 go back to the orphanage they grew up in, only to discover some spooky secrets about their childhood friend, Khushi.
Topi, Dhoti, and Suitboot perch on Kailash Parbhat while on a mission, where they meet Nandi and Mooshak Raj who tell them more about Bal Ganesh.
Shivu is the breadwinner of his family. However, life takes a turn for the worse when Shivu loses his memory.
The comfortable life of Unni and Latha takes a turn for the worse when Jose, an old classmate, comes to stay with them. However, why is Unni so troubled?
Irene, an Indo-Canadian, is making a film on Indian politics. Aymanam, a youth wing leader, aims to become a full-fledged politician. Soon she falls for him.
The Kapoors, Bajajs and Tiwaris lead picture-perfect lives until a young woman named Vaani arrives with an utterly cute bundle of joy in tow.
In this age of sky scrapers, five friends struggle to find an open space to play football on Sundays, will they find it?
Five schoolmates meet after years and decide to visit their alma mater. During the road trip, they revisit their bittersweet childhood memories.
A blind man becomes the prime suspect in a murder case. But he also has to protect the victim's daughter and prove his innocence. How will he get out of this?
A wealthy NRI wishes to marry a village girl. However, her lover, who was believed to be dead, returns to interrupt the marriage plans.
Cousins Shiva and Shekar get mired in village politics by sheer chance. Things take a turn for the worse when a rival is killed, and their bond is put to test.

Aayushkalam is a Malayalam fantasy drama starring Jayaram, Sreenivasan, Mukesh and Saikumar, directed by Kamal Master. Balakrishna is a heart patient and receives a heart transplant from Aby who dies. Soon he begins to see the ghost of Aby who wants Balakrishna to investigate his death. Watch the full movie online, only on Hotstar.
During a live show, radio jockey Swarnaja receives a mysterious phone call. As she engages in the conversation, some uneasy secrets come to light.
A young girl leaves for Mysore to meet and reject a prospective groom. On the bus, she meets a stranger, and they end up falling for each other.
Mater, a private detective, searches for clues when Lieutenant McQueen arrives to help bring the criminals to justice.
A newly appointed estate manager, Bharathi, has a secret admirer, but it's not who he thinks it is. Is he in trouble, or is Cupid calling?
In an attempt to avoid a life of dangerous police work, Annie and her boyfriend head to the Caribbean for a relaxing vacation — or so they thought.
Two wastrels pretend to be billionaires with an intention of marrying into rich families. But what will happen when they fall in love for real?
Aakash plots a terrorist attack on a train in London. Arjun, an officer on the brink of retirement, tries to negotiate with him. Who will win this war?
A young, helpful guy has to face the fury of the villagers for his postman father's laziness. But a chance meeting with a 'terrorist' changes his life.
Vidyadharan is a simple man. However, his wife's lavish lifestyle costs him his bank job. Frustrated, he runs away and finds solace amongst slum dwellers.
After a kidnapped bank teller uses a neighbor's wandering cat to send an S.O.S., the F.B.I. assigns a cat-allergic Agent to the case.
Though he dreams of becoming a lawyer, Narayanankutty ends up as a clerk in a government office. But he does not stop raising his voice when he sees injustice.
Sreekumar aspires to get a doctorate in linguistics. But when his thesis gets rejected, he joins a pig farm and does menial jobs.
A 'blind' pianist lands in hot water when he witnesses a crime during a private concert. Trapped in a catch-22 situation, Arun is in for an unpleasant ride.
Amir and Pari are a happily married couple. But when Pari learns about his underworld ties, all hell breaks loose on their seemingly perfect life.

Aliya Geleya is a Kannada comedy drama starring Abhijith, Balaraj, Mamatha and Shankar Rao, directed by Jayanth. Rashmi and her husband Rajesh choose their friend Raju for Shruthi, Rashmi's sister. Projected as a well-to-do man, just before the wedding, Raju's true identity comes to the fore. Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.
Dacoit Babban Singh is on the loose in Kaliganj. Inspector Narsimha hires two petty goons, Heero and Raj to nab him. Will the duo succeed in their plan?
Prabhakar Varma is assigned to investigate the death of Omana, the daughter-in-law of a local businessman. It looks like a suicide, but Varma is not convinced.
An old lady from the slums adopts a rag picker. When he gets taunted by some school students, he decides to educate himself.
An ambitious young woman finds fame when she poses as the survivor of a deadly attack, but she soon learns that online notoriety comes with a terrible price.
United by love and divided by caste, Kittu and Gomathi are trapped in the societal boundary. In a test of love and loyalty, who wins?
A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence - he must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.
Babu takes care of his bedridden grandfather and one day meet his estranged uncle, Balu, who returns after years to meet him. Why was Balu away all this while?
Pianist Lang Lang and Disney’s iconic music come together in this concert at Royal Albert Hall.
The crash in the stock market affects business tycoon Dharmapalan drastically. And his happy family life also gets shattered.
Deprived of his mighty hammer Mjolnir, Thor must escape the other side of the universe to save his home, Asgard, from Hela, the goddess of death.
Donald Duck stirs up a hornet’s nest of trouble when he tangles with a bee.
A cruel landlord insists on sleeping with the brides of all his workers. However, newlywed Devu's husband, Raman, takes a firm stand and invites his fury.

title_name: Star Wars: The Rise Of Skywalker
description: The surviving members of the resistance face the First Order once again, as the landmark Skywalker saga reaches its conclusion.
The film recounts the vital history of a team of black female mathematicians at NASA, who helped the USA win the space race against the Soviet Union.
Two stepbrothers are constantly pitted against each other. Their rivalry spills over onto the kabaddi field and worsens when they fall in love with a girl.
Six nonchalant youngsters form a band after they go against their families' wishes. Their friendship is put to the test as they try to fend for themselves.
Dennis is a businessman, and Ravishankar claims the former's successes as his own. What happens when Ravi's family believe his fibs and propose marriage?
On an untamed island, a photoshoot goes awry and the models and crew members get killed mysteriously. But there is one survivor who may have all the answers.
A young man in an office sees the girl of his dreams in a skyscraper window across the street. But how can he get her attention?
When three unemployed tenants do not pay rent, the owner decides to sell the house without their knowledge. What happens when they get in his family matters?
Ramachandran returns from Dubai and pretends to be a rich man. A victim of visa fraud, he tries to change his life by reopening a mill.
Six different people struggle with problems of their own. The only thing they have in common is a mass murderer who decides to end their lives.
Samara Simham is a Telugu action drama starring Suresh Gopi, Nedumudi Venu and Murali. Watch the full film online only on Hotstar.
Cop Soorya and gangster Shukra are lookalikes. When Soorya falls into trouble at the hands of bad guys, Shukra comes to set things right.
A tragedy separates childhood sweethearts Kishan and Sanam. Years later, Kishan embarks on a quest for his long-lost love. But destiny has other plans!
Prince names his dog Diana, after his ex-flame, an actress. When the dog features in Diana�s film, she becomes jealous and plots to separate it from its owner.
Ramesh, a college student, lives a quiet life with his widowed mother. A minister is murdered, and their normal life takes a turn for the worse.
Tigger embarks on a hilarious adventure when Rabbit suggests that he should go find other tiggers to play with.
When a greedy toy collector kidnaps Woody, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him.
A plane is hijacked by ruthless terrorists who have held the passengers hostage. Now, it is up to Major Raveendra to rescue them and capture the hijackers.
Seenu leads an aimless life in his village, where a corrupt incumbent leader runs rampant. However, his life changes when he falls in love with Seetha.
Seeing the local leaders continue to cheat poor villagers of their resources, Narahari and his friends oppose them and change the lives of the people.
Punished for taking water from the Zamindar's pond, Nathu kidnaps their newborn son. 20 years later, the boy is a petty thief but still unaware of his past.
Vasu and Shweta's families are battling over the custody of a house, unaware of their relationship. Things change when a spooky secret about the house unravels.

title_name: Doctor Who: The Church on Ruby Road
description: Long ago, on Christmas Eve, a baby was abandoned in the snow. Today, Ruby Sunday meets the Doctor, goblins, stolen babies, and perhaps, the secret of her birth.
Battling inner conflict, an alcoholic police officer reports to duty to investigate a series of deaths showing a pattern similar to his family's murder.
At 40, Thamiz decides to take the plunge and direct his own film. However, he cannot decide on a script. Will he be able to fulfil his dreams?
Chandran struggles to support his family. His life takes a turn when he gets a job in the Andamans. But is this the end of all his problems?
A holiday meant to reunite with his friend Krishna adds more action and drama to Gaja's life as he fights a rival group that poses a threat to Krishna's life.
Maya, a spoilt daughter of a rich man, pulls a prank on Dr Srinivas. He, in turn, plans his revenge, and her life turns topsy-turvy.

A crew of African American pilots in the Tuskegee training program, having faced segregation while kept mostly on the ground during World War II, are called into duty under the guidance of Col. A.J. Bullard.
A depressed Tanu finds solace in radio jockey Pradeep's show. Smitten after seeing her during a train journey, Pradeep decides to express his feelings to her.
Model Reshma tries to lure an uninterested photographer, Raj. When he finally succumbs, she changes her mind and does the unexpected.
Due to a mistaken identity, Shree, Rekha, and Sonu find themselves caught in a love triangle. What happens when the truth comes to light?
Manohar and Priya's marriage hits rock bottom when they realise that a new TV show is about their lives. How will this shape the fate of their family?
A doting brother, Swami, is left heartbroken when his sisters Sita and Gita are killed by a lecherous influential man. How will he avenge their deaths?
Arrested for nuisance, Saba spins wild breakup tales to melt a sympathetic cop, hoping to charm his way out. Whose story is he narrating, and will his plan work?
Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe’s most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.
A rich and careless businessman Vijay hires a senior citizen Selvam to pose as his dead father. As they grow closer, they help each other find their soulmates.
A bus journey goes horribly wrong when a robbery takes place on board. That's when all the passengers get together to catch the burglar.
A double murder case of a teenage girl and the family's domestic help shakes the nation. With many suspects and multiple theories, who is the real culprit?
An ayurvedic physician predicts death by feeling a patient's pulse. An allopathic doctor's arrival makes him insecure as he is accused of misleading everyone.
An ex-military officer turned vigilante, Gana falls in love with Hansita, who agrees to marry him only if he gives up his violent ways. Will he?
Upendran is a wealthy businessman who is settled abroad. He meets a bar dancer and falls for her. When he decides to marry her, he encounters problems.
In a short span, Shiva and Shekar emerge as an invincible duo. Unfortunately, their unity is threatened when one of them kills a rival gang member.
Based on the lives of Kanchanamala and political activist Moideen, here's a story of doomed love between two people forced apart by their different religions.
Five happy-go-lucky college friends set out to save their campus from a greedy Australian businessman, who intends to convert it into a casino.
An honest cop named Theeran pays a heavy price for investigating the case of criminals, who shamelessly commit a crime and escape punishment.
Adulting is hard. One day you're nailing it, the next you're a stack of kids hiding in a trenchcoat.

title_name: Monster Inside: America's Most Extreme Haunted House
description: Russ McKamey lures enthusiasts into McKamey Manor, an "extreme haunted house."

title_name: Now And Then – The Last Beatles Song
description: Discover the story behind the last Beatles song, “Now And Then.”

title_name: The Wonderful Winter of Mickey Mouse
description: The wonder of the winter season takes Mickey Mouse and his friends on a journey through three magical stories.
An IPS officer decides to investigate his mentor's death. The suspects are the latter's wife, her sister and a ganja plantation owner.
Kabbadi player Velu gets embroiled in a chaotic situation after he helps Dhanalakshmi escape a notorious gang leader's clasp.

title_name: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
description: Jake must protect the kids in Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children, a magical school, from being hunted by their terrifying enemies.
Three guys panic when they find their boss murdered. Fearing getting blamed for his death, they try to show that he is alive.
Gopi comes to the city from his village looking for a job. When all attempts fail, he teams up with Seena to become petty thieves.
Dhruv meets and falls in love with Harika at the airport. However, she is heading to India to meet a prospective groom. How will he make her fall for him?
A young man dreams to release his father from prison and help his sister become a doctor. However, to live his dreams, he must deal with a dreaded criminal.
Spinning a web of lies, four crooks seek shelter in a bungalow owned by a blind couple. But hilarity ensues when they all fall in love with a girl next door.
A fisherman's wish for his daughter to become a doctor is crushed when she elopes with another fisherman. Upset, he sets a deadly task for his son-in-law.
Chandran returns after years in the Gulf to settle down in life. While his childhood love is already married, he finds himself getting involved in her problems.
Sub-inspector Ramesh falls for Rajani, but she joins an ashram after her father's death. However, trouble follows when criminals begin targeting the ashram.
Chinni and Chakri are friends who do small-time con jobs. While circumstances turn them against each other, destiny has something else in store for them.
After his father's death, Ravi takes over his wealth and business. However, when he begins to spend lavishly, the family gets worried about the family business.
Mahesh strives to reform the children staying in an ashram. Will he succeed in his attempt?
Ravi is a driver by profession and helps Sarathi complete his studies. Years later, Sarathi is well-settled and the two drift apart. How will they reunite?
Three stories revolving around three individuals - an undercover spy, a witness to a murder and a criminal defence lawyer. One common thread - crime.
An undercover cop's life turns upside down when his daughter is kidnapped during a vital mission. However, his traumatic past returns for one last showdown!
When Megha’s beau abandons her, Ankush helps her settle in Delhi. He falls in love with her, however, problems arise as the missing boyfriend returns.
What will you do if you find a bag full of cash? Nandan Kumar faces a similar dilemma when a bag triggers a chain of chaos in his life. Kya iss bag mein kuch kaala hai?
In three heartwarming tales, Cinderella finds it difficult to adjust to her married life. Later, Jaq becomes human for a day and Anastasia finds true love.
In the wake of a scandal, Officer George and his crime squad set out to nab a criminal gang. Will they outsmart the odds and bring justice to the forefront?
Krishna Prasad has loved elephants since he was a kid. This love makes it hard for him to keep a regular job. But things change when Gauri enters his life.
In a comedy of errors, an actress orchestrates her own kidnapping to raise Rs 10 crore for a noble cause. But she is in for a big shock.
A bodyguard falls in love with a woman over the phone, without realising that she is actually the woman he is protecting.
When Sekhar is mistaken for a Maoist and killed in a police encounter, his wife, Madhurima, takes it upon herself to prove his innocence. How far will she go?

title_name: LEGO Star Wars: The New Yoda Chronicles - Escape from the Jedi Temple
description: Yoda and the Ghost of Obi-Wan recall the heist they pulled to free the Holocrons from the Temple in the dawning days of the Empire.
Usha returns from the US after her studies. While her cousin Thampi wants to marry her, she is attracted to Balan, a local school teacher.
Sasthram Jayichu Manushyan Thottu is a Malayalam action film, starring Prem Nazir, Jayabharathi and Adoor Bhasi. Watch the full film, online only on Hotstar.
When Rehan tries to sell a haunted mansion, he comes across two spirits, Iyar and Meera. He must now go back in time to save Meera from getting raped by Iyar.
Madhavan, a villager, moves to Kochi after his brother's sudden death. Suspecting foul play, he decides to investigate and fight the corrupt.
Babu and Keerthy are in love and wish to get married. But her dad wants her to tie the knot with her ex-fiance. How will Babu convince her family to accept him?
A tough army officer searches for his ex-lover's child, who is kidnapped under mysterious circumstances. However, his quest is not easy.
Jack Traven, a fearless LAPD cop on SWAT detail, finds himself trapped on a runaway city bus set to explode if it falls under 50 mph.
Mickey receives a baby kangaroo from Australia, which upsets Pluto.
Two brothers, Peddodu and Chinnodu, fall in love with the same girl. Which one of the two brothers will manage to win her heart and marry her?
Ferdinand is a peace-loving bull but, his idyllic life changes as he is mistaken for a vicious beast, and taken away to a bull training camp.
Eragon, a 17-year-old boy, learns to ride the dragon from Brom. Together they must flee the evil king Galbatorix's forces using the help of their dragon.
Nandini's visually impaired parents wish to get her married. However, some of her relatives have their eye on her property. How will she save herself from them?
Mia learns that her deceased father was the crown prince of Principality of Genovia. As heir to the throne, her grandmother insists that she become the ruler.
Uday is a rich brat who hires his love interest as his maid. However, his life changes when he decides to settle scores with the man he thought was his father.

title_name: LEGO Star Wars: The New Yoda Chronicles - Raid on Coruscant
description: Luke Skywalker knows there's only one way to stop the Empire's attack: a bold attack on Coruscant to bring back the Holocrons.
Saptagiri unwillingly joins his father's job but discovers the harsh truth behind his death. And thus begins his quest to nab the perpetrators.
A lonely-and-innocent kid, Ashu's life takes an adventurous turn when he convinces his family to bring Ganesha home during Ganeshotsav.
The arrival of film star Yamuna Rani in the neighbourhood poses a threat to the wives. They begin suspecting their husbands of having an affair with her.
A flyover has turned into a hotspot of accidents! Young journalist Bidisha steps in to investigate. But her quest lands her in a web of murder and mysteries.
Humans go to war with artificial intelligence in this epic sci-fi thriller.
Insecurities seep in as renowned artist Anjan gets struck by a creative block. But gloominess begins to descend when an art student Ria enters his life.
Prakash, a successful architect, falls in love with Anu, a single mother. To impress her, he becomes the caretaker of her daughter.
Anand, his wife, Kavita, and their only child, a daughter Neha are a happy family. Things turn upside down when Neha is stalked by a mysterious woman, Nandita.
When three single city girls meet a politician's kin and his friends, a night out becomes a nightmare, which then causes a clash of societal norms and justice.
Sidharthan, a part-time actor, rents a house posing as a rich man. His life takes a turn when he encounters Pooja, who has a haunted past.
Teja Bhai, a famous gangster, falls in love with Vedhika. On learning that her father wants her to marry a decent man, he decides to give up his criminal life.
Unnikrishnan dreams of following the footsteps of his idol, Prem Nazir, and wants to be a detective like his character in many films. Will he achieve his goal?
A mutant and future X-Men member called Wolverine sets out to avenge the deaths of his loved ones at the hands of Sabretooth.
Gayathri is against love and men. What will she do when her daughter falls in love with their neighbour against her wishes?
After returning from the US, Raksha decides to go sight-seeing. She has a tiff with the cab driver, but she realises that she has fallen in love with him.
Set during the COVID-19 pandemic, when a prediction of death by an astrologer shakes up a close-knit family, their manservant tries to set things right.
Sing along with your favourite songs from “The Lion King” with on-screen lyrics.
Rohit winds up in love after a chance meeting with Antu. As he decides to win her over, he learns of her admirer Chiranjib. And a love triangle unfolds!
A jobless graduate heads to the city in search of work. His life takes an unexpected turn when he gets framed for the murder of a politician.
An existential crisis pushes Kuntol to his personal extreme. Finding no way out, he teams up with Sudarshan and hatches illegal plans to escape misery.
A covert investigation changes its course when special officer Amar encounters an unrelenting Vikram and his pursuit to take down a notorious drug cartel.
With dreams to start his own business, Sethumadhavan is forced to face off against corrupt bureaucracy and his complicated personal life.
A misunderstanding causes Viraj's mother to disown him, and he willingly accepts her decision. Will Viraj ever make his mother perceive the truth?
Young hero Thomas embarks on a dangerous mission to find a cure for the deadly virus known as the Flare, which turns people into rampaging zombies.
A little misunderstanding turns Jeeva and his wife's life topsy-turvy. Will they be able to handle the situation and set things right?
The lives of four friends, who are chicken thieves, takes a turn for the worse when they get caught in the act.
Maya Dolittle has inherited her father's ability to talk to animals and uses that ability to save the summer ranch from a takeover.
Ambikapathy escapes his cruel uncle and begins to sell sundal at Marina beach. He ends up inspiring other kids at the beach to gain education.
Lorry driver Noble struggles to make a living. What happens when Susan, a judge, comes to know that he is her son?
Vinod, still reeling from a failed relationship, falls head over heels in love with another girl. Will he succeed this time?
In his 40s, Megh becomes a single father with two children through surrogacy. Things take an interesting turn when he falls in love with Brishti.
Chetak braves his way into the Battle of Haldighati and emerges as a loyal horse-cum-companion to his master, the valiant Rajput king Maharana Pratap.
Dr. Ramanujam hides his new invention in a car and disappears. Gangsters Girgit and Diana hunt the car, but it has a few plans of its own!
Befriended by a celebrity heiress after curing the star's neurotic pooch, Maya Dolittle finds herself in great demand as a pet whisperer to the stars.
A hockey match will decide the fate of Venu and Amit, who are fighting to win over the same girl, Anu. Who will manage to woo her successfully?
Under the British Raj, two revolutionaries with personal agendas forge a friendship, only to find each other on opposing sides.
Vijayakumar and Shashikala have a girl baby through the IVF procedure. However, the little girl struggles to lead a happy life as her father hates her.
A scandalous video of the groom-to-be, Rakesh, makes its way to a porn site just before his marriage. Will he get married peacefully or the viral fever ruin it?
In a quest to unravel the truth behind a certain Christmas eve, journalist Megha comes across multiple perspectives and evidence, leading her to Richie.

Savaari 2 is a Kannada drama, starring Srinagara Kitty, Girish Karnad and Mukhya Manthri Chandru. Seenu (Kitty) uses his father-in-law, minister Jayaprakash's (Chandru) name for all wrong dealings. But when Vishwanath (Karnad) offers him a treasure deal, things take a different turn. Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.
After witnessing the murder of his father by the village goon, young Kochuvava swears revenge. He grows up to be a harsh businessman, hell-bent on retaliation.
Lucy Cola is a NASA astronaut who after returning from space, suddenly feels everything around her stiflingly small.
While on a grand world tour, the Muppets find themselves wrapped into a European jewel-heist caper headed by a Kermit lookalike and his dastardly sidekick.
Desperate to find love, Hari woos many girls. But a blast from the past gives him the perspective he lacked and changes his life.
A naive tea vendor takes a bad route and seeks revenge on the people responsible for his brother's death.
On arriving at an old palatial house, a rich man learns that his forefathers' spirits are cursed. He now has to break the jinx and give them salvation.
Abhinay, a striving junior artist, becomes CEO of his lover's company. Stardom beckons, but a mysterious encounter with Nero alters his path dramatically.
Six years after the blissful marriage, Varun and Ashwini are the epitome of a perfect couple. But with doubts and insecurities seeping in, will love prevail?
Pavithran dreams of marrying a beautiful lady someday. However, an astrologer predicts that he will marry a widow, leaving him shocked.
It's been fifteen years since Giselle and Robert wed, and a frustrated Giselle turns to the magic of Andalasia in hopes of finding her happily ever after.
The Muppet characters tell their version of the classic tale of an old and bitter miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.
Three friends love Kala, who is already married. Dejected, they decide to turn good Samaritans and help the village, which is ruled by two ruthless brothers
Luke Anthony comes to a village searching for his missing wife. His suspicious activities start drawing the attention of the villagers. What is his real motive?

title_name: Beauty and the Beast: A 30th Celebration
description: An animated and live-action special honoring the 30th anniversary of the animated classic story.
Ajay and Ranjitha are best friends. Ranjitha's father disapproves of this friendship. Things get complicated when they fall in love with each other.
A respected martial arts expert finds himself in a situation during a competition which endangers his life and poses a threat to the pride of his community.
Alex is in a relationship with Sheela. However, their life gets shattered when his parents insist that he marry her sister, Lillikutty.
Madhu and Usha are in love and about to get married. Some shocking revelations about her family by her father leave a bitter taste. What are they?
Ralph, an arcade game villain, sets off on a journey through every generation of video games to prove he's got what it takes to be a hero.
Two advertising professionals who are die-hard R.D. Burman fans lead a messy personal life. When they befriend their boss's son, a new journey of music begins.
Thor sets out on a journey to defeat Malekith, the leader of the Dark Elves when he returns to Asgard to fulfil his desire of destroying the Nine Realms.
Former superhero Bob Parr has adopted a civilian life with his family. Suddenly, he is back in action after being summoned for a top-secret assignment.
To fulfil the dream of watching his son play at Lord's stadium, Rusy is willing to go to any extent, even if it means stealing Sachin Tendulkar's Ferrari.
As part of a bet set by his friend Vamsi, Sriram makes Sweety fall in love with him. What follows is an intimate moment gone wrong and a suicide attempt.
The classic theme park attraction comes to life and tells the story of a woman and her son who enlist a special crew to rid their home of supernatural squatters.
Samar, an honest cop, must deal with a brutal and lawless system created by Bachchu Yadav, who threatens his integrity.
Rose breaks relations with her party-going irresponsible sister, Maggie. Soon, the arrival of their grandmother, whom they don't remember, brings them closer.
The body of a local don goes missing from the hospital. Dr Arjun, who serves the poor and needy, is in a turmoil as the reputation of his hospital is at stake.
Manga runs a roadside food joint while Murugan and his crew rob cargo trucks in lonely places at night. Manga tries to reform Murugan, but it is an uphill task.
ACP Ratheesh Vasudevan is assigned the murder case of an actor, Anoop. As he uncovers the mystery behind his death, many truths about Anoop is revealed.
Friends Kasi and Suni go on a road trip from Kerala to Nagaland. However, they encounter many life-defining moments on the way. Will they regret their decision?
Leading a happy married life, Jayachandran finds his wife with another man one day. He kills them and turns himself in to the police. But will he find solace?
Three babes journey to the moon in a wooden ship to go starfishing.
A gangster suffering from anxiety attacks tries to get psychiatric help. But when the scared doctor refuses to treat him, the gangster begins to threaten him.
A contract killer is hired to kill Aishwarya Nag. However, her lover, who's a cabbie, will do anything to stop it.
Rajendran struggles to help his wife when she starts behaving strangely soon after their marriage. How will he help her?
Dr Balan's happy married life turns topsy-turvy when his ex-girlfriend gets admitted into his hospital with a faint chance of survival.

Varadanayaka is a Kannada action drama, starring Sudeep, Chiranjeevi Sarja, Nikesha Patel and Sameera Reddy. Varadanayaka (Sudeep) is an honest police officer. Will his work and the enemies he makes, especially Section Shankar (Ravishankar), impact the lives of his family? Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.
Diwakar, an IRS officer in the Narcotics Control Bureau, finds his life falling apart when a powerful drug lord kidnaps his son.
Krishna and Veni get arrested by a cop soon after they get married in a temple. Though they do escape, they face more hurdles. What are they running from?
To keep themselves busy, retired citizens Omanakuttan Pillai, Cherian Thomas and Mahendran Thambi decide to set up a drama troupe. But there are hurdles ahead.
A drug kingpin makes Dasu a scapegoat for his illegal activities. Unfortunately for him, the latter gets an inkling of his intentions and vows to end it.
A happily married couple, Jayashankar and Aarathi, seek divorce because of frivolous ego issues. What will happen to them?
A series of mishaps leads travel writer Lemuel Gulliver to the island of Liliput. Reinventing himself, Gulliver towers as the saviour of the Lilliputians.
Bruce Banner faces a nightmarish enemy after he is forced out of hiding.
When the sky is falling, who will rise to save the day? Together with friends, Chicken Little must hatch a plan to save the planet.
Reporter Milan Paul and cop Sreeramakrishnan always help each other. They try to unravel the mystery behind a series of suicide-murders that shocks the city.
A story of three best friends who share their ups and downs and support each other through hard times.
Manu arrives in Kerala with his baby daughter to get the money needed to save his wife from the Dubai police. What happens when the cash goes missing?
To prove that he is a brave boy, Maruti, a young boy sets out on a jungle adventure and transforms into India's original superhero, Hanuman.
A roller-coaster ride begins when an unprepared bride Haala is betrothed to Ameen. How will the D-day turn out for this crazy couple?
A journey of fantasy, action and romance comes to life as Shiva enters the Astraverse! He discovers true love and also, the power of fire within him.
Satya and Deepthi are mercilessly attacked and left for dead. Unfortunately for their assailants, he re-emerges with a relentless need for vengeance.
Vinod’s dream project, Super Express, India’s fast travelling passenger train goes out of control on its inaugural run. Now hundreds of lives are at stake.
Shivu, who is unable to express his feelings to Nisha, takes a chance on her birthday and wins her heart. However, her jealous uncle has other plans.
When Nirupama tries to find a reason to divorce Vishva, she is unaware of his ties to the underworld. However, she finds out, and all hell breaks loose.
When Abubacker, an ex-army man and son of freedom fighter Dada Sahib, tries to stop terrorist activities, he gets wrongfully accused of espionage.
Known for helping girls in getting out of unwanted marriages, Siva has created enemies. Trouble ensues when he is trapped to kidnap a politico's daughter.
Uday decides to donate his kidney to his love, Priya. However, she is healthy, and her reports got exchanged with that of a kidney patient.
Despite her limited knowledge, Penny takes charge of her father's stable and against all the odds, she creates history by winning the first-ever triple crown.
A headstrong Ram challenges the two influential CMs for a personal vendetta. Will this daring move bring about the reckoning he seeks?
It’s Christmas, Fred’s favourite holiday! But he and Emma have very different ways of celebrating.
50-year-old Ashish has fallen in love with Ayesha, who is half his age. Their romance turns into a comedy, when he takes her to meet his parents and ex-wife.
As the COVID-19 pandemic looms over India, the medical community races to find a cure and control rumours which get more contagious than the virus.
To arrange dowry money to give to his sister's evil husband, an honest constable decides to end his life so that his compensation could go to her.
A velichappadu takes care of an ancient temple. When he goes on leave, a young man takes over and soon gets into a relationship with his daughter.
Abandoned at birth, a young man grows up to be a paid assassin. However, his life changes for good when one of his victims, Jyoti vows to transform him.
Pulandevi and Govinda meet in college and fall in love. But soon life gets complicated.
Arjun heads to his village to meet his friend Shanmugam only to find out that he has eloped with his lover. He sets out on a search to find his friend.
When a group of terrorists kill Justice Usha Varma's son, NSG officer Shyam is appointed to protect her and her family. Will he be able to handle the threat?
The lives of three sex-starved men turn topsy-turvy when Dhwani, a young and carefree lady, comes to live in their lodge.
Music brings singers Aravindan and Rukmini closer, and they fall in love. While her father is against their relationship, will caste differences matter to them?
Amina is hopeful that her husband, an army man missing for years, will return to her someday. A merchant wants to marry her. Will he be able to convince her?
This women-oriented movie narrates a story about how women have to survive against all odds in a society that is still steeped in orthodoxy and tradition.
An intertwined tale of a girl caught making out in a hotel and a young low-caste boy falling in love with an upper-class girl. What's in store for them?
When Vasanth falls for Narmada, he pretends to be blind to get her sympathy. But Narmada's dad is not interested in a blind son-in-law.
When war is declared between India and Pakistan, an unlikely friendship blooms between two army captains from the opposite sides.

title_name: A Fan’s Guide to Ms. Marvel
description: An exclusive documentary short behind the groundbreaking original series, "Ms. Marvel."
Appa Thosar, a renowned maths teacher, is an honest man. His grandson and topper, Vakratund, is his pride. What will happen when Appa learns the boy's truth?
Srikanth is an honest cop who crosses paths with a corrupt officer, Ravikanth. What follows is a thrilling and unmissable bad cop versus good cop action!
Not heeding the advice of his best friends, Vivek is bent on getting married to Kavya, a DJ. However, she soon begins to suspect him of having an affair.
Thomas, a Christian, weds Saraswathy, a Tamil Brahmin girl, against their families' wishes. Though they all unite after a baby is born, there is trouble ahead.
Friends Nandan and Sunny love Devi and Thara. While prejudice and tragedy tear the four apart, fate has plans for two of them.
Jobless Appu, who is in love with Ammani, resorts to lies to woo her. She falls for him, but trouble arises when she gets to know the truth.
A well-wisher from the past comes to Manasa's village and carves a place for himself in people's hearts. But who is he and what is his motive?
Chinnappa and his gang target rich people. One day, they find a weeping Raja on the road, and Chinnappa shelters him. But will his good deed bear fruit?
Three generations of the legendary Clade family attempt to band together and navigate an uncharted, treacherous land beneath their world.
Rajesh decides to remarry after his first wife, Soumya, dies during childbirth. However, things do not go as per his plan.
When Shiva's date gets kidnapped, the police refuse to help him. Setting out to find her on his own, Shiva stumbles upon a deadly conspiracy.
When artist Badrinath avoids reporter Jagan for an interview, he follows him to his village in Malgudi. There Jagan falls for Badrinath's niece, Malavika.
An elderly woman hires an ex-convict as her estate's caretaker. Despite their different religious backgrounds, a mother-son relationship builds between them.
Stoic and kind-hearted Arivu decides to switch places with his street-smart rowdy twin, Anbu, to unite their estranged families. And a frenzy begins!
The movie showcases a year in the life of two mother bears as they impart life lessons to their impressionable young cubs.
Sneha Sindhooram is a Malayalam drama starring Prem Kumar, Ambika and Keerthi Gopinath. Watch the full film, online only on Hotstar.
A jobless software engineer and his friends abduct a rich man's daughter for ransom. Things turn comical when she advises them on how to go about her kidnap.
Lorry driver Yakobi works on a dairy farm. One day, he gives a lift to Muthu, a stranger, and helps him get a job. However, Muthu turns his life upside down.
When a lecherous DCP forces himself on one of the female constables, circle inspector Bhavani decides to bring him to justice. How will she teach him a lesson?
Aisha thinks she is a perfect matchmaker, despite her neighbour Arjun's warning. As she continues to meddle in others' lives, she falls short of her own.
A young man dreams of marrying a beautiful girl. But soon he realises that sentiments are more important than physical beauty.
Rahul is the guardian of his mischievous nephews, Sunny and Vicky, and a niece, Munni. Chaos ensues when the kids decide to shelter a runaway girl, Vyjayanti.
Dr Zacharia, a gynaecologist, meets five women who have unconventional or illegitimate pregnancies. He helps them handle their complex lives with utmost care.
John, a lawyer, forms an unlikely alliance with Tonto, a rebel Comanche after being rescued by him. They team up to take down the outlaw named Cavendish.
Unnikrishnan promises Sophia's parents that he will get her back after she leaves home when they object to her marriage with Josekutty. But a shock awaits him.
A pirate bunny named Squint jeopardizes Sid's plans by stealing his eggs. Now, the gang embarks on a mission that turns into the world's first Easter egg hunt!
An accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, making him a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.

title_name: Forky Asks A Question: What is a Leader?
description: Dolly teaches Forky about the qualities of a good leader, and Forky puts those qualities to the test!
Nandu and Akarsha fall in love, and they visit her hometown for a marriage. Soon, she learns that there is more to him than meets the eye.
Fun-loving orphans Moz Samuel and little Tessy aka Cat con people to earn a living. Their life changes when they meet Nandana.
Mallik kills his wife for having an affair with Special Investigation Officer Sharan. Lawyer Viji and Sharan are assigned the task to probe the case.
A simple school-going student in his 20s, Pandu's life changes when he learns about his father's murder and gets special powers from a baba.
Unhappy in their respective marriages Raj, Veer and Aryan look for love outside. However, Lakhwinder Singh aka Lucky is determined to foil their plans.
Just a month before Raghu's wedding with Meera, he gets the jitters as he suffers from erectile dysfunction. Will Meera call off the wedding?
Ramona Quimby, an adventurous young girl, uses her imagination to escape her reality that is quickly spinning out of reach.
Pinky is a tomboy who hosts a popular TV show. Her sister Pooja's and her lives change when Lt. Commander Sanjaynath becomes a regular visitor to their house.
Tony and his friends board a train to Madras. So does R.K. Nair, his wife and daughter, Devi. Tony tries to woo Devi. What happens when she is found murdered?
Afzal feels that things are looking up when his uncle opens a mobile shop for him. But the course of his life changes as he gets hold of a tricky app.
The famous Vishnu Puram palace is home to an ancient treasure, full of diamonds. One day, the treasure goes missing, and the prince sets out to find it.
Forced to take up the job of a veterinary livestock inspector, Prasoon explores the nuances of the wonderful relationship between humans and domestic animals.
Best friends Tiger and Vishnu part ways after a misunderstanding over a girl. What happens when Vishnu meets with an accident?
A conservative couple meets up with a wild couple while on vacation.
Feast on this mythological drama showcasing the miracles of Goddess Chowdeshwari Devi who never gives up on the ones who worship her wholeheartedly.
Detective Turner leads an orderly life until he meets Hooch, a rambunctious dog with whom he has to find a killer.
Four short stories written by Kantha are weaved in to make one narrative. It explores different facets of the marital relationship and its repercussions.
Zed and Addison's final year at Seabrook is disrupted by the arrival of intergalactic outsiders.
Abraham decides to search for his brother's killer. Police officer Lincoln too is on a similar mission. Will the two survive the cruel life of the underworld?
Los Angeles is on the brink of disaster when two greedy criminals manipulate two kids with supernatural powers.
After a man accidentally tells the kids he's doing volunteer work with that the Tooth Fairy is make-believe, he is transformed into a tutu-clad fairy with the "sentence" of collecting teeth.
To teach their respective wives a lesson, Venky and Varun leave their home. What happens when they fall in their own trap?
Shiva is an angry young man who gets into fights to protect the innocent. He somehow becomes the target of two deadly gangsters. Will he escape their clutches?
Three friends go on a foreign trip to help one of them unite with his love. While the girl has other plans, the other two end up finding love for themselves

title_name: The Wonderful Autumn of Mickey Mouse
description: Mickey Mouse is determined to undo the failures of his family's past after inheriting a rundown pumpkin farm from a distant relative
Fired from a law firm for unethical conduct, Adv Mukundan Unni leaves no stone unturned to achieve success and prosperity. How far will he go in this quest?
Mickey Mouse is a mischievous deckhand on a riverboat that is under the command of the tyrannical Captain Pete.
Bryan Mills has asked his family to visit him in Istanbul. Murad devises a devious plan to avenge his son's death. Can Bryan protect his family from Murad?

title_name: Under the Helmet: The Legacy of Boba Fett
description: A special celebrating the origins and legacy of Star Wars’ legendary bounty hunter, Boba Fett.
Vijay and Hema lead a happy married life until the latter's death in an accident. Then, Vijay marries Kangana. But that proves to be worst decision he's made.
Insulted for being uneducated, an industrialist joins his son's college but hide their identities at the university to prevent an embarrassment.
Three squabbling brothers come together after years of separation to fulfil their grandfather's last wish. Will they bury the hatchet?
Chakrapani, a barber�s son, is to wed Sunanda. However, her father calls off the marriage when he suddenly becomes rich. Now Chakrapani must try to win Sunanda.

John Baxter inherits a rundown hotel in the Colorado Rockies and decides to convert it into a ski lodge. He moves with his family to start their new life at the lodge, but they soon find it is more difficult than they had expected.
Young Surya and Lakshmi work as servants in the city. The owner ill-treats them. Will the children be able to save themselves?
Surendra, in a drunken state, purchases Gadwal Mansion, which is believed to be haunted by the ghost of Savithri. There's also a conspiracy brewing somewhere.
Tough cop Ajay, the son of an MLA, sets out to hunt Nayak and other criminals. But he has to do so without letting his father know about the dangers involved.
Bhagya is a graduate who falls in love with Manja, a school dropout. But her father and brother, a dreaded rowdy, are against their love.
Brothers Sreedharan and Raman are at loggerheads regarding the ancestral property. To amass it all, Raman hires a man to woo and marry Sreedharan's daughter.
Larry Daley takes up a new job as a night watchman at the museum, without knowing that all the exhibits in the museum come alive during the night.
A sing-along abridged version of the Disney classic, Beauty and the Beast.
Tormented by the city's medical mafia and its kingpin, Guru, Dr Satya flees the city. However, he returns as a powerful police officer to put an end to Guru.
Mass is an orphan who falls for Anjali but is reluctant to do anything since her father and brother run a criminal gang. How will he find his happily ever after?
Hercule Poirot's Egyptian vacation aboard a river steamer turns into a terrifying search for a murderer after a couple’s honeymoon is cut tragically short.

title_name: Dr. Seuss' Horton Hears A Who!
description: Horton, a kindly elephant, discovers a civilization living on a speck of dust and protects them from those who don’t believe they exist.
A woman working in a finance company gets cheated. A group of youngsters come forward to help her seek revenge.
Patch bumps into a struggling superhero dog Thunderbolt and decides to help his TV hero but, a familiar foe intends to ruin everything and capture him.
Radha, a theatre artist, struggles to support her ailing mother. Her life takes a turn when she agrees to help Raghu, a widower, in exchange for money.
A hotshot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.
Set in rural India of the '70s, 14-year-old Joshi and his classmates - Chitrya, Favdya, and Surya - seek answers to the age-old question: What is love?
Eshwar aka Chinna's world crumbles when his beloved niece goes missing. Will this emotional pursuit test the limits of love?

title_name: Little Krishna II - The Legendary Warrior
description: It is about Lord Krishna’s fight against his evil uncle Kansa.
Five strangers, caught in a traffic jam, join hands to help bring a heart across cities within a specified time for the surgery of a superstar's daughter.
Dolly has a lucrative con career - woo unsuspecting men, trap them into marriage and finally rob them off. All is well until a cop decides to spoil the party.
Devi Lal Singh aka Devil, a thief, finds life dull without a kick! And he gets a kick when a psychiatrist and a police officer cross paths with him.
