Two astrologer brothers always fight over trivial issues to compete with each other. Their constant bickering lands them in complex situations.
An interfaith couple moves to Mumbai in pursuit of a happy life and lives with their sons. Years later when riots rock the city, can they cope with the ordeal?
Vishwanathan, a thug, accidentally kills Damodaran. Later, he falls in love with Bhanu, Damodaran's sister. Will he reveal his true identity to her?
Abhimanyu loves Meenakshi who secretly makes films about suicides. Inspector Vikram is a common link between the two, who is out to get them. What did they do?
Arunachalam's tyrannical rule as the village sarpanch is threatened with Vijay's arrival from the city. However, the two find themselves eyeing the same girl.
Sivarajan is left helpless after his daughter Vairamani is raped and killed. Journalist Annie and lawyer Ravi Varma help him get justice and expose the truth.
A happy-go-lucky man falls in love with a village belle. Problems arise when the area's influential man also sets his eyes on her.
Satyanweshi Byomkesh Bakshi becomes a witness to a murder on the stage. As he steps in to solve the mystery, a saga of love and betrayals comes to light.
When a terrified Raghava gets possessed by the spirit of a transgender, he becomes the vehicle for narrating and fulfilling her unfulfilled desires.
Returning to India after 12 years, Varun struggles to embrace the cultural change. But homecoming turns beautiful as he finds the love of his life, Ashwini.
A man marries two women -- an American for a visa and an Indian girl due to family pressure. Soon, not surprisingly, he finds himself in a tricky situation.
A seer meets a few IT employees and predicts that their company will shut down. The seer then shows them proof and sets the friends on a shocking adventure.
While serving a jail term for murder, Vidyadharan spots a hole in the wall. Looking through it one day, he sees a constable committing a heinous crime.
A small town gets excited when the local panchayat leader decides to get electricity. But the development is not as good as the people expected it to be.
On the day of marriage, a pregnant Vasanthi is abandoned by the groom. When her father refuses to help, the newborn girl, Thara, is brought up by a poor family.
Friday turns freaky when mother-daughter with contrasting views and opinions find themselves inside each other's body.
Goofy enlists the aid of an instructional record in an effort to become fit.
Conman Mohan Gandhi has an eye on mafia king Singham's 100 billion rupees. With CBI officer Arjun's constant vigilance, how will Mohan get the loot?

title_name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
description: Bella and Edward’s to-be-born child faces danger as the Uley pack sees it as a threat.
Unable to find a decent job, Dileep resorts to illegal means. However, his life changes for the better when he meets Hariprasad, a business tycoon.
Ramu decides to sell off an inherited ancestral property. However, he unknowingly stays in the house of his father's killer. Will he find out the truth?
It’s prom season, but Mandy’s focused on her dream college…until a tutoring job changes everything.
Born to parents who parted soon after she was born, Usha is often tossed between the two. However, all she wants to do is reunite her parents.
The film is about the rebellious early days of cinema's most notorious and fashionable villains, the legendary Cruella de Vil.
Weeks after the nationwide COVID-19 lockdown, seven migrant labourers, on the verge of starvation, decided to go to their village just like millions of others.
Jolly Tyagi, a small-town lawyer, accepts a widely publicised hit-and-run case against a celebrity lawyer, Tejinder Rajpal. How will the truth prevail?
Preethi cares for little Chinnu when her parents are away. Sensing that the child is in danger, she tries to protect her. But a doctor's visit changes her life.
Juli and Sneha are friends. Sneha becomes a model and Juli works in private company where Raj cheats her. Later, Juli also becomes a model.

title_name: The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause
description: Santa, aka Scott Calvin, is faced with double-duty: how to keep his new family happy, and how to stop Jack Frost from sabotaging the toy factory.
A police case forces Pappan and his brother to leave their home. They seek refuge in a village. However, their problems are far from over.
Seven youngsters who meet each other in college end up becoming thick friends. Everything goes on pretty smooth till two of them fall for each other.
Sankaran Pillai, a greedy businessman, gets so busy minting money through evil ways that he ignores his family and his responsibilities towards them.
Maya, who works at a coffee shop, falls for Kunjunni, who brings in supplies to that shop. What turn will their lives take when they decide to get married?
Vinayachandran is diligently followed by college students and others for helping them resolve their love issues. However, what about his own love story?
Hailing from a poor family, Savithri is married off to an old Brahmin priest. As she leads an unhappy life, she comes across Aravindan.
Devaraj takes up a job in a factory where his father was mysteriously murdered. Amidst obstacles, will he be able to get justice for his father?
When an ordinary girl is forced to survive in an extraordinarily dangerous situation, nothing is off-limits.

title_name: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
description: A nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier.
Shakthi takes it upon himself to fight drug peddlers. He has the support of a friend who is a police officer. Will he succeed in his attempt?
16-year-old Katy dreams of fulfilling her family legacy by working on her father's ranch in modern-day Wyoming with a wild mustang named Flicka.
Gautam and Irene, student leaders of two rival colleges, participate in the university youth festival. Will love bloom between them during the event?
An ageing man testifies in a rape case, but the culprit’s family torments him to death. Soon, his son leads a war against unjust wherein revenge is inevitable.
Dasu is asked by a local don to join the police and become his snitch. However, life takes an emotionally daunting turn when he falls in love with Nakshatra.
In a chain of fateful events, Chiclet’s mother gets killed, and his father is held captive by a human. To save his only parent, he forefronts a rescue mission.
Ramakrishnan comes to the city as a new tahsildar, but the previous tahsildar has a serious problem letting go of her place.
Vimala and her sisters run a theatre called Maharaja Talkies. Pappachan, a rich man, cannot stand their success and forces them to shut down the theatre.
Ravindranath, a soldier, is on a mission of exposing his uncle's illegal activities that pose a threat to the country. What follows is a thrilling chase!
A bittersweet tale of love between Rasool, a Muslim taxi driver, and Anna, a Christian who works as a salesgirl. What does destiny have in store for them?
Karna is from a fishing community. Rich and spoilt Anjali thinks little of him. However, he decides to change her outlook, and soon she falls in love with him.
With her husband in a coma, Meghna ends up meeting his ex-wife Shubhra. As past and present collide, the two wives try to comprehend the true essence of love.
In a bid to lead a normal life, three ex-convicts take guidance from prison counsellor Dr Isaac. But Isaac seems to have an ulterior motive in helping them.
This documentary features artist j-hope's production activities of solo album, "Jack in the Box."
Retired inspector Deepak loses his leg during an investigation. Years later, he has to relive the dreaded past.
To impress an art film director who critiqued his earlier attempts, Karthik decides to shoot a film on the life of a demented gangster, Assault Sethu.
Anna, a mafia don and benefactor of the poor, loves his son. However, the father-son relationship hits rock bottom thanks to the latter's girlfriend.
A mother or a doctor - what will Gayathri choose to be when she's caught in a web of political conspiracies after a politician in her care is murdered?
Set in a suburban fantasy world, Onward introduces two teenage elf brothers who embark on an extraordinary quest to discover if there is still a little magic left out there.
Rajveer sets out to steal the world's most coveted diamond, the Kohinoor, triggering a series of fights, car chases and a revenge plot.
When a writer-cum-professor goes missing, suspicions point out at his close friends and family. As the investigation progresses, shocking truths come to light.
Chon travels with Roy to London to avenge his father's death. Together they discover that there is a worldwide plot to murder the royal family.
Realising the sufferings of man, Prince Siddhartha Gautama renounces worldly pleasures and sets out on an eternal journey to attain enlightenment.
Raja Bhoja discovers the throne of the legendary King Vikramaditya. The 32 statues of cursed Apsaras guarding the throne tell him stories of the great king.
Hailing from a slum, an enterprising young man wages a war against companies involved in food adulteration. Will he be successful?
Shivankutty, a lineman, is in love with Parvathy. Her mother agrees to their marriage, but things change when her father, who deserted them years ago, returns.
A cop and his two subordinates are on a mission to hunt down a psychotic serial killer. What happens when the clues lead them to a haunting secret.
Manohar and his family move into a new apartment on the 13th floor. Soon they experience supernatural incidents when a spirit tries to communicate via TV.
Mahesh and Ganashree are in love, but Ganashree's father is against the alliance. How will the lovers convince him?
Besties Sujatha and Vasantha's friendship faces an arduous test when they fall for the same man. Who will make the ultimate sacrifice?
Bhoothnath revisits earth, and his after-life changes for good when he meets a brave boy, Akhrot. They team up to fight against Bhau, a corrupt politician.
While fighting against the injustice towards villagers, four guys fall in trouble for taking up an evil landlord. Will their efforts pay off?
Hailing from a renowned musical family, Ramanathan rules with his music, until an onstage gaffe forces his younger brother, Gopi, to step into his shoes.
Circumstances force driver Prakashan to marry his dream girl, Uthara, the daughter of a rich man. However, they part ways within a day of marriage.
A US agent hires a budding Bollywood director to shoot fake footage that would prove the death of Osama Bin Laden!
A friend convinces Ravishankar, who suffers from blood cancer, to take holistic treatment. While he gets well, his death is more awaited than his recovery.
Though in love with Rajan, Malathi is forced to marry Gopi. Both men are cops. When Gopi visits Rajan, he finds something that makes him suspect his wife.
Appu is brought up by his father as he has been told that his mother is dead. What happens when he learns that she is alive?
An aspiring film director becomes a cop after his father's death. Now he has to catch a psychopath who is killing school girls before his niece is endangered.
Following the death of a few communist leaders, the political climate in Kannur heats up. Their leader later decides to avenge the killings.
The women in Kaya's family are cursed to die if they get married. Will Aman and Kaya manage to break the curse?
Young Karthik dreams of becoming a wicketkeeper and batsman like Dhoni. However, his adamant father has other plans for him.
A 13-year-old boy, who wishes to be big, wakes up the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.
In this original comedy, staff and students unite to save their beloved theater camp.
Village head Nagappa grabs Shankar's father's land and proves in the panchayat that it is his property. How will Shankar get his land back?

title_name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
description: To save a village, Indiana Jones faces a deadly cult to recover sacred stones.
Sethunath is a successful writer who reveals to journalist Aneesa about his love for Priya and the reason for his inability to marry her. Will she help him out?
Kuttappai, the son of Thevakattil Avarachan, a rich businessman, falls for Rebecca, a teacher. What happens when a rival business group decides to settle old scores?
Anuradha is in love with hotel chef Preetham. But, during a visit to Goa, Preetham meets Khushi. Caught between two girls, how will he overcome his dilemma?
Good-for-nothing Kuttappan befriends a thief, Basheer Pilla. While they get into several eventful situations, it is the beginning of a hilarious relationship.
Tod and Copper are still the best of friends, but when Copper gets a chance to join a popular pack of hound-dogs, testing their bond.
Grieving for her mother, Avalon finds comfort when she's put in charge of a 4-year-old for a night.
Separated at birth, twins Raja and Prem reunite as adults to take on a smuggling mafia while their similar looks add chaos to the confusion.
Darkness befalls the Mahishmati kingdom after the assassination of beloved King Amarendra Baahubali. However, a deadly battle must be fought to restore justice.

title_name: Assembled: The Making of Loki Season 2
description: Join the cast and crew of Season 2 as they pull back the curtain on Loki’s latest MCU adventure.
A man is imprisoned for killing his lover's brother. After the jail term, he meets someone new. Will new love bloom, or will his past haunt him?
Strange events cause lovers David and Sara staying single. Years later, David tries to dig the truth of a murder that led to the cancellation of their wedding.

title_name: Master & Apprentice: A Special Look at Ahsoka
description: Get a special behind the scenes look at “Ahsoka” now streaming on Disney+ Hotstar.
Shane Wolfe, an elite Navy Seal, is assigned to protect five out-of-control children of an assassinated scientist.
An ex-mobster, Tony now leads a quiet life with his family. Their peace gets shattered when another gangster turns up at their doorstep with revenge in mind.
Venu, works for Reuters as a cameraman. While on an assignment, he meets Renuka, his ex-lover and together, they have to investigate a murder mystery.
Civil engineer Raghuvaran is offered a job by Vasundhara, an egoistic businesswoman. When he turns down her offer, she vows to make his life miserable.
The story of one man's love life is seen through the eyes of his best friend and dog, Winston, and revealed bite by bite through the meals they share
Preeti's father is a strict man. Rajeev, who is in love with her, decides to change him and make him understand his family and their affection for him.
Four fathers look for the richest groom for their daughters. Chaos ensues as all the prospective grooms are pretending to be what they are not, i.e., rich.
Chris Hemsworth is on a mission to uncover the science of shark behaviour and discover how humans and sharks can safely coexist.

Mayoora Nritham is a Malayalam drama about Rajeev and Ragini, who are engaged to be married. But their marriage does not take place as Rajeev's father learns that Ragini's father lied to him about her mother. He was told that Ragini's mother is dead but he comes to know that she is alive. Watch the full movie, Mayoora Nritham , only on Hotstar.
Armed with the latest high-tech spy equipment, the government-trained guinea pigs discover that the fate of the world is in their paws.
Chinnabbai is banished from his village after he marries for love outside his caste. Years later, his son returns to settle scores for his father.
The giggle of a mysterious puppet is driving the human race insane. When the Doctor discovers the return of the terrifying Toymaker, he faces a fight he can never win.
Sexually awkward Stacey Johnson decides to take control of her life, cancel her ex-, and conquer her fears by having a threesome.
An accident in his factory leaves Gopalan Nair blind. Afraid of being a burden to his young children, he leaves them. Will they ever find him?
A woman takes on the evil elements of society, and her skills earn her the title of Lady Bruce Lee. But what makes her take on this strong role?
Kunjali and Sethu are manual labourers. Police officer Madhu tries to protect them from getting into trouble when a don takes over the market.
When a don's son falls in love with the daughter of a famous singer, he decides to hide his family background to win her love.
Alien kids from the planet Zeba visit the earth and befriend Dhoti, Topi, and Suitboot, who narrate to them the epic chronicles of Bal Ganesh.
Mickey and Minnie get swarmed by mosquitoes while camping out!
Assistant Commissioner Vetrimaaran investigates a series of murders when a priest is found dead and a woman goes missing under mysterious circumstances.
In a village with no doors, it is believed that the temple deity will always guard them and their belongings. What happens when the temple itself gets looted?
Gayatri falls in love with Biswanath after he helps reform her violent family. However, a revenge battle spurs when Biswanath’s dark past rears its head.

title_name: Andor: A Disney+ Day Special Look
description: Celebrate Disney+ Day with a special look at the Star Wars original series Andor coming to Disney+ on September 21.
On the festive Life Day, Rey and BB-8 embark on an epic adventure across Star Wars history.
Mohan, a married man, falls in love with a widow. When he realises his mistake, he decides to confess to his wife.
Heartbroken by their failed relationships, two individuals- Aditi and Sayan, embark on a new journey. Will the commonalities of their lives bring them together?
Simhaasanam is a Malayalam drama starring Madhu in a double role, Lakshmi and Jagathy Sreekumar. Watch the full film, online only on Hotstar.
Separated from his magician grandfather, a dejected Indrajith runs away from his father and gets into bad company. Now, it's up to his grandpa to find him.
Vikranth and Archana fall in love and are happily married. However, they start having differences that leads to him having an affair. Will Archana leave him?
A schoolboy, Easan, is held responsible for killing Chezhiyan, a politician's son. What are the past events that led to this? Can ACP Sangayya protect Easan?
Sing along with your favourite songs with on-screen lyrics as you watch “Encanto.”

Kappalu Muthalali is a Malayalam comedy, starring Ramesh Pisharody, Sarayu, Jagathy Sreekumar, directed by Thaha. Thulaseedharan is a central government employee. To clear his debts he decides to take voluntary retirement. Watch the full movie, Kappalu Muthalali, online, only on Hotstar.
Honest and upright, Uday aspires to be a police officer. His ideals are challenged when a senior inspector, Encounter Shinde, turns him towards the dark side.

title_name: Arendelle Castle Yule Log: Cut Paper Edition
description: Hand-crafted paper art by “Frozen” designer Brittney Lee is used in this Arendelle Castle Yule Log.
Assembled unboxes the creation of Maya Lopez’s own gritty, groundbreaking series: "Echo."
Venkat and Senthil's life changed after meeting Panchavan, who disappears after graduation. Years later, the two search for their missing buddy thanks to a bet.
When a family decides to sell off their ancestral house in the village, a series of spooky murders reveal the tragic story of a wandering soul.
Mythili's life gets upended when her neighbour Vishwa misunderstands her platonic affection and kidnaps her. Will she be able to escape from him?
Love-struck Jaggi can cross the seven seas for his dream girl, Kartika. Even if it means stopping her wedding.
After an accident, a girl forgets her past. However, she stops worrying about her life when she falls in love with a man and finds herself safe with him.
An aspiring singer and a single mother, Eela gives up her dream for her son. Years later, this overprotective mom rejoins college with her son.
Anjan cons people to raise money for medical college. He falls for Amrutha. What happens when he cheats a police officer, who is Amrutha's father?
An honest cop, Vikram, crosses path with a corrupt Shankar, who tries to molest his girlfriend. What follows is Vikram's fight with Shankar who wants revenge.
Shubhankar is on a quest of a man, who can help him avenge the murder of his brother at the hands of a corrupt minister.
A good-hearted man who has lost his faith in Christmas befriends a mysterious character named Nick.
Sexually abused as a child, Veera turns into a serial rapist and murderer. Will things change when he meets his childhood love, or will she be the next victim?
Raja, the wingman of Dongri's most powerful don, is next to take his legacy forward. All is well until he falls in love and decides to quit the path of crime.
An orphan, Kanda, does a lot of social work and helps the needy. However, fate has other plans for him.
A medico Thiyagu and his gang take the law into their hands and punishes corrupt politicians by abducting them. But, what is his motive? Will he get caught?
An injured don on the run ends up in the clinic of a kind, honest doctor. This encounter turns into an unexpected bond of friendship, which gets tested later.
Irfan’s world comes crashing down when he gets incriminated as a terrorist by media trials. Amid the spotlight, he embarks on a mission to prove his innocence.
Vikram, a police officer, is on a mission to hunt Adithya, a criminal mastermind. A vicious game unfolds when Adithya cleverly switches his soul with Vikram's.
Charlie saves Gayathri from her cruel father and takes her to Bengaluru. However, she falls for Rishi, who gets killed by goons, and she finds herself pregnant.
When Sundari does not show interest in Vijay, his friends decide to help him out in an unusual way. Will Sundari realise Vijay's love for her?
Dinanath Saxena, a labourer-turned-businessman marries off his daughter to his manager, Ashok. Things go awry when a spoilt Smita creates problems for Ashok.
Vivek and his friends visit Abhishek's old estate. Soon, mysterious incidents start taking place, putting all of them in danger.
Sachithanandan lives with his wife, Shyama, in a village. However, his one mistake turns their peaceful life in turmoil.
A story of innocence, greed, and fantasy around a Christmas cake in a Catholic college for girls
Dhananjay, an orphan, wants a family of his own and gives four strangers a home. Soon, he learns about their mean motives.

title_name: Frozen Kingdom Of the Snow Leopard
description: This is the story of a devout female snow leopard who settles into an unfamiliar valley to give birth and raise her two cubs despite incredible odds.
ACP Arjun is reluctant to work with rogue colleague Karan. But when Gawa Firozi wreaks havoc in the city, they must put aside their differences to nab him.
Sonali, a spunky, self-made internet operator grows her small business into a successful company. But, there's someone who wants Sonali out of business.
A depressed Shakthivel meets Anjali on a train journey. Though he dislikes her at the start, his feelings change, until she asks him for a strange favour.

title_name: Bal Ganesh And Friends from Zeba
description: Alien kids from the planet Zeba visit the earth and befriend Dhoti, Topi, and Suitboot, who narrate to them the epic chronicles of Bal Ganesh.

title_name: Bal Hanuman IV – Attack of the Universe
description: As guided by Bal Hanuman, Monkey Head Chhote Maharaj challenges the malicious crocodiles Gutter and Shutter for a high-stake Kabbadi match to bring peace.
A childless couple opt for surrogacy, but are they prepared for the consequences?
From frigid mountains to the heart of the bamboo forest, filmmaker Lu Chuan follows the adventures of three animal families in China.
Shanti is shattered when her lover is killed by Naxals trying to kill a police officer. She demands justice and launches a legal battle. Who'll win?
Sparks fly between a wannabe model Neha and an aspiring cricketer Siddharth, but their love faces many hurdles. Will they reunite amid the chaos?

title_name: Diary Of A Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
description: When Greg's dad threatens him to send to military school if he doesn't stay out of trouble, however, Greg finds new ways to land himself in the doghouse!
A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.
Newlyweds Srikanth and Ramya rent a flat. The homeowner's daughter, Rambha, falls in love with Srikanth, resulting in disputes between the married couple.

title_name: Something's Coming: West Side Story - A Special Edition of 20/20
description: A step inside the film, West Side Story, featuring interviews and discussions with members of the cast and crew, Puerto Rican actors, artists and journalists.
Circumstances force strangers Arjun and Gowri to share a flat in Bangalore. While Gowri is busy looking for her boyfriend, Arjun develops feelings for her.
A lonely teenage girl falls for an enigmatic classmate who harbors an ancient and dangerous secret.
Irked by an altercation at home, a retired stunt master sets off on a bike looking for his first love. When the two meet, will the magic return?
Hareendran is helped by his childhood friend, GK, in his business. However, things take an unexpected turn when Hareendran learns something shocking about GK.

title_name: The Chronicles Of Narnia: Prince Caspian
description: The Pevensie children are magically transported back to the magical land and they embark on a journey to rescue Narnia from Miraz's tyrannical hold.
After a small misstep, Joe is transported to The Great Before and must find his way back with the help of an infant soul learning about herself.
In a bid to outwit the police, Satish and his gang hide stolen jewels and money in a haunted mansion. But the desperate gamble lands them in a ghost’s trap.
Determined to prove his ancestor's innocence, Ben follows an international chain of clues that takes him on a chase around the globe.
A young man has to undergo a face transplant after being gravely injured in a fire accident. But soon, he realises that his new face has many enemies.
Babu is a clown at the Royal Circus. The circus does well after Sudheer arrives and modernises things. All is well till the two fall for the owner's daughter.
Nikitha rejects every marriage proposal that comes for her. Frustrated, her family, along with the marriage broker, decide to teach her a lesson.
With his imagination and innovative ideas, P.T. Barnum, an impractical dreamer, decides his own fate, becoming the greatest showman that ever lived.
Disowned by his father, Siddhamahavir grows up to be a fearless rouge. Eventually, he falls in love with Mithi, but his identity puts the relationship at stake.
Four dejected friends decide to commit suicide. When they reach a haunted resort, one of them gets possessed by the spirit of Chandralekha, a rape victim.
Afaque falls for Nilofar but is left devastated when she marries another man. Things take a turn when Nilofar enters his life again after her divorce.
Three youngsters live on rent in an apartment. One day, they get a fourth roommate who soon dies mysteriously, leaving behind a lot of money.
The inspiring story of the humble beginnings of ISRO and its stalwart scientists.
Rambabu moves to the city to become an actor, leaving behind his family and lover, Seetha. Will he come back an actor, or is something worse in store for him?
The story of Hanuman saving Rama and Lakshmana from Mahiravana, Ravana's brother, and a dark and powerful sorcerer.
Perpetually failing engineering students Bony and Fundoo get talked into robbing a bank by the campus loon. What follows is something neither anticipated.
Brigadier Nambiar had lied to his daughter about her mother's death. Actually, she's in prison for murder. But a phone call forces him to reveal the truth.
Siriyala and his wife get a child after many prayers, but problems arise when Lord Shiva and Parvati ask him to choose between devotion and love for his child.
Two children visit their grandparents in the village. With superstition running wild among the villagers, the kids decide to set things right.
Money-crazy Dattu falls for Anjali, who loves him despite his infamy. And though he keeps underworld dons in check, curiously, a police officer wants him dead.
A sweeping portrait of conservationists Kris and Doug Tompkins chronicling their fight to preserve one of the last truly wild places on earth.
Beyoncé's new visual album inspired by the music of The Lion King: The Gift where it reimagines the 2019 blockbuster for the current generation.
An autorickshaw driver is known to be a notorious womaniser. What happens when he meets Kavitha? Will she change his life forever?
Jeeva loves Thanu, but he gets dejected to discover that she is already engaged. Things take a turn for the worse when he learns something more shocking.
Rajan, a police officer, investigates a murder that took place in a train. One killer, one suspect, no clues. How will Rajan solve this mystery?
A serial killer, who has murdered three people, is after his fourth victim. A police officer is hot on his trails.
A hungry sandpiper hatchling ventures from her nest for the first time to dig for food buried in the sand along the shore.
Posted at the border, Lieutenant Suraj gets martyred. His family copes with the tragedy until Suraj’s mysterious return stirs chaos and raises questions.
The son of a wealthy businessman falls in love with a visually impaired girl. His father agrees to accept their alliance only if she gets her sight back.
Entrepreneur Ravi helps Saroja through the tribulations of her life. However, things go wrong for Ravi when his help is misinterpreted by his family and lover.
Out of jail after 25 years of imprisonment on false charges, a middle-aged gangster will stop at nothing put an end to all his rivals.
ACP Surya falls for Maya, a teacher. When she is kidnapped by a drug mafia don, the tough cop takes charge of the situation.
Following a train accident, Kumar's father mistakes Zamindar Rajanna for his son and takes him home from the hospital. However, where is Rajanna?

title_name: I Am Sorry Matte Banni Preethsona
description: Sham and Chethana are happily married. A lost cell phone leads Sham to Sinchana, a sex worker. However, circumstances force Sham to suspect Chethana.
FBI agent Sean Archer must go dangerously undercover to investigate the location of a lethal biological weapon planted by the sadistic terrorist Castor Troy.
A dashing sanyasi, a vigilante and a tough cop join hands to expose two perverted music composers, one of whom is murdered. What will they discover?
Naga kills his wife when he learns that she is having an affair. However, a visually impaired girl changes his life.
A lonely German boy's world-view turns upside down when he faces his blind nationalism with the help of his idiotic imaginary friend, Adolf Hitler.
Anwar is a big name in the crime world. However, when he is assigned the task of transporting terrorists to Mumbai, he decides to reveal his true colours.
Working for an underworld don, young Ambi is on the run from the police. He meets Pallavi, a television journalist who wants him to surrender. But will he?
When Philipose�s dream of seeing his son, Isaac, clear his 10th class exams after many tries get shattered, he refuses to let him wed his childhood love, Annie.
Womaniser Sourav rapes Gayathri. Later, she decides to seek revenge for his atrocity.
Unfortunate circumstances force Parvathi to disguise as a boy and starts working as a servant in a house of bachelors. One day, one of them unveils her truth.
Premachandran, the driver of brothers Chetan Bava and Aniyan Bava, lands in trouble when their daughters fall in love with him. How will he resolve the issue?
In a conflict-torn era, the Maratha commander-in-chief Hansaji Mohite braves against the Mughals under the leadership of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.
When sparks fly between Alok and Mina, they decide to get married. But as Alok’s hair loss problem comes into the picture, the wedding story hits a rough patch.
Follow a team of passionate animals rescuers who leave no stone unturned to save the voiceless.
After learning that he features on Santa's naughty list, Sid travels to the North Pole with his friends and plead his case to the man in charge.
Carl Fredricksen is about to fly away to the South American wilderness. But, he discovers that his biggest nightmare has stowed away on the trip.

title_name: The Biggest Little Farm: The Return
description: The Chesters leave urban life to revive barren land. By living in harmony with nature and maximizing biodiversity, they create a magical working farm.
With Edward away, Bella must turn to Jacob to face the supernatural dangers that threaten them all.
After returning from the Gulf, Kuttiraman plans to marry his girlfriend. But his family has other plans with the money he has made.
Sing along with your favourite songs with on-screen lyrics as you watch “Mary Poppins Returns."
Sivarajan fights to get justice for his daughter, who was raped and murdered. However, when law turns its back on him, he finds another way to seek revenge.
Sujatha quits her education after Ganesh, a classmate, misbehaves with her. Years later, he makes friends with her husband to seek vengeance.
Bablu, a genie, guards a magic lamp with assistance from his friends. Things go awry when his uncle Goga tries to acquire the Chiraag for sinister motives.
Tired of his ways, Priya decides to divorce her husband, Sathyanadhan. However, the situation worsens when their son gets affected due to their problems.
Lucky, an amnesiac scientist, falls in love with Nandana. Trouble begins when he fails to keep up with his amnesia and his aim to prove his worth to her father.
Jericho Cane, an ex-cop turned private security detective, becomes the reluctant hero with fate of the world in his hands.
Robin’s business trip to India turns romantic when he meets Chaitra. But there is more to her than meets the eye.
Balachandran, a struggling writer, helps Fatima, a heart patient. But he is accused of aiding Muslims when his lodge owner gets jailed on terror charges.
Sketch, who works as a loan shark, takes away the cars of the defaulters. What will he do when a dangerous don lands on his list?
When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by Cruella de Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.
Dr Bhimrao Ambedkar, the Father of the Indian Constitution, dedicated his life to creating a classless society. Watch his incredible journey.
Best friends Simran and Rohan's lives turn upside down when an unfortunate event leads to Simran's pregnancy. Will their friendship stand the test of time?
Rahul, a newly appointed officer, accidentally loses his service pistol. What happens when it lands in the wrong hands?
Mukundan is shocked to see labourers being exploited in Dubai. But the corrupt political scenario back home compels him to return and work for the people.
Raised by his father, Raja grows up to be a grifter. He falls in love with Parijatam, but fate has something else in store for them. Will they unite?
A group of alien kids visits Earth to find out more about Bal Ganesh. They meet three mice, Dhoti, Topi and Suit Boot, who share Bal Ganesh's adventurous tales.
A film star, kidnapped during a shoot, is kept hostage in a school. A CID officer sets out to rescue her and the country from its enemies.

title_name: TOMORROW X TOGETHER: Our Lost Summer
description: TOMORROW X TOGETHER are back post-pandemic and are ready to embark on their first world tour from Seoul to North America.
In the misty landscape of Darjeeling, detective Eken gets caught in a web of mysteries involving murder and ancient idols. Will he be able to connect the dots?
A forgotten Kabaddi world champion catalyzes an inner desire to give a new meaning to her existing role as a wife and mother, and makes a comeback.
The film chronicles the changes in the lives of five families, coming from different backgrounds, who are united by a common thread.
Malathi's parents let Madhavan stay with them for his studies, but she ends up falling for him. How will they unite when her father stands against this relation?
Three tough cops team up to stop Basha Bhai's atrocities, who is a ruthless mafia don. But what happens when one of the cops is falsely accused of murder?
Ferdie sets out to find his old sweetheart, Fanny, on a road trip with some odd bods. Can they reunite these lost souls?

title_name: Assembled: The Making of Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: Dive deep behind the scenes with the cast and crew on the set of "Black Panther: Wakanda Forever".
Builder Hariharan constructs a house for Satyapalan, who later refuses to pay him his dues. What happens when Hariharan falls for Satyapalan's daughter Kavya?
Defying the odds, a newlywed Barsha embarks on a journey to accomplish her dreams whilst raising a voice against social issues.
As Aurangzeb captures the Kondhana Fort, Tanhaji Malusare, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj's trusted military leader and braveheart, ventures out to win it back.
Go behind the scenes of hosting the Men’s Hockey World Cup 2023.
Mohini, an artist, goes to the city in search of a livelihood. There she meets a dancer who changes her life.
On a wintry night, a group of college students take shelter at the deserted Krishna Cottage. But they feel a menacing presence that’s keeping a watch.
Manolo sets out on an adventure that will force him to choose between fulfilling his family's expectations and the love of his life.
A small-time crook Vishi has just about managed to prove his worth to his beloved, when his professional assassin body double bursts onto the scene.
After going through breakups the night before prom, two best friends go on an all-night bender to find new dates.
When money goes missing from Major Kathiravan's account, resulting in a personal tragedy, he decides to track down the hacker behind this.
Aadhi is a carefree young man who has a huge family. His breezy life takes an unexpected turn when he falls in love and has to win over the girl's father.
A desperate Rajagopal decides to go to Dubai as an illegal immigrant in search of a decent job. Soon he finds many like him who suffer and live sorry lives.
Kaththi Seenu, a convict on the run, meets his lookalike, Shankar, and sends him to prison. But things change when he gets a sneak peek into Shankar's life.
Varun gets bizarre dreams during his sleep. When he connects with a girl he sees in a photograph, it holds the key to a previous birth.
Every fight begins with a failure! Braving against the odds, Manoj Kumar Sharma puts it all on the line to crack the nation’s much sought-after exam: UPSC.
Arundhati takes help from Shiva, the righteous hero from the slums to seek justice and punish goon Bobby for his crimes.
Poor boy Paddu is in love with Bangari, the daughter of a local don. While they face many challenges, will the lovers fight it out to live happily together?
Mary is transported to a deep forest that is in a war between the forces of good and evil. She joins forces with a rag-tag group to save their and her worlds.
A group of thieves is hired by a local don to recover a treasure that was buried by his grandfather. However, the plan derails when a criminal joins them.
Captain Bharath of the Indian Army is on a mission to wipe out terrorists. With little help from the system, he disguises himself and works towards his goal.
An ageing Chinese mom gets another chance at motherhood when one of her dumplings springs to life as a lively, giggly dumpling boy.
Maleficent and her goddaughter Aurora begin to question their tangled ties as they are pulled in different directions by the impending wedding.
With rampant corruption and messy law-and-order situation, Rishi, an honest IAS officer, gets into trouble when evil forces plot against him.
Raja and Rani are against all wrongdoings. They join hands to fight against people who are into illegal business dealings.
Gemini, a rowdy, falls in love with Manisha and decides to refrain from crime. However, he lands in a difficult situation when his past returns to haunt him.
Ramesan Nair leads a happy life with his family. When he is diagnosed with early-onset Alzheimer's disease, the devastated family tries to cope with the trauma.
Akash leaves no stone unturned to become popular after getting rejected by a girl. However, life takes an unexpected turn when he bumps into his arch nemesis.
Fearless Anna teams up with Kristoff and a snowman named Olaf to find her sister Elsa, whose icy powers have trapped the kingdom in eternal winter.
To pay off his debts, Ashwin participates in a horror reality show with six others. Unaware of the consequences, they unearth a secret in the haunted mansion.
Though intelligent, Ravi believes in shortcuts to make money over hard work. His life changes when he crosses paths with Bittu, a gangster who robs a bank.
Six couples explore different facets of their marital bond and realise that misunderstandings and lack of communication are ruining their relationships.
Investigative journalist Gowtham's life turns into a nightmare when a recurring dream haunts his reality. To find the truth, he must make a bigger sacrifice.
Naive and penniless, Bhola gets persuaded to trade places with his criminal lookalike Ranjit. But when police lead a manhunt, troubles begin for Bhola.
Conman Gandhi Babu has no qualms about cheating people as he believes that is what politicians do. He is all for money and even betrays his love for it.
A materialistic businessman reunites with his happy-go-lucky childhood friend and embarks upon a journey of self-discovery to the Himalayas.
After facing multiple rejections, Tuku agrees to learn knitting at the insistence of a prospective mother-in-law, only to rediscover her life and relationships.
Durai, a debt collector, tortures the poor while executing orders of a loan shark. Things take a turn when a woman enters his life, claiming to be his mother.
Abbas Ali is forced to hide his real identity when Prithviraj Raghuvanshi offers him a job. But a series of lies soon turns Ali's life a laugh riot.
Shivu is a petty thief who falls for Preethi, who is attracted to his charm ways. However, her father, who's a supercop, enters the picture with a devious plan.
Varun helps nurse Malini with some legal formalities. They fall in love and begin living together until tragedy strikes.
Happy-go-lucky Gani falls head over heels in love with Raani. To separate them, Raani’s father plots a fake wedding in a haunted house. And things go awry!
Settled in Milan, Sabyasachi and Pratibha are on cloud nine with the arrival of their newborn son, Bony. However, they soon realise that he is no ordinary baby.
An ad filmmaker and a small-town beauty get inadvertently pulled into an investigative journalist's effort to expose a terrorist plot.
Four lazy friends want to make easy money and plan to get married to a rich girl. But their plan goes awry when they get entangled with the criminal world.
The movie follows renowned detective Hercule Poirot as he attempts to solve what would become one of the most infamous crimes in history.
Lewis, a brilliant inventor, meets a mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, who whisks him away in a time machine and to track down the Bowler Hat Guy.
Abdu gets married to Shakeela, a rich woman. However, problems arise when she learns that he is autistic.
Math genius Prem is determined to find out if, like his father, hip-hop is truly in his DNA.
An estranged father gets a chance to reconnect with his reluctant teenage daughter through the only thing they have in common - music.
Watch the life of Kaivara Thatthayya, born as Narayanappa in 1726, and how he got into spirituality after a seer sermonised him with an Ashtakashari Mantra.
Suresh is a devoted forest officer who has to struggle hard to protect a population of peacocks. Will he be able to achieve his goal?
Due to his inability to race, Dusty joins the world of aerial firefighting where he learns the meaning of being a true hero.
A group of children inspire everyone around them by adhering to Gandhian principles and opinions.
Having seen his father die during an altercation with the nearby village over water, Paari returns years later, only to learn that the problem still persists.
Edward Scissorhands' hands are replaced with scissors by a mad scientist. After the scientist dies, he attempts to lead a normal life in the town.
An inexperienced fairy godmother-in-training tries to prove that people still need fairy godmothers.
An incident that happened years ago comes back to haunt Dr Haridas after he meets a poor villager. To atone for his sins, he decides to help the family.
Vijay is an honest police officer who helps eradicate illegal businesses in the city. His life turns upside down when he finds out who is behind all of it.
Parthasarathy protests when Falgunan Thampy lays claim to the village temple assets. Things change when Falgunan's lawyer daughter turns against her father.
Rose is engaged to marry Caledon Hockley but falls in love with a poor artist Jack Dawson aboard the luxurious ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
17-year-old Simon Spier has a complicated love story as he doesn't know the identity of the anonymous classmate he's fallen for online.
Kanakambaran runs a drama troupe facing a financial crisis. With creditors after him, he takes up the offer to pretend as the heir to a royal family.
Sri Jagadguru Renukacharya is said to have granted Sage Agastya the Padividi Sutra, one of the five original sutras that propound the Veerashaiva Dharma theory.
Five friends share a very close bond and are always ready to help each other. However, their relationship is tested by time and circumstances.
A Britain-born girl marries a village boy, but she abhors him. However, circumstances leave her in a dilemma, making her realise his worth.
Raj visits his grandparents and teams up with his neighbour, Yamini, to learn magic. The two set off on a journey to fight evil and protect a precious gem.
Janaki is an orphan raised by villagers and loved by all. Kalyan is a kind-hearted doctor who falls in love with her. However, a terrible tragedy awaits them.
When Dr Chakravarthy's sister, Sudha, dies during childbirth, he meets Madhavi who reminds him of Sudha. However, her husband is not too happy with their bond.

title_name: Embrace the Panda: Making Turning Red
description: A close look into how Mei’s transformational journey came together, with behind-the-scenes access to Director Domee Shi and her core leadership crew.

Iniyum Kaanaam is a Malayalam drama starring Prem Nazir, Alummoodan, Vincent and Thikkurissi Sukumaran Nair, directed by Charles Ayyampally. Ramadas is an unemployed youth, frustrated by the system. He decides to make money in illicit ways, but his friend Devan stands in the way. Watch the full movie, Iniyum Kaanaam, online, only on Hotstar.
Pardhoo's carefree life changes when he runs into the goons of the Prakash gang. However, he is unaware of the challenges he will face to restore justice.
Earning a livelihood by cremating unclaimed dead bodies, the happiest moment in Mahadeva's life is when his son tops his class.
Kunchacko has made money through corrupt ways. Marrying Ann Mary changes his perspective, and he decides to turn a new leaf. But it is easier said than done.
Due to his brothers' meddling, an aggressive man falls in love with a woman who believes him to be a non-violent person. But, how long can he keep up the act?
Seven characters, seven dilemmas and a million confusions. The lives of seven youngsters trying to succeed in the IT sector are connected by one goal.
Set against the Malnad forests, the film is about how love blossoms in the wilderness.
When Bose impersonates a dying man for his property in the village, he finds a close-knit family. However, things change when a blackmailer surfaces.
An orphan named White enters Ongole market to start a new life. Little does he know that he is going to be hit by a life-changing blast from the past.

title_name: Little Krishna III - The Wondrous Feats
description: The story of Lord Krishna fighting dangerous demons like Aghasura, dreadful Vatsasura, and wicked Vyomasura.
A man who despises women is forced to work with an attractive and smart woman. Will his attempts to get her to quit the job be successful, or will Cupid strike?
An elderly man and his young-at-heart wife rekindle their passion for life on one magical night.

title_name: Forky Asks A Question: What is Reading?
description: The energetic Peas-n-a-Pod siblings teach Forky about reading and how it is done, with a little help from Mr. Spell.
Cancer patients Roy, Surya, Amir and Gauri become friends in the hospital where they are undergoing treatment and decide to live life to the fullest
Kumaran, an ex-military officer, returns home after a tragedy in his family. Running a canteen at Mahatma College, he soon becomes famous with the students.
A popular high school teen's arrogant attitude changes one morning when she awakens to find herself suddenly morphed into a 30-something-year-old man.
A lookalike of warrior queen Jejamma takes birth as Arundhati in the modern era. Unaware of the truth, Arundhati must battle a revenge-seeking foe to survive.
Siblings Deepthi and Ravi are separated after their parents' divorce. After many years, Deepthi decides to go in search of her brother.
Kancherla Gopanna becomes the tehsildar of Husnabad, causing turmoil among rivals. His major task is to build a Ram temple while dealing with communal unrest.
An unlikely connection between a kitten and a pit bull sparks a unique friendship.
An unconquerable hunter called Manyam Puli protects his village from man-eating tigers. But when a drug mafia infiltrates his home, he stands in their way.
The real-life story about a family that produced the first trio of brothers to become NBA champions.
Nandagopal weds Gauri on a condition that her brother Venu marry his sister Ammu. Soon, Venu realises that Ammu is epileptic, thus creating a rift in both the marriages.
Miffed at his son, a retired movie stunt-man embarks upon an introspective road trip that reunites him with his long-lost love.
Augustine and Gracy lead a happy life with their daughter, Teena. However, their happiness is shattered with the arrival of Dr Vasanth. Who is he?
Four orphans work for Gowri's father, who has always supported them. But after his death, these four and Gowri run into many problems.
Two friends decide to make it big in the city. After losing their jobs, they decide to venture into the real estate business. But a girl changes their lives.
In order to save his job, Johnny is asked to murder a beautiful girl by his boss. When he falls in love with her, a 'genie' helps him make the right choice.
Two fishermen have a hard life. Both love the theatre but hate each other. Will that stop them from pursuing their dreams of becoming stage actors?
Join Zihua, a physically challenged teenager, in her inspirational journey to become a national swimming champion, despite losing her arms.
Bill has returned to take down the Pines family. But this time he has brought some of his friends with him.
A young Indian boy living in New Jersey rebels against his traditional parents and struggles with identity and love.
Balmukund Shukla's pride lies in his hair, but premature baldness robs him of more than just his looks. With love at stake, will he have a 'hairy'-tale ending?
Merida, a strong-minded princess, must rely on her bravery and archery skills to undo a beastly curse that has brought chaos to her kingdom.
Ayaan marries Ahana, who gets disappointed on realising how conservative his family is. What happens when a pregnant Ahana wishes to abort her baby?
Seethayya and Rama Raju are loving brothers who care for each other. However, things become ugly when one of them falls for a conspiracy to separate them.
Rushing a near-dead victim to the police station makes cab driver Sumit the main suspect. As ACP Shabor steps in to investigate, a larger conspiracy unfolds.
Nandagopan is a respected dance teacher. However, his life takes a turn for the worse when his wife commits suicide and he turns into an alcoholic.
Christy gets framed for murder while trying to save the Home Minister's daughter. Facing facts, he has to fight the evil forces in his family to prove his innocence.
Samson, The Lion's son is accidentally shipped off to Africa, it's up to him and his curling team to rescue him. The group embarks upon a rollicking adventure.

title_name: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
description: Captain Barbossa and others must sail off the edge of the map, to find Jack Sparrow to fight against the East India Company.
A poor matchgirl sees happy images in the flames of her matches.
Eddie Edwards, a ski-jumper, tackles various challenges in order to become the first participant to represent the Great Britain in Olympic ski-jumping.
Angry at a group of mimicry artists for sending him to jail, Kasarkode Khader bhai and his son, Kasim bhai, set out to seek revenge.
Anand is a talented dancer and musician. His parents' separation devastates him leading him into trouble when he gets infatuated with an older girl.
Shalini hates Anand for his erratic ways. When a local don's son insists on marrying her, her desperate father, a police commissioner, turns to Anand for help.
Nandini, an aspiring medical student, falls for a much-older Abir. Despite her various attempts to woo him, will he ever reciprocate her feelings?
Prabhakaran and Malathi yearn for a child. When they lose hope, Malathi forces her husband to marry her sister so that he can become a father.
Appan Menon, who is investigating a murder, gives his wife an account of his day daily. However, one of the suspects finds something shocking about her.
From local playgrounds to international arenas, watch the inspiring revival of India's original sport - kabaddi.
Shankar, who wants to become a cop, faces hurdles within the family. He sets up CID Eesha, a private detective agency, but faces flak from the police.
Karthika sells milk to make a living to care for her brother, Prabhakaran. When her lover deserts her after getting her pregnant, Prabhakaran goes after him.
A bunch of senior citizens tries to cheer up a neurosurgeon suffering from acute depression by forming a club, where they celebrate old age sans any drama.
When Karan discovers that his father was wrongly jailed, which led to his suicide, he sets out to avenge him. But revenge is not easy.
Mohan gets separated from his mother at a very young age and believes her to be dead. However, destiny has special plans for the two.
Ken has miscalculated his and Barbie's travel arrangements for their Hawaiian vacation, so the gang has to create a dream getaway in Bonnie's bedroom.
A college student with a passion for adventure runs into trouble after being accused of the murder of a professor. How will he prove his innocence?
A young Norwegian boy in 1850s England goes to work as a cabin boy and discovers some of his shipmates are pirates.
To fulfill a strange demand of her lover's father, Madhumitha goes to great lengths and creates an alternate identity. What happens when her cover gets blown?
Jagadeesh saves an abandoned baby from railway tracks. But, later, he tries to get rid of her. However, he finds himself getting attached to her.
Orphans Kali and Valli's lives are upended after a clash with an engineer. Though Kali finds hope with Manga, how will Valli find solace?
Iyob runs illegal plantations in Munnar with his sons. What happens when his younger son, who had joined the Royal Indian Navy, returns home?
Murali Krishna is a protector of his village. When he falls into Varadarajulu's trap, Akhanda arrives with the blessings of Lord Shiva and becomes their saviour.
After her husband abandons her, Gulabi leads a lonely life. She loves cinema, and when her family gifts her a television, villagers begin to flock to her house.
Mundaspatti is a village where cameras are banned due to a superstition. Things change when a photographer visits and falls for the village head's daughter.
Dhruva, an honest IPS officer is on a challenging mission to destroy Siddharth Abhimanyu, the evil genius behind a huge medical mafia.
Radha, a sculptor, falls in love with orphan Kunjunni. However, her father is against their relationship until a shocking truth about Kunjunni is revealed.
When Aarusaamy's son finds out the truth about his parents' murder, he decides to seek revenge from Ravana Pichai and put an end to his criminal activities.
Sing along with your favourite songs with on-screen lyrics as you watch "Moana."
Keerthana is treated as a goddess by villagers as she possesses divine powers. However, when she falls for the son of a fisherman, she faces dire consequences.
Appu and Aniyankuttan fail to see eye to eye when it comes to running the family-owned newspaper business, which causes a rift in the family.
Hawk wants to build a shopping mall but, a widow won't sell the remaining plot. He resorts to evil schemes not knowing that she has an ace up her sleeve.
When a software engineer's horrible boss cunningly coaxes him to do her a favour, he agrees, but on one condition. Will the bully finally get her comeuppance?

title_name: Cecil: The Legacy Of A King
description: While Cecil's demise at the hand of hunters was splashed across the media, sparking fury in all who heard his tale, his story before he was posthumously iconized is worthy of celebrating.
Super-powered teens join forces as an unlikely threat no one could have expected bears down on the Marvel Universe.
Little Kallu longs for a glimpse of Swami Ayyappan. When she sets out on the pilgrimage to Sabarimala, a mysterious person steps forward to help. Who is he?
Madhavankutty takes charge of his siblings after his parent's death. When he realises that he needs a break, he goes on a pilgrimage that changes his life.
Shwetha is a film artiste. Bharath joins as her manager. Soon, she finds herself getting attracted to him.
It is love at first sight for a radio journalist when he meets a mysterious woman. Enchanted, he follows her and gets embroiled in a complicated situation.

Breaking News is a Kannada romance drama, starring Ajay Rao, Radhika Pandit and Anant Nag. Reporter Arjun is not happy with the way news reportings focus only on TRPs rather than telling the truth or the facts to the public. Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.
In London during World War II, this is the story of Wendy's daughter, Jane, who is kidnapped by Captain Hook and Peter Pan must come to the rescue.
After a devastating alien attack, the President, an Air Force Marshall and a satellite expert devise a counterattack to save the world.
Srinu and Paddhu, who live in the downmarket half of their locality, lock horns with a gang of rich people, who plan to take over the local lake. Who will win?
An anonymous letter has Prakash, a businessman, suspecting his wife, Anita, of infidelity. Will he ever find out the truth?
Wildlife Cameraman Sandesh Kadur is on a mission to uncover the secretive lives of the leopards that prowl India's jungles and mountains.
TJ and his buddies protest changes at the school when the Board of Education plans to pave over their beloved playground.
Doctor Strange and a team of monsters must help the Hulk overcome his dream self to defeat Nightmare on Halloween night.
Two arch-rivals realise that their children are in love with each other! Will they agree to end their long animosity for their sake?

Kerala Varma Pazhassiraja is a Malayalam film, directed by Hariharan, written by MT Vasudenvan Nair and starring Mammootty in the lead role. Set in 1796, it revolves around Kerala Varma, the king of Pazassi Palace of Kottayam House, and the leader of the revolt against the colonisers. The film won the National Award for Best Background Score, Audiography and the Special Jury Award for Padmapriya. The music of the movie is composed by Ilaiyaraaja and it was dubbed and released in Tamil and Hindi after its stupendous success at the box office. Watch the full film, streaming online on Hotstar.
Filmmaker and National Geographic Explorer Max Lowe, turns the lens on his own family, as the body of his father is uncovered seventeen years after his death.
Minister Mahadevayya cheats businessman Raghuram, who later commits suicide. But Raghuram has a daughter who won't sit quiet and wants revenge.
An ardent Sherlock Holmes fan, enforcement officer Thomas tries to crack a big case in his first posting. However, things go awry when his wife intervenes.

title_name: Forky Asks A Question: What is a Friend?
description: Forky shares his thoughts on what makes a good friend based on his limited exposure to the world inside Bonnie’s house.
Sam Alexander is a theatre fiend. When his heroine runs away, he casts Sreedevi as Shakuntala in his play. However, problems arise when they fall in love.
Inspector Shankar investigates the death of Sunder Singh. But when his burnt body is found, the mystery around his death deepens.
A young orphan girl's greedy uncle is not able to support her. Then she gets pushed into prostitution.
Ahana acquires a hotel in the hills. At the launch party, she meets Kunal and they fall in love. But a strange creature begins to terrorise them!
Seelabhati starts working as a computer teacher in a remote village. However, the villagers start blaming her teaching when some students vanish mysteriously.
Truck driver Chandrahasan's life is shattered when his wife gets kidnapped by his friend Giri. Will he succeed in finding them on time?
Set in an English coastal town in the early 1980s, 'Empire of Light' is a moving drama about the power of human connection during turbulent times.
Ajay Kumar, a former counter-terrorism agent, lives a quiet life with his wife. However, he faces his worst fears when his ex-teammates call him for a mission.
Village head Veeraraju takes on his enemies to protect his daughter, who has been separated from him by his wife. Will this fight end in a reunion?
The story revolves around the adventures of concierge Gustave H and his friend Zero Moustafa at a famous European hotel.
Kumaran and Nallavan find work in a petrol bunk in Chennai. While Bharathi falls for Kumaran and his new business also takes off, his past holds dark secrets.
A newly-wed couple moves to a housing community. Here they meet a boy who speaks to spirits, and he tells them about the one in their house.
Adrift on a lake, two kids with different ways of communicating attempt to connect.
The lives of Secret Warriors are turned upside down by their latest mission: show Shuri, Wakanda's Crown Princess, what it's like to be an ordinary teenager.

title_name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul
description: Family road trip to attend Meemaw's 90th birthday party goes hilariously off course thanks to Greg's newest scheme to become famous.
